title: Cash App
description:
Cash App is the easiest way to send, spend, save, and invest your money. It’s the SAFE, FAST, and FREE money app.

SAFE: Protect all of your payments with a passcode. Pause spending on your Cash Card with one tap if you misplace it.

FAST: Sign up and make your first payment in minutes. Instantly send and receive money from friends. Cash out from Cash App to your bank account instantly instead of waiting days. 

FREE: Send and receive money at no cost. Get a completely free virtual Visa debit card in minutes, and we’ll mail you your custom physical debit card for free in under a week.

Here’s how it works:

* SIGN UP IN SECONDS *
It only takes a couple of minutes to download and sign up for Cash App. The signup process is simple and fast so that you can start using Cash App as quickly as possible.

* SEND AND RECEIVE CASH INSTANTLY * 
Send, receive, and request cash from friends and family instantly with only a few taps. Cash App is the easiest way to pay a friend back for dinner or chip in on rent with your roommates. 

* CUSTOM VISA DEBIT CARD *
Order your Cash Card (a customizable Visa debit card) directly from Cash App. You’ll instantly be able to make online purchases or add your Cash Card to Google Pay for in-store purchases. Of course, we’ll also mail you your Cash Card in less than a week so you can use it to pay anywhere.  

* INSTANT DISCOUNTS *
Cash Card is the only free debit card with instant discounts at your favorite stores and restaurants. These instant discounts - Boosts - are easy to use and are applied to Cash Card transactions instantly. Just select a given Boost in your app and then use your Cash Card to pay. It’s that simple. No points, no waiting, just instant savings.

* BITCOIN * 
Cash App is the easiest way to buy, sell, deposit, and send Bitcoin. Track the BTC price in realtime in your app and buy as little as $1 of Bitcoin. Your BTC arrives in your app instantly and you can keep it safe in Cash App or choose to withdraw it.

* STOCKS * 
Instantly begin investing commission-free with Cash App. You can buy as little as $1 of stock in top US companies. Track stock prices in realtime in your app and monitor the performance of your overall investment portfolio. Create a list of companies to follow so you can stay up to date on performance. Brokerage services provided by Cash App Investing LLC, member FINRA / SIPC. Investing involves risk; you may lose money.

* PAYCHECK DEPOSIT *
Get your paycheck deposited directly into Cash App. Instantly receive a personal account and routing number that lets you or your employer make deposits into your Cash App via traditional ACH transactions.

recentChanges: Various bug fixes and improvements
comments: So far cashapp has been a pain in my side it worked well for a week, now I can't send payments receive payments or anything. I have contacted support and asked for a phone call but no! Email only. So, I have emailed them the past few days with the issues and am getting nowhere with them. For some reason my account appears to be locked down, and it will not verify my email, Picture ID, social or anything. I would not recommend this if you just dont feel like dealing with headaches.

The best I use it all the time. So easy. I use it mostly with family. When I need a couple of bucks to hold me over until check day. Your money is added to your cash card in minutes. Oh I forgot to say you can get your own a debit card straight from the app. Pre signed for easier verification. 5* in my book. Now with all the upgrades bitcoin and now stocks options are being added to the app. Awesome!!!. no more trying to figure out on how to buy or even trade stock. #Lovingit!!! #Giveitatry

cash app is good but not great. Very often I get stuck on a page I didn't want to go to and can't get out of. Although payments are quick and easy, sometimes there are glitches and it is difficult to get timely help. Today I bought bitcoin. Easy. I sent it in payment for something. It never arrived. Not only that, but the transaction did not show up in my transaction list so I can't prove it. But the bitcoin certainly DID disappear out of my wallet. The amount missing is $201 USD. I wrote to support but it will take 24 hours to get a response. I am not happy.

Well, this app and I have had our struggles that's for sure. I was the last of the cash first kids to not understand the basics of checking accounts, debts, credit s, etc. But I have always liked this app because of its popular brand recognition and by how hard it is to hack into the account IF you don't know a whole lot about the basics of the weakness of passwords in general. One thing I do not like, is how it isn't clear you need a square account on a separate device

Very convenient, VERY FAST, & very low fees. Way better than Google Pay. Google Pay allows previous money that has been sent months before intentionally, to be credited back to them (even though they were legit transactions). That's allowing fraud, & now they show a negative of thousands. I would highly encourage to use CashApp instead.

title: Venmo
description:
Why use Venmo?

Because it’s the money app for splitting the cost of almost anything—right then, right there.
Because it makes settling up feel like catching up. 
Because you can add a note to each payment to remember the moments, not the money. 

What do people use Venmo for? Plenty of things, like:

Meals
Split the group dinner tab without the napkin math.

Rent
Transfer money to roomies for your share of rent and utilities.

Activities
Settle up for fun stuff like concert tix and road trips.

Surprises
Send a penny to say hi, or 5 bucks for good luck.

Still reading? We’ll let you in on a little secret: we’re more than just a way to pay friends.
- We offer Venmo card, so you can shop with your Venmo balance everywhere Mastercard® is accepted in the U.S., plus earn cash back rewards at select retailers. Terms apply: https://venmo.com/rewards/
- Get your Venmo money in the bank, fast. Use Instant Transfer to get your cash in minutes using an eligible debit card or bank account. 
- Check out with Venmo on some of your favorite apps, like Uber, StockX, Grubhub, and Zola. 
- We’ve got your back—security is very important to us, and we prioritize making you feel safe and secure by taking security measures to protect your account. Plus, we’ve got a stellar customer support team, ready to solve any issues.


Card is issued by The Bancorp Bank pursuant to license by Mastercard International Incorporated. The Bancorp Bank; Member FDIC. Mastercard is a registered trademark, and the circles design is a trademark of Mastercard International Incorporated.

recentChanges: We worked on various improvements and bug fixes
comments: Exchanging money with people works great. Instant verification to add bank accounts has issues. On the last step where I'm supposed to choose which bank account to add, it's just blank. (Edit: when I made the above review, they replied with "It seems like you're having issues with the process" - no, your process has issues, I'm not doing anything wrong. Because of that response, I moved it from 3 stars to 2 stars).

This app is terrible. Their security is awful. Their response on trouble tickets is even worse. It also leaves you hanging to where you don't know if they even got your message. They can't do anything right. A couple months after I listed the comments above I tried to request funds from somebody and instead venmo sent them funds putting my account in the negative. I can not warn you enough, so not use this app it's terrible.

*update* Venmo solved my issue quickly. I appreciate their customer service and now I can use Venmo again! Woohoo!!* Tried to install the app but won't let me verify my phone number so I couldn't even get passed the registration part. Kept saying 404 error.
Ease of use has greatly improved. A little leg-work is involved to link a bank account. Have your routing and account numbers on hand.

This has been a lifesaver more than once, it's particularly a great app if you needed money in your bank account right now it's great!. That was then, this is now.it keeps telling me that my debit card can't be used for instant transfers. it worked fine with Wells Fargo but when I switch to chase now it's giving me misery up the ass.

title: Robinhood - Investment & Trading, Commission-free
description:
Invest in stocks, options and ETFs (funds), all commission-free with the Robinhood app.

Our trading tools give everyone access to the financial market - whether you're a beginner in investing or a seasoned trading pro.

Save, invest in the stock market, and earn money. Here's what you get when you join Robinhood:

Finance explained - We’ll help you understand financial markets so you can invest in the stock market and buy funds, shares and options, all commission-free. Other fees may apply. View Robinhood Financial's fee schedule at rbnhd.co/fees to learn more.

Trading tools - Before you buy funds, Bitcoin, or any other investment option, you can access real-time market data, read relevant finance news articles, and get notified about important events. And manage your portfolio on the go.

Stock market trends - Set up customized finance news and notifications to stay on top of your assets. Controlling the flow of info is up to you.

Cash Management - Earn money with your uninvested cash and earn competitive APY with your brokerage account.

The Robinhood app gives you the trading tools, finance news and cash management products to make your money work harder. Whether you want to invest in the stock market, buy funds, save money or earn money, we’ve got the information to help you make smart decisions.


INVESTING MADE EASY
New to investing? Fear not. We have the trading tools and services to empower you to participate in the financial market. Learn how to invest and trade smartly, and get in-depth financial info in lingo that makes sense. 

STOCKS, FUNDS, OPTIONS AND CRYPTO
With Robinhood Financial, you can invest in stocks, funds, and options. You can also buy and sell cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), and Dogecoin (DOGE) with Robinhood Crypto.

EARN MONEY WITH CASH MANAGEMENT
Earn money with competitive interest* on your uninvested cash and get more flexibility with your brokerage account.

---------------
*Cash Management is an added feature to your Robinhood Financial LLC brokerage account. The Annual Percentage Yield (APY) paid by program banks may  change at any time at the program banks’ discretion. Interest is earned on uninvested cash swept from the brokerage account to the program banks. Neither Robinhood Financial LLC nor any of its affiliates are banks. The debit card is issued by Sutton Bank, member FDIC, pursuant to license by Mastercard® International, Incorporated.

Securities trading offered through Robinhood Financial LLC, member SIPC and FINRA.

Cryptocurrency trading offered through Robinhood Crypto, LLC. Robinhood Crypto is licensed to engage in virtual currency business activity by the New York State Department of Financial Services and is not a member of FINRA or SIPC. Cryptocurrencies are not stocks and your cryptocurrency investments are not products protected by either the FDIC or SIPC.

The free stock offer valid only for selected individuals, subject to the terms and conditions at rbnhd.co/freestock- terms. Free stock randomly chosen as detailed on the website. Individuals must sign up through a promotional page to be eligible. Neither receipt of a share of stock through this program nor identification of a particular security in communications related to this program constitutes a solicitation of the security or a recommendation to buy, sell, or hold the security. Robinhood Financial does not provide investment advice and does not hereby recommend any security or transaction.

All investments involve risk and the past performance of a security, other financial product or cryptocurrency does not guarantee future results or returns. You can always lose money when you invest in securities, cryptocurrencies, or other financial products. Investors should consider their investment objectives and risks carefully before investing.

Robinhood Financial LLC and Robinhood Crypto, LLC are wholly-owned subsidiaries of Robinhood Markets, Inc.

comments: Superb interface - Garbage Stability: This app is by far the most intuitive and beginner friendly option I've encountered. Unfortunately, the stability of the trading system is straight up garbage. Users were locked out of their account for the entire day of March 2nd, 2020; and the first half of March 3rd, 2020; during which the S&P 500 bounced up 8% from it's previous weeklong plummet. Do not trust this company with critical day to day trades, they have no qualms about shutting down the system

So I figured I would give this app a try. Not looking good. It kept telling me it's losing connection, and then its having a server issue. Right after I put ALL my information in. Wont let you look at stocks. Just sends you to a blank page. So far this has been a horrible experience. Not sure I would invest money into this if you cant even navigate the app properly.

So far this app is a major disappointment. The platform is solid. The problem is, it is extremely glitchy during peak hours. Which makes its users lose money. I keep getting server errors and apparently I'm not the only one. I've looked it up and many other users are having trouble with the glitches as well. If it continues I will no doubt pull my money out.

Can't even really get started with the app. I have been trying to link my account. I have tried multiple times over the course of 24 hrs. I keep getting a message "oops we can not ....". I have checked the help section and couldn't find anything that directly addressed it (it is not the 1 factor authentication either). I have sent a message to support in 24hrs have only got the immediate auto reply. The app seemed like the best choice after reading various articles but it's useless with the bugs

Decent app for buying/selling but its features are still pretty limited. That said, their customer service is a joke. Tried to cancel a transfer to/from my bank. I had to send an email and was advised a wait time of 1-3 days before someone would get back to me. 3 days later no response, except a new automated message stating my transfer was in process now and I can no longer cancel it. What a joke.

title: PayPal Mobile Cash: Send and Request Money Fast
description:
With our improved app, you'll get the convenience you want, paired with the secure transactions you've come to trust from PayPal. Plus, there are no transaction fees when sending money to Friends and Family in the U.S. when you use your bank account or balance.

HELP KEEP YOUR FINANCIAL INFORMATION PRIVATE AND PROTECTED
You can get peace of mind you deserve with:
24/7 transaction monitoring
Secure encryption technology
Fraud protection
Fingerprint and two-factor authentication (activation required)

SEND MONEY TO FRIENDS AND FAMILY FOR FREE
It’s free to send money to Friends and Family in the U.S. using your bank account or PayPal balance. Settle up for your share of the bill, send a loved one the gift of money, or request money from a 
friend with ease.

PAY FOR GOODS AND SERVICES WITH CONFIDENCE
Sending money to someone you don't know? With PayPal, you can send it with confidence. When selecting Goods & Services, your eligible send money transactions can be protected by Purchase Protection. Terms and Limitations apply. And, if the recipient doesn't have a PayPal account, can open one easily for free.

ACCESS YOUR BALANCE INSTANTLY WITH THE PAYPAL CASH CARD
Easily transfer funds from your bank to your PayPal account and access your balance with the PayPal Cash Card. Shop in-store, online or anywhere Mastercard is accepted. Plus, withdraw your PayPal funds at ATMs worldwide.

SEND MONEY TO PAYPAL ACCOUNTS AROUND THE WORLD*
We make it easy to send money internationally. Choose from a range of currencies to help maximize the value of your dollar with our competitive fees. Sender and recipient must have a PayPal account.

summary: The PayPal mobile app is the secure way to send, receive, and access your money.
recentChanges: New in this version: Improvements and bug fixes for Notifications, Send Money, and Activity. We hope you enjoy our app! Keep it updated so you've always got the latest and greatest.
comments: Having my PayPal account, and PayPal Cash card has been very convenient and easy to use. I have ran into situations where I was looking to make a purchase and the only form of payment a seller or retailer would accept is PayPal. I love the fact that PayPal insures your transaction. Also everything about using My Card and PayPal account has been smooth and easy. Thanks PayPal!!!

Almost useful apart from stupid login. Enter my password and it sends a code via text, read the text and it's logged you out of the App. Log back in and repeat the same thing again and again. Only way to successfully log in is to have texts open on my PC using Android messages. Even if I open texts on my mobile before logging into the App as soon as I switch to the texts it logs me out again.

Can never use the app, every time after logging in, and entering code for 2FA, it goes to a blank screen with a X in the upper left corner. If I click the X, I have to login again and do 2FA code again, and then back to the blank screen. If I reinstall the app, it works maybe one time before doing the blank page thing again. I can get get into the app. It's been like this for months now. Nothing seems to ever really fix this issue, and many others seeing the same issue. Please fix this!

I use PayPal for direct deposit from work, and I love it more than any bank I've ever been with. I have a card I can use anywhere in person or online, and the balance on the app is immediately updated so i always know exactly what's in my account. I'm also provided with a detailed list of what & when my expenses were. And money can be sent immediately to other paypal users. No waiting or fees. You can even create savings accounts or money pools. This is an incredible app & i adore paypal.🖤

Good App. Works great for family, shopping, and even some bill payments. My only complaint is that funds received notifications have no option to transfer to your bank. Selecting any option from the notification closes the app instead of prompting you to login to continue. This could be streamlined. Maybe leaving the app logged in would remedy that, but that would be a security risk in my opinion. Every other aspect of the app seems awesome. It's a Must have.

title: Fresh EBT - Food Stamp Balance
description:
Fresh EBT is the #1 rated EBT App to check your food stamp balance, track your EBT spending, get deposit date reminders, and find ways to save money throughout the month. Join over 2 million families who use Fresh EBT today!

FEATURES

• Check your EBT balance instantly - no phone calls or receipts
• Track your purchase history to avoid surprises
• Get a notification on your regular deposit date
• Save money with grocery coupons
• Find resources to help you save money
• Find local, flexible jobs to earn extra income
• Accurate, secure, and free


AVAILABLE IN EVERY STATE

Fresh EBT works with every food assistance program and EBT Card in the U.S, including Quest, ebtEDGE, ConnectEBT, California CalFresh, Texas Lone Star, Florida & Pennsylvania ACCESS cards, Illinois Link, MI Bridge, Oregon Trail, and more.

Fresh EBT supports WIC EBT benefits in Alabama, Colorado, Florida, Indiana, Iowa, Michigan, Nevada, New Hampshire, New York, Oklahoma, Oregon, South Carolina, Tennessee, Vermont, and West Virginia.


SAVE MONEY WITH GROCERY COUPONS AND FREE RESOURCES

Find stores that accept EBT on the Near Me map and clip coupons directly to your grocery store loyalty card to save money when you shop. Browse additional resources to help you save and earn money, including other government benefits, flexible job opportunities, local food banks, free Android phones, and exclusive deals on Fresh EBT.


FEATURED IN THE WALL STREET JOURNAL AND FORBES

“Propel: An App That Makes Checking Food-Stamp Balances Easier” https://www.wsj.com/video/series/financial-inclusion-in-america/propel-an-app-that-makes-checking-food-stamp-balances-easier/C2590842-E0F4-4E15-8036-C23B218D64D8

“This startup helps food stamp recipients make their EBT benefits last” www.forbes.com/sites/annefield/2017/04/29/this-startup-helps-food-stamp-recipients-make-their-benefits-last/


PRIVATE AND SECURE

Fresh EBT does not store, transmit, or sell your personal data to any third party. All communication with the app are fully encrypted. Fresh EBT lets you view your benefit information but you cannot make transaction with the app, so your benefits are safe.


Fresh EBT is not affiliated with any United States government entity or EBT card issuer. Fresh EBT connects to your state's EBT portal to retrieve information on your behalf. Fresh EBT is built by Propel, a software company that aims to help low-income Americans get back on their feet. Learn more at www.freshebt.com

Fresh EBT is built by Propel, a software company that aims to help low-income Americans get back on their feet. Learn more at www.freshebt.com
summary: Check your EBT Card balance and Food Stamp spending. Accurate, free, and secure!
recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements. We're always working to make Fresh EBT better for you!
comments: Amazing App, it goes beyond just telling you what your balance is, it breaks down what you've spent abd where. As well as tells what the recommended weekly budget should be to make your balance last all month. Plus it helps you find work, and provides links to company's that offer you discounts if you are an EBT recipient. Awesome, just awesome! 🤙💯🙌

So I guess it's happening to other ppl also, but I cannot log in to see my balance! Everytime I try it says invalid info! So finally I tried to make a new account, enter new information and it still tells me something is invalid!!! This is so frustrating. I have had this app for a couple years and never had any problems, until now! I have also tried calling to talk to a live person about the problem but can't get ahold of anyone at the#. Please fix this problem! Until recently this app was great

Awesome app!! Been using it for a while now. No more calling the EBT line for balance. Easy, helpful, & informative. Not only does it give your balance, but it helps with teaching you how to stretch your funds to last the whole month. It even lists job openings & other programs for assistant!!

Aside from the quick convenience of accessing your EBT balance and info, this app has a ton of helpful tips and options for people on a tight budget. You can "clip" hundreds of coupons from your local grocery store, learn how to get Amazon Prime for 50% off just for having EBT benefits, plus you can access many options for improving job skills (for free), fixing your resume, finding jobs with flexible hours, and more. This app is the cat's pajamas! Glad I found it.

EXCELLENT. JUST EXCELLENT! I love this app to the tenth power. Thank you to the creators of Fresh EBT - Food Stamp App. No more calling the number on the back of the card when you have something left to spend but forgot how much it is. Love it, love it, love it!

title: Zelle
description:
Zelle® has partnered with leading banks and credit unions across the U.S. to bring you a fast, safe and easy way to send money to friends and family. Money moves quickly - directly from bank account to bank account. If your bank or credit union offers Zelle, you already have it in your mobile banking app or online banking – if they don’t, the Zelle app will make it easy for you to send money to enrolled Zelle users that already have access through their financial institution.

Zelle. This is how money moves®.

Using just your recipient’s email address or U.S. mobile number, you can settle up simply and safely with almost anyone you know and trust. Even better, Zelle does not charge any fees to use the service. (Mobile carrier or bank fees may apply).

GET STARTED:
1.	Download the Zelle app.
2.	Enroll using a Visa® or Mastercard® debit card linked to a U.S. checking account; or 
3.	Enroll your U.S. checking account by using your online banking username and password, if your bank supports this feature*.
4.	Choose a person to pay, or request money from, by entering their U.S. mobile number or email address.
5.	Confirm the amount and hit send. If they’re already enrolled with Zelle, they’ll typically get the money in minutes. If they aren’t, they will be notified and can follow a few simple steps to complete the payment. 

*Some banks allow customers to enroll in the Zelle app using their online or mobile banking username and password.

Zelle and the Zelle related marks and logos are property of Early Warning Services, LLC

You must have a bank account in the U.S. to use Zelle.

summary: Zelle is the fast, safe, easy way to send money to friends and family.
recentChanges: We update the app regularly to address bugs and make performance improvements.
comments: I'm so frustrated, I can't get in to my account, it keeps giving me a message saying that something's wrong with my phone number. There's nothing wrong with it; it's the correct number & my online company who I work for will soon be using this app to transfer my money. Right now they're using clearxchange which will soon be Zelle. What to do?! I'm afraid my money will be lost once the company takes over clearxchange. Zelle please help!

I couldn't even sign up for my first ever zelle transaction. Great first impression. Didn't have my bank available, I tried adding my debit card, error popped up to call customer service, no number or link to be found. No I'm not going to spend time looking for the number, I rather write a bad review. I guess I'll never use this app. 👍🏼

Terrible app. My bank never comes up, so I enter the debit card info manually and each time it say "Uh oh, there's been an error" proceeds to delete all 2 pages of info I filled out, and the cycle continues. Plus, I know for a fact my bank uses Zelle, because from my bank's app, I can send money using Zelle. Zelle in general is fine; the app is s#!% Use Venmo. It's miles better.

Got an email notice from a friend trying to send me money. To accept, I had to enter my bank. My bank is not listed, so it defaults and tells you to open the app. Unfortunately, the transaction isn' queued up in the app, so you have to request funds from the same person. Now's there's two requests outstanding and no one is getting paid. Zelle needs to close this gap and fix this hole.

I've used this for a long time with no trouble and recently someone sent me money and it says I have to accept it. If I click on the link they have my bank in the list but an error pops up everytime. If I use the app they don't even have my bank and if I enter in my information an error pops up again. The one time I was able to get my account I didn't have any pending activity and can't accept the money.

title: Chime - Mobile Banking
description:
Welcome to banking made awesome. 

Chime is mobile and online banking with no hidden fees: get your paycheck up to 2 days early* with direct deposit, have fee-free overdraft when you’re in a pinch, grow your savings automatically, and manage your finances like a boss using the highly-rated Chime mobile banking app.

When you bank with Chime, you get a Visa® Debit Card, a Spending Account, and an optional Savings Account to help you save money. 

Applying for an account is free, takes less than 2 minutes and it won’t affect your credit score!

Here’s what our members love most about Chime:
• Get your paycheck up to 2 days early* with direct deposit
• Fee-free overdraft.** We’ll spot you on debit card purchases with no overdraft fees. 
• No hidden fees: no monthly fees, no overdraft fees, no foreign transaction fees, no minimum balance requirements 
• Over 38,000 fee-free ATMs with Moneypass and Visa Plus Alliance
• Real-time transaction notifications
• Daily balance alerts
• Block your card instantly in-app
• Grow your savings automatically with our Savings Account
• Send money instantly with Pay Friends to other Chime members. 
• Deposit checks using Mobile Check Deposit for eligible members.^ 
• Apple Pay™ / Google Pay™ for when you forget your wallet
• Move money between your other bank accounts
• EMV chip card security
• Friendly and responsive customer support

With the Chime mobile banking app, you can stay in control of your money. Track your spending, link your other bank accounts, and save money.

How to switch banks:
• Step 1: Open Your Account: Download the app and sign up. Once approved, we’ll send you your Chime card within two weeks!
• Step 2: Fund Your Account: Set up a direct deposit with your employer or payer to have funds deposited to your Chime account every payday. You can also connect other bank accounts and transfer funds from your existing bank account.
• Step 3: Update Bill Payments: Activate your card when it arrives, add it to Apple Pay, and set up recurring bill payments with your Chime card number or with your Chime Spending Account and routing numbers.

 For more information please visit www.chime.com.

***Learn how we collect and use your information by visiting our Privacy Policy at https://www.chimebank.com/policies/chime/privacy-policy/.***

Banking services provided by, and debit card issued by, The Bancorp Bank, or Stride Bank, N.A., Members FDIC, pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. Debit card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

*Early access to direct deposit funds depends on the timing of payer’s submission of deposits. We generally post such deposits on the day they are received which may be up to 2 days earlier than the payer’s scheduled payment date.
**Chime SpotMe is an optional, no fee service that requires that you receive $500 in direct deposit a month to qualify to overdraw your account up to $20 on debit card purchases. Chime, in its sole discretion, may allow you to withdraw your account up to $100 or more based on your Chime Account history, direct deposit history and amount, spending activity and other risk-based factors. Your Limit will be displayed to you within the Chime mobile app. You will receive notice of any changes to your Limit. Your Limit may be increased or lowered at any time by Chime.
^Not all new or existing customers are eligible to use Mobile Deposit. There are qualifications and enrollment requirements for participation in Mobile Deposit, and we reserve the right to change the qualification and enrollment requirements in our sole discretion at any time without prior notice. We may require you to upload a picture of your driver’s license or other identifying documents prior to using Mobile Deposit. Eligibility requirements can be found online after you have signed into your Spending Account.

summary: Banking with no hidden fees, fee-free overdraft, and early direct deposit.
recentChanges:
* We heard you guys loud and clear: the account balance amounts on the Home screen were big? We tweaked them to be a bit smaller so if anyone is trying to look over your shoulder
* For those of you using screenreaders, the slider for adjusting your SpotMe limit used to be impossible to move.
* Fixed a bug where sometimes your "Top Friends" in your Pay Friends list wouldn't load
* We caught a bunch of other bugs - but not THAT bug. Don't worry about us, take care of yourselves!
comments: Other than the glitch from 2 or 3 months ago... The app works very well. Chime is pretty cool, and I have used them for over a year now. I would kind of like to know why every few weeks I will get a notification that my card was declined somewhere, even though I have my card with me all the time... Or why occasionally it will randomly notify me that Chime covered me with a Spot Me, even though I never tried to purchase anything that would have taken my account into the negative.

I downloaded this app mainly for the round up to savings feature. Whenever I make a debit card transaction it says pending for 2-3 days, and then it rounds up the money to my savings. If I make a bunch of transactions in one day, I have to remember that. Every other debit card I've had if I use my PIN my money's taken out instantly. At least I get notifications after each transaction.

The app. is so easy to use. I've had Chime for the better part of a year now, and I have no complaints. There's a map to find ATMs, and place that will give cash back. As long as I plan it ahead of time, I can easily send out a check. Adding to my savings is super easy, too. My one complaint is that the APY for my savings account has dropped drastically.

Greatest banking app I have used to date. No over drafts fees, option to over draft up to $100. Waives my ATM fees. Easy direct deposit, get paid 2 sometimes 3 days sooner. Great and fast customer service. I have not had one issue with the card. User friendly app with literally no bugs, up to date balance, and daily balance. The change to roll over change into your savings and collect interest! Love.. love...love chime! Oh, and the $50 refer a friend rocks too!

I've had this bank for a few years, it's awesome. You don't have to worry about overdrafts (because you can't). Although now it has an option to let you overdraft up to $100 with no fees. And the debit card design is very sleek, it's all white. Works with apple pay and Google pay. Chime is dope af! I just wish there was a dark theme option, white backgrounds are so gross!

title: Credit Karma - Free Credit Scores & Reports
description:
From spotting identity theft to getting personalized loan and credit card recommendations. Ready to make financial progress?

• Check your free credit scores – Learn what affects your credit scores and how you can take control.

• Introducing Credit Karma Savings – You worked hard for your money. Now Credit Karma Savings makes your money work harder for you. Open a savings account* in minutes and start earning a high-yield interest rate that’s optimized across a network of 800+ banks.

• Credit Karma Tax® – Filing your 2019 state and federal tax returns is 100% free from start to finish, plus you’ll get our Maximum Refund Guarantee**, Audit Defense*** and dedicated support.

• Free ID monitoring – We help you spot potential identity theft and give you tips for keeping your personal information safer.

• Free credit monitoring – Get credit alerts when we see important changes happen to your Equifax or TransUnion credit reports.

• Personalized Approval Odds – See which credit card and personal loan offers you’re more likely to get before applying.

• Credit card choices – Browse great credit card offers based on your unique credit profile.

• All things auto – Tune up your auto loan, save on insurance, see open recalls and find vehicle records.

• Home sweet home – Calculate how much home you can afford, see personalized home loan offers and get a mortgage pre-qualification letter.

• Personal loan shopping – Whether you want to refinance credit card debt or borrow for an emergency, we’ll show you personalized offers based on your credit profile.

• Search unclaimed money – See if any of the more than $40 billion in unclaimed money has your name on it. 

Join more than 100 million members and get all these features, and more, for free. Download the Credit Karma app now.

DISCLAIMER

*Banking services provided by MVB Bank, Inc., Member FDIC. Maximum balance and transfer limits apply. Maximum 6 withdrawals per monthly statement cycle.

**If you receive a larger federal tax refund amount or owe less in federal taxes using the same Tax Return Information when filing an amended return through another online tax preparation service, then you may be eligible to receive the difference in the refund or tax amount owed up to $100 (minimum $25) in the form of a gift card from Credit Karma Tax®. For details and eligibility, see https://www.creditkarma.com/tax/programterms#1.

***For details and eligibility, see https://www.creditkarma.com/lp/audit-defense-terms/.  Exclusions apply.

$2781 provided in the Credit Karma Tax phone screen image is the average 2018 Federal tax refund based on data provided by the IRS. $2973 is the average 2018 State tax refund in CA based on data provided by the CA Department of Revenue.

Mortgage products and services offered through Credit Karma Mortgage, Inc. NMLS ID# 1588622 | Read licenses at https://www.creditkarma.com/about/mortgage-licenses.
 
Loan services offered through Credit Karma Offers, Inc., NMLS ID# 1628077 | Read licenses at https://www.creditkarma.com/about/loan-licenses | California loans arranged pursuant to a California Financing Law license.
 
Insurance services offered through Credit Karma Insurance Services, LLC (dba Karma Insurance Services, LLC; CA resident license #0172748).

recentChanges:
• Credit Karma Tax® - Filing your state and federal tax return is 100% free from start to finish. Enjoy a streamlined, personalized filing process with Smart File and 24/7 live product support. Ready to say hooray for tax season?
• This update also fixes bugs and improves performance.
comments: Great tool to rebuild credit. Was hit by a bad financial situation years back. The app gives you access to a general estimate of your credit score which you would otherwise have to pay for at no impact. This helps you determine if and when you should apply for a new loan. It also gives you tips on how to raise your score. At first I thought the sponsored credit cards were a scam. Fees and high interest. But I wasn't getting access to credit another way so think of it as an investment.

This app has really helped me improve my credit. I have used it to dispute several items on my credit report AND QON. I have used the suggestion that it gave to improve and my score has improved. It's only been less than 2 months and I have seen improvements. I will continue using this app but I will also be using this app for my daughter. I want her to know her score and keep up with her information.

I never new I needed this app but it is amazing and I love it, easy to use, teaches you and helps you with raising your credit. I'm close to excellent credit! It feels amazing, if I'd had known sooner about how important credit is and how to manage it I would have download the app sooner. It would have helped me immensely.

I absolutely LOVE Credit Karma!!! It is so easy to use, and it tells me EVERYTHING that I need to know about my credit. It notifies me when there is any change at all to my report. Also, it provides numerous credit card offers and odds for approval... as well as personal loans, and more. It's PERFECT!!! Thank you so much for this app!!! ❤️🙏

Very helpful app. Provides you with your credit scores, tells you how to improve them, helps dispute marks on your credit report if needed, and alerts you to any suspicious or so fraudulent activity on any of your accounts. Also provides links for new cards and personal loans that may be within your credit range if you're looking to pay off high interest rate cards.

title: Capital One® Mobile
description:
Capital One Mobile lets you manage your credit cards, bank accounts, home and auto loans anywhere, anytime, from one place on your Android device. Check account balances, pay bills, view payment activity and transaction details, set up notifications — and lots more.

Access your accounts lightning-fast by using Fingerprint or SureSwipe®, personalize your app with a greeting name and profile picture — even check and monitor your credit score for free with CreditWise®. Also, you can now monitor your Credit Card purchases in real time with Instant Purchase Notifications. Get all the details you need anytime your card is used to make a purchase – just an extra layer of security!

Plus, you can:

• Use Zelle℠ to securely send money to friends and family
• View and export statements
• Redeem rewards for statement credit
• Transfer money & deposit checks
• Make auto and home loan payments
• Activate a credit or debit card
• Report fraud

To access all the features available on Capital One Mobile for Android, you must be running Android 4.1 or above on your device.

Need more info about permissions? Capital One Mobile for AndroidTM needs to access certain features of your phone to allow you to get the most out of our app. Learn More!

Enjoy!

Your security is important to us. We use industry standard practices to protect and maintain the privacy and security of your information online and in our app.

© 2019 Capital One and Capital One's family of companies, including Capital One Bank (USA), N.A., and Capital One, N.A., Members FDIC

To read about the Terms of your download, check out the End User License Agreement.

summary: Capital One® Mobile
recentChanges: Thanks for using Capital One Mobile. We make regular updates to our app to ensure your mobile banking experience is top notch. Each new version of our app includes improvements to make it faster and more reliable, bug fixes and new features which we'll highlight here so you know what's new!
comments: For the past (almost) year I've been trying to update my personal info on the app and it hasn't let me due to it having errors. Even called in for customer support and they were minimal help. And I often lose access to the capability of checking the update of my credit score. Was able to check it a week (or so) ago but can't see it again for some strange reason. I've checked the app store to see of this app needs an update and there aren't any updates required for it. Completely dissatisfied.

This app is very easy to use! This is my first credit card as I was raised not to buy anything if you can't pay for it in cash, but quickly learning that credit is more important than I was taught! I'm not confident that the credit score they say is mine, is accurate. I want to pay with a debit card but they won't allow it. Also my score dropped 60 points in one week because I used this card for $100, TO BUILD CREDIT! If I get penalized for using this to build credit again I will cancel it!!!!!

Great app and easy to use. I greatly appreciate the functionality of this app, and how I cannot only make payments, but can temporarily suspend my card when I cant find it, or shut it down completely if need be. Moreover, everything is current concerning my balances and when my next payment is due. Also, I feel secure with my pers. info. on my device knowing that you log me out of the app automatically when I havet been active within a few minutes.Great app Capital One I really mean that.

In general, app works well. My biggest complaint is regarding mobile deposits, which require photo of front and back of check, and input of memo, but app does not provide the photos or memo when reviewing activity (nor desktop website). This has created problems for us when 2 deposits of same amount on same day were made and only 1 shows up in activity. We can't tell which one we need to resubmit. Furthermore, the chat never works and no other means of questioning the deposit is provided.

Perfect app! Charges post instantly,,even those pending process; my bank should take note. You can also turn any card (as well as cards given to authorized users) off & then on again w/out going through the mess following the use of "report lost/stolen card" feature. Chose that, you end up having to set up an entire new card, wait to receive in mail, etc. CapOne's feature allows you to switch it off (in the event you've misplaced it), then use the app to allow usage again once found. Perfect!!

title: Experian - Free Credit Report & FICO® Score
description:
Get your FREE Experian Credit Report & FICO® Score* – anytime, anywhere! Checking your own report doesn’t hurt your credit, and there’s no credit card required. And now, for the first time, you can raise your FICO Score instantly with Experian Boost™. You’ll get the extra credit you deserve with the utility and cell phone bills you’re already paying.

See what's helping or hurting your FICO® Score, learn how your credit report impacts your score and interact with your credit in a completely re-imagined way. Always be in the know with credit monitoring and alerts that notify you when key changes to your Experian Credit Report & FICO Score occur.

Plus, take advantage of Experian CreditMatch™ to find better credit cards and apply with confidence thanks to matches based on your FICO® Score.

KEY FEATURES:

FREE FICO® SCORE*^
• Track your FICO Score and see which financial behaviors are helping or hurting.
• Automatically updates every 30 days upon sign-in.

FREE CREDIT REPORT
• Better understand the kind of information lenders see – like credit accounts, inquiries and public records.
• Automatically updates every 30 days upon sign-in.

EXPERIAN BOOST**
• Connect your accounts to increase your FICO® Score instantly. 
• Look better to lenders and save money by qualifying for better rates and offers.

 EXPERIAN CREDITMATCH***
• See credit card matches based on your FICO® Score.
• Compare your best options and make your choice.

CREDIT MONITORING & ALERTS
• now when your FICO® Score changes, new accounts are opened in your name or new inquiries appear on your credit report.
• Push notifications send alerts directly to your device.
 
CREDIT AT-A-GLANCE
• Easily see a breakdown of your accounts.
• Use the Credit Summary wheel to see the five key elements that make up your FICO® Score.


ABOUT EXPERIAN
Experian is the first company and credit bureau to offer online credit reporting services in the U.S. We’re now the leading provider of credit data and services with credit information on approximately 220 million U.S. consumers and more than 1.5 petabytes of data. We empower consumers to manage and improve their financial status, while helping protect against fraud and identity theft. Experian is deeply committed to educating consumers through financial literacy and funding programs, working with non-profit and public education leaders across the country.

comments: It's OK except that every single time you log in online it shows a page where you can sign up to become a paying member and how great a service it would be to be fully protected from scammers and such. The service they offer is minimal and it sends an email when it detects a change in your credit. The FICO score and Credit Report are free so it's not that bad. The app just takes up extra space on your phone and that page (very annoying) still shows up. They should include it in the menu.

I did what this app told me to do. It says I don't have enough credit history and i look risky to lenders. You need 5 credit card types .then it picked out what was best matched for me with my score and how i spend already etc ,etc.. I was denied on the first 2 and my score just dropped 18 points immediately. I didn't even bother trying anymore. I didnt even want too in the first place but was told this would help me out. Yeah right.

I keep having sign in problems. I have had to change my password 3 times. I changed it last night. Got in fine a minute ago, when to log back in after closing out and it's not accepting the SAME password. I have even tried all my other passwords just in case and retyped the known password 3 times. I'm getting very frustrated with this app. I didn't pay 20 bucks a month for a service I can't use.

Since last app update, cannot log in, at all. Password text box won't even accept the cursor. Update 3/17/20: you did it, again! Broke the app. Nothing on the login screen is clickable. Un/reinstalling the app does NOT fix it. 😡 Yes, I already emailed you at the address, below. Still awaiting a reply... Oh, good! Glad to hear you are working on a solution.

How long is the website/App going to keep having "technical" issues? For the past 3 weeks I have been trying to verify bills on my account to boost my credit score, but every time I do it; all I get is  "Uh oh…We had an issue connecting. The team is looking into it. Please try again later" I may have to uninstall from my phone if it continues like this

title: TurboTax Tax Return App – Max Refund Guaranteed
description:
Snap. Tap. Done. Snap a photo of your W-2 or 1099-MISC, answer simple questions about your life, and e-file securely from your mobile device. Free to start, pay only when you file. TurboTax coaches you every step of the way and automatically double-checks as you go, so you can be confident your taxes are done right. Join the millions who file taxes with the TurboTax mobile app – free to file for simple tax returns1. 

KEY FEATURES
• $0 Fed. $0 State. $0 to File your simple tax returns. 
• Start for free - pay only when you file your tax return or pay for TurboTax using your federal tax refund. Fees apply.2
• Connect online with Real CPAs or EAs for unlimited tax advice and even a line-by-line review, so you can be 100% confident it's done right.
• Maximum Refund Guaranteed - On Average $3,284
• Get your taxes done right anytime from anywhere. Seamlessly switch between any device and securely pick up right where you left off when it's convenient for you.
• Snap. Tap. Done. Driver’s License or State ID scan + W-2 Snap and Autofill + 1099-MISC
• Up to a 50% head start on your taxes with year-over-year data transfer of your prior TurboTax return
• CompleteCheck™ – Get the green light to file. Before you file, CompleteCheck™ will run an in-depth scan of your return and guide you through any final changes so you don’t miss a thing with accuracy guaranteed.
• Push notifications - We'll make it easy to stay informed about your e-file return status with notifications sent straight to your phone or tablet
• Face ID, Touch ID and Passcode - Get secure access on your mobile device using the latest technology.

See full disclosure and disclaimers here: https://turbotax.intuit.com/corp/mobile-apps/turbotax-disclosures/
1TurboTax Free Guarantee – $0 Federal + $0 State + $0 To File offer is available for simple tax returns with TurboTax Free Edition; offer may change or end at any time without notice. A simple tax return is Form 1040 only, without schedules 1, 2, or 3.
2TurboTax pricing is based on your tax situation and varies by product. Actual prices are determined at the time of print or e-file and are subject to change without notice. Special discount offers may not be valid for mobile in-app purchases.

Offer details and disclosures for Refund Advance program, visit:  https://turbotax.intuit.com/refund-advance/

Learn how Intuit protects your privacy, visit: https://security.intuit.com/privacy

comments: I used Turbo tax for the very first time i done my taxes by myself. It was a little harder that i expected but i got it done. Having to wait now because i didnt print them off right away ( i used my cellphone to file instead of computer) , it said it needed some kind of attached voucher when i printed it off. I ended up calling DOR and they gave me a number to put in the memo. Still waiting for my return and that means still waiting to purchase diff vehicle.... :((

The app cost $150 for what I can get everywhere else for less than $20. Plus the app has become cumbersome and deceptive, with adds after every section. I used TurboTax for years but no more. The response I got was a form response and doesn't remove any fees. In fact it only highlighted their deceptive fee practices. I want to be clear that the service I required that took my bill to $150 was the form for my student loan repayment. I used another service and it was free.

I would gladly recommend TurboTax, but not the app. This year I used the app instead of filing on a computer like I normally do. I was not happy with the app. It made the experience much more stressful by randomly saving and forcing you to go back to the beginning of a section and only to click through everything all over again and to add insult to injury, it repeatedly throws an upgrade for some Max service each time it makes you restart. I'll keep using TurboTax, but just not the app.

The real free version is hidden! If you make less then like 60k, you qualify for a truly free version. The app will ask you pay (and not show the IRS free file option) if you have one of the many pretty common tax situations. The IRS free file version through tubo tax is through there web interface ONLY and it's far inferior to the app. You can, however, start on the app and when it tells you to pay, you can convert using the web version and continue with the info you already entered.

This is my 4th year using TurboTax and I have no complaints so far! Its Simple, they help you along the way. They double, triple check at times and they are reasonable on prices for filing electronically. This to me is the cherry on top, or strawberry whatever your preference!!! Its much better than those liberty, H&R etc. Places. The convenience alone is worth it. I don't have to travel to file or receive my money. A+

title: IRS2Go
description:
Check your refund status, make a payment, find free tax preparation assistance, sign up for helpful tax tips, generate a login security code, and follow the latest news from the IRS - all in the latest version of IRS2Go.

Download IRS2Go and connect with the IRS whenever you want, wherever you are.

IRS2Go is the official app of the Internal Revenue Service.



--

When installing IRS2Go, you may see a list of Android permissions that the app requests. To help you understand why we ask for certain permissions, we’ve provided a breakdown of the usage.


"Location – Uses the device’s location."
The app allows taxpayers to search for nearby Volunteer Income Tax Assistance (VITA) and the Tax Counseling for the Elderly (TCE) locations, which offer free tax help for taxpayers who qualify.

"Phone – Uses one or more of: phone, call log."
The app allows users to make phone calls to the IRS or VITA/TCE locations.

"Photos/Media/Files – Uses one or more of: files on the device, such as images, videos, or audio; the device’s external storage."
The Free Tax Help mapping feature uses these permissions to save map images and data to your phone's storage. This means that your phone won't need to download the same map data every time.

comments: Almost every time I try to sign in the screen does nothing. So I push the button again, and nothing happens again. I close the app down and try to sign in again nothing happens.then by the time I've turned my phone off and turned it back on the app says that I've logged into many times and my account is locked. so I do the same thing with my husband's social. And the exact same thing happens. What's the point of the app if it just locks me out when I try to use it?

This app is trash, I've been checking it daily since the end of January and it continues to tell me the same the "information does not match, please re enter your information." I know I'm putting the correct information in but still gives me the same result every day.

It worked great last year. I was able to use it one time this year now i have an incorrect information message when i put in the same info as i did the first time... Not sure how that works. 😒 waste of time and space. Fix it my rating may go up but this is unacceptable. And for all of the people calling people stupid, can you explain why it worked once and now wont work at all? I didnt start checking until the first of February, more than 24 hours after i filed and im having issues. Soooo???

Hopefully this helps, i filled my taxes on the 29th of January. Every single day, i checked on here or Turbo Tax( the service i used to fill my taxes) they didn't have an estimate on how long until i had my return or this app said error or wrong info. Until i check my debit card with turbotax today. It had my full tax return. Maybe y'all have it and just don't know it yet.

App does not work this year. Maybe it's the IRS bc they dont want to pay out, maybe it's just this app. Getting "error" or "information does not match", or "no information at this time, wait 24 hours until your refund has been recieved", which was last week. This app worked fine last year. Even the "wheres my refund" on google is not helpful this year.

title: Stash: Invest. Bank. Save.
description:
Join 4+ million people on Stash, a personal finance and investing app where you can buy stocks and funds with any dollar amount, experience banking with benefits, save and budget smarter, and learn as you go.

We offer three subscription plans: Stash Beginner, Stash Growth, and Stash+. Each plan is designed for a range of needs and goals and offers unique ways to save and invest. You can pick the plan that’s right for you, with the option to switch as your life changes.

--Transparent Pricing--

Stash Beginner ($1/mo.)**
• Includes: Personal investment account & bank account access

Stash Growth ($3/mo.)**
• Includes: Everything in Beginner + a retirement account

Stash+ ($9/mo.)**
• Includes: Everything in Growth + 2 custodial accounts, metal debit card†, 2x Stock-Back™ rewards#, & monthly market insights.

Get Your Pay Up to 2 Days Early§

All plans include access to the Stash debit card, which comes with our FDIC-insured banking account. You can get paid up to 2 days early with direct deposit. Plus, no overdraft‖, minimum balance, set-up, or hidden fees.¶

Earn Stocks & Funds As You Spend

You can use the Stash debit card to earn stocks and funds through our Stock-Back® rewards program, building a portfolio that reflects where you shop#.

Investing with any Dollar Amount

Unlike other apps, Stash lets you buy fractional shares of 200+ stocks, bonds, and ETFs—with no add-on trading commissions*. We offer personal, retirement, and custodial (for children under 18) investing accounts.

Unlimited Education

Stash Learn can help you become a finance whiz. Read investing learning guides, stay up to date on financial news, and get tips on saving, budgeting, and investing.

Automatic Saving & Investing

Auto-Stash is always included. Save spare change with Round-Ups. Save effortlessly with Smart-Stash. Or try investing regularly with Set Schedule.

*Promotion subject to T&C. Limit one cash reward per user. Promotion can't be combined w/ certain other promotions. Direct Deposit $300 in 30 day period to be eligible. See T&C: http://bit.ly/2Tedjjt 

**You’ll bear fees/expenses reflected in pricing of ETFs you invest in and may incur ancillary fees charged by Stash or its custodian not in monthly subscription price.

§ Early access to direct deposit depends on deposit verification & when Green Dot Bank gets notice from employer. May vary between pay periods.

‖ Transaction is declined. No fee charged.

¶ Other fees apply to the bank account.

# Stash Stock-Back™ Rewards is not sponsored or endorsed by Green Dot Bank, Green Dot Corporation, Visa U.S.A., or any respective affiliates. None of the foregoing has any responsibility to fulfill rewards earned in this program. T&C: https://bit.ly/2KLOqbN.

Disclosure

Debit Account Services provided by Green Dot Bank Member FDIC, pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. Investment products & services are offered by Stash Investments LLC, not Green Dot Bank, and are Not FDIC Insured, Not Bank Guaranteed, and May Lose Value. Securities offered through Apex Clearing Corporation, Member FINRA/SIPC.

For bonus offer, you accept T&C: bit.ly/2XyzcN1

Investing Involves Risk. Listed investments currently available but not representative of all. Full list: bit.ly/2XaZplv. Information shown is for illustrative/educational purposes & isn’t a recommendation. Product & company names are trademarks™ or registered® trademarks of the holder. Use does not imply affiliation with or endorsement by them. Preliminary information provided to prospective clients prior to Stash accepting a signed advisory agreement is not investment advice & should not be relied on as such. Stash Investments LLC ("Stash") is an SEC registered investment adviser. Must be 18+ to open a Stash account. Stash only available to US citizens, permanent residents & select visa types.

comments: I am a founder of stash. I joined as soon as I researched this new app and it's potential. Now after using it for over a year I can honestly say this is a GREAT tool for building wealth and saving is never a bad thing. This app walks you through step by step and educates you as you go. It also allows you to purchase fractional shares, offers great stockback and cashback promos. One acct for every financial need for a low fee. Very user friendly and good for beginners or pros. It's a win win!

Frequency of direct deposit pop ups, uncertainty of at what price stock will be bought, and long transfer time make this app very frustrating. And this is just the average experience, what happened to me is insane: Soon after opening by debit account and depositing $500, Stash inexplicably blocked it. For 2 weeks I've been requesting support to have the account unlocked and get my money back. After uploading all the additional files they requested, including ID and bank statements, they answered I should call Green Dot Corporation. In the call they said this block comes from Loss prevention so there is nothing they can do. If I want my money back, I can try contacting my bank from where the funds came and request canceling that transaction. I never though something like this could be possible. All I wanted was to try investing with this app and now I'm spending all this time trying to get my money back.

Awesome app. Great for beginners wanting to learn about investing as well as seasoned vets. Their FB page group is one of the most respectful and helpful bunch of ppl I've met online thus far. The only reason I didn't rate five stars is there are still some small glitches myself and others are experiencing from time to time. So there is a little room for improvement, but these are minor compared to the extensive and expansive options this app offer's, along with a strong support FB group.

DON'T GET STASH!! They locked my already-existing account months ago for no reason. Made me jump through hoops to unlock it (uploading docs). The upload page didn't work. Support is awful; once they hung up on me. I was told to email the docs. I did. Nothing. When I call, they say they need more docs or more time to review them. (Why?) I just sent my ss card and they're saying the res is bad, but higher res won't email. Excuses! I still have no access to my portfolio at all and no recourse.

I do like the round up features and simplicity of everything. Really can't stand the hard push for the debit card and other ads though. Also, it's a paid service, but there's ads.., does that make sense? If you want to learn about investing and plug extra cash into investments on a small scale to start, then this is a decent app. *With some brokerages not charging fees Stash gets kinda expensive in comparison if you fancy yourself serious.*

title: Wells Fargo Mobile
description:
Simplify your life and stay in control with the Wells Fargo Mobile® App. Manage your finances; make check deposits, transfer funds, and pay bills, all within the app. 

Manage Your Accounts
• Quickly access your accounts with Fingerprint Sign On¹ (smartphones only)
• View key account information without having to login with FastLook 
• Review activity and balances in your accounts
• View your credit card transactions and manage your rewards program
• Easily activate or replace credit/debit cards

summary: Wells Fargo Mobile allows you to access your investment and bank accounts.
recentChanges: Minor Performance improvements and bug fixes
comments: It does everything I need except it won't allow screen shots for "security policy" reasons. This prevents having proof of scheduled payments or terms of an agreement when making a payment commitment. Means I have to type confirmation numbers etc instead of taking a picture of the final screen. It's just a picture of the agreement! - NO security or account data is shown. Should be MY choice not Wells Fargo's. And no explanation is available. I'm forced to research other banks online banking now.

It's a problem when I'm in the middle of using the app and it then says that my session has expired even though I haven't left it alone for even 10 seconds. It's also annoying that when I login to the app it says "Welcome back, here's when you last logged in" and I then have to tap to get to my account. My previous bank app after login would take me straight to my account to see my balance, I sometimes just need to know my balance and don't have the time to wait for it to load an extra screen.

My experience was absolutely AAA rating. The young lady explained how to deposit my check by taking a photo of it which I've never done before & I'm a 63 year old lady and always come into the bank to deposit my check. I don't put it thru the ATM because I don't trust it, but because of coronavirus I am on quarantine & my daughter tried to deposit it thru the ATM and it wouldn't accept. Because I need my money but I did not want to go against my quarantine she helped me tremendously. Thx's 👍

This app is so frustrating trying to find information. You cant even get customer service using this app. I tried finding my routing number on my app cause i wasn't home so i had to call customer service just for that information. You guys need to make your app more user friendly and have more information so that we don't have to waste our time and your employees time with the small things like a routing number.
I love the app. I can pay my bills , check everything . The only thing is that when I want to send money to another coutry can't do it from the app. I have to log on computer. Overall very happy.

title: Bank of America Mobile Banking
description:
Bank conveniently and securely with the Bank of America® Mobile Banking app for U.S.-based accounts.

Manage Your Bank Accounts and Finances
• Review activity and balances in checking, savings and credit card accounts
• View mortgage, auto loan and other account balances 
• Activate or replace credit/debit cards
• Order checks
• Set app alerts to be notified of important account info

Mobile Money Transfer
• Securely send and receive money with Zelle® using a mobile number or email address¹
• Transfer funds between your Bank of America accounts 

Mobile Bill Pay
• Schedule/edit/cancel payments
• Pay eBills
• Add/edit Pay To accounts
 
Mobile Check Deposit
• Simply take photos of checks to deposit them 
• Immediately see the processing deposit in your account²

Erica, Your Virtual Financial Assistant³
• Ask Erica to find transactions, pay bills and more
• Get valuable alerts, helpful insights and financial guidance

Contact Us Easily
• Quickly reach a representative for help or questions with your accounts
• Schedule an appointment to meet with a specialist
• Find ATMs and financial centers

Special Offers & Deals
• Get cash back with BankAmeriDeals® when you use your eligible Bank of America credit/debit cards
• Get exclusive credit card offers	

Help Stay Secure
• Change Online ID or Passcode 
• Set up fingerprint sign-in to securely sign in
• If fraudulent activity is suspected on your debit or credit card, we'll notify you
• With our Mobile Banking Security Guarantee, you’re not liable for fraudulent transactions when reported promptly⁴

See the Online Banking Service Agreement at bankofamerica.com/serviceagreement for more information. Mobile carrier message and data rates may apply.

¹ Transfers require enrollment and must be made from a Bank of America consumer checking or savings account to a domestic bank account or debit card. Recipients have 14 days to register to receive money or the transfer will be canceled. Dollar and frequency limits apply.                                      
² Deposits are subject to verification and not available for immediate withdrawal. Other restrictions may apply. 
³ Erica only listens or speaks when you tap the microphone and retains interactions to optimize your experience. Erica speaks aloud and hears and responds to all voices, so consider where you interact by voice. 
⁴ You’re not liable for fraudulent Mobile Banking transactions when you notify the bank within 60 days of the transaction first appearing on your statement and comply with security responsibilities.
 
Zelle and the Zelle related marks are wholly owned by Early Warning Services, LLC and are used herein under license.

FICO is a registered trademark of Fair Isaac Corporation.

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.

Bank of America and related trademarks are trademarks of Bank of America Corporation
Bank of America, N.A. Member FDIC
© 2019 Bank of America Corporation

summary: View balances, make transfers, deposit checks with the Bank of America App.
recentChanges:
New features include:
• When you get a new card, Erica reminds you which companies have it on file so you can update your info
• Preferred Rewards members will now get an expanded view of their savings in My Rewards
• Minor improvements and bug fixes

We’re listening – how are we doing?
comments: Changes to the budget/spending is horrible. Where once there were more categories to track spending, now there are fewer. This section is very confusing. Before, I could view the transactions under each category and each category amount were totaled. Now, the changes made have only created confusion, frustration and now lacks the information I need to access in a simple, concise way. Please return to the previous version of Spending/Budget. This one stinks

Great app. I use it a lot, especially for depositing checks. However I noticed a bug introduced not too long ago. When depositing a check, right after I take a photo of the check, there is a pretty high chance that the app will either restart or going back to login screen again. I am not 100% sure if this has anything to do with the automatic orientation change as I am using a phone (Samsung S5 with OS 6.0.1)

It's nice to have, keeps me updated on my accounts is not pushy like other apps, was and still some time difficult to figure out, the AI does help but is limited on the assistance available it has improved since I first started using the app. Thank you BfA Update: The app has improved quite a bit since the last time I posted a comment. The AI is better with the assistance. It's still some learning but easier then in the past.

Very frustrated with this app. Was charged multiple return check fees because my new bank account number wasn't correctly recorded one time. Tried to fix via phone, made the correction and resubmitted payment and was assured my information was updated online. Then, received a late fee, again. When I requested it be removed, was informed that "the systems aren't linked." Despite being told multiple times that my information would be updated and that I wouldn't be charged a fee again.

Great app but still can correct a major flaw. The issue has been ongoing and I'm surprised it hasn't been addressed since it's a serious one. Notifications of withdrawals, deposits, etc, are coming in two hours after the fact. I have done everything to try to correct it but it still persists. Two of my friends that also have the app are experiencing the flaw. This isn't good in the event your account is tampered with. I have a credit one app that notifies me as soon as card is used.

title: Chase Mobile
description:
Bank from almost anywhere with the Chase Mobile® app. Manage your accounts, pay bills, pay people, deposit checks, even transfer money. And do it all safely and securely with your device.
 
Manage Your Accounts

[+] View your account balance at Sign in using Account Preview.
[+] Monitor your checking, savings, credit card or J.P. Morgan investment activities.
[+] Set up travel notifications for your debit and credit cards.
[+] Set up Account Alerts and adjust your preferences.
[+] Use Chase QuickDeposit® to deposit a check just by taking a photo.
[+] Check and get updates on your credit score.
[+] Access your personal Chase Home Lending dashboard for ways to make the most of homeownership.

Make Payments and Transfer   

[+] Schedule, edit or cancel payments for your Chase credit card and your other bills.
[+] Send and request money using Chase QuickPay® with Zelle® 
[+] Transfer money between your Chase accounts.
[+] Reload your Chase Liquid® prepaid card.
[+] Send wire transfers.

Offers and Deals 

[+] Track and redeem your rewards with Chase Ultimate Rewards®.  
[+] Send friends and family a digital gift card.
[+] Earn statement credit by using Chase Offers with your eligible credit and debit cards. 
[+] Grow your savings automatically with Autosave.

Manage Your Investments with J.P. Morgan 

[+] Trade stocks, bonds, mutual funds and exchange-traded funds (ETFs) with a You Invest℠ by JPMorgan Trade account.
[+] Let the expertise and technology of J.P. Morgan design and manage a portfolio for you with a You Invest℠ Portfolios account.  

Connect with Chase 

[+] Find the nearest Chase branches and ATMs. 
[+] Speak with a service representative 24/7. 

Disclosure

[+] Some features are available for eligible customers and accounts only. Any time you review your balance, keep in mind it may not reflect all transactions including recent debit card transactions or checks you have written. A qualifying Chase transfer account is required to transfer funds via text. 
[+] There is no charge from Chase, but message and data rates may apply. Such charges include those from your communications service provider. Delivery of alerts may be delayed for various reasons, including service outages affecting your phone, wireless or internet provider; technology failures; and system capacity limitations. 
[+] You Invest℠ is a business of J.P. Morgan Securities LLC offering self-directed brokerage (You Invest Trade) and investment advisory services (You Invest Portfolios). Investment products and services, including brokerage and advisory accounts, are offered through J.P. Morgan Securities LLC, member FINRA and SIPC. J.P. Morgan Securities LLC and JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A. are affiliate companies under the common control of JPMorgan Chase & Co.

INVESTMENT PRODUCTS:

  • NOT A DEPOSIT
  • NOT FDIC INSURED
  • NO BANK GUARANTEE
  • MAY LOSE VALUE

[+] Android is a registered trademark of Google Inc. 
[+] Deposit products provided by JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A. Member FDIC
[+] Equal Opportunity Lender

comments: I absolutely love banking with Chase through their mobile app. The nearest Chase bank is about 223 miles away, so I bank completely online. It was a hassle at first finding what ATMs I could use. Currently with the job I have, I deposit my check through their mobile app. Within minutes or possibly an hour, the check may be available for bills or personal use. I can not guarantee that someone would have the same experience I did, yet I enjoy banking with chase.

This makes so much easier than calling and checking acct over the phone. And to send funds to my partner using zelle. So much easier. But difficult to get back in using another device. But eventually was able to get back into my account. And getting the alerts an notifications right on my phone. And esp. Not able to go to the nearest bank for assistants.

App doesn't send money and shuts down!!🤬😡 Don't know what you've done with the latest update however when I try to send that money the app automatically closes. If I try to transfer money the app closes. this app used to work beautifully I have uninstalled / reinstalled and I'm still getting the same issues. If I need to send money I simply cannot do it. I have to wait until I get home to my computer to send money which sucks. It's not as reliable as a fuse to be

The app is good and resourceful. My suggestion to the developers is work on the sign-in section for multiple sign-in accounts. Currently, it is time consuming. It would not allow you to use biometrics for more than one account. Maybe check other apps that do well here, such as Instagram and Capital One.

It's been a great app, but recently the rewards, credit journey, even feedback pages do not load. The screen remains white. I tried clearing cache, deleting data, but it didn't work. I then tried deleting and reinstalling the app, it worked once, but now it is back to a blank white screen. Please fix your app! And please don't tell me to send a secure message by logging into the site. This is an app problem, period.

title: Google Pay: Pay with your phone and send cash
description:
Google Pay is the fast, simple way to pay online, in apps, and in stores. Plus, send money to friends, split bills, and cash in on loyalty and rewards – all without your wallet.

Pay in stores with your Android phone
• Add a credit or debit card from your bank or link your PayPal account in the app
• Make safe, secure mobile payments – your card details are encrypted before they’re shared with stores
• Speed through checkout at nearby stores and anywhere contactless payments are accepted

Pay on the web and in apps
• Shop online without re-entering all of your payment information at checkout
• Pay fast in Android apps without adding a credit or debit card
• Keep payment info safe in your Google Account

Keep your information safe and secure
• Google Pay protects your payment info with multiple layers of advanced security
• Your card details aren’t shared when you pay with your Android phone in stores
• Receive the same purchase protection you get with your bank or PayPal account

Send cash and split the bill
• Send and request money in the app or in Gmail and Android Messages
• Use a debit card to transfer money directly to your bank account – no need to cash out
• Request cash from up to five friends at once
• Tap on a recent purchase in the app to split the bill

Access loyalty cards, offers, and more on your smart phone
• Find your loyalty program, rewards program, or offer in the app to add your card
• Make shopping more rewarding – even if you forget your wallet
• Some stores might even send you reminders to use your cards when you arrive, so you can make the most of your rewards

Save event tickets, transit cards, and boarding passes
• Access tickets and passes right from your mobile phone
• Get there fast without digging for your wallet

Manage your payment info online or in-app
• Your payment methods are synced with your Google Account, so you won’t have to update your information twice


Google Pay is available on all non-rooted Android devices (Lollipop 5.0+).

Still have questions? Head over to https://support.google.com/googlepay.
