summary: The fast, simple way to pay with Google
developerAddress: 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View 94043
recentChanges:
• Send or request money in the app’s new Send tab. Plus, tap on any recent purchase to conveniently split the bill with up to five friends at once.
• Store your loyalty cards, offers, and even tickets and boarding passes in the new Passes tab
• Easily manage the cards saved to your Google Account
comments: Of all of the money sending and receiving apps that we have, this one is by far the easiest to use and anyone can do it. So most people who have Android phones already have a Google smelt so it's really easy to send or receive money. Also there aren't any weird fees where they take a percentage of your money like most of these apps.

Ive only been using this app for about 8 months now, and I have to say I FREAKING HIGHLY advise you to download this app. I have lost my debit card ATLEAST 3x since having this app, and it is super easy, and does not cause me to panic when I loose my card in my home (cause im a clumsy idiot). Now the only thing I wish is that paying friends through Google Pay was easier cause it literally took me 30 mins to figure out how to. And I still am not fully grasp on the idea. But otherwise, AWESOME!

Thanks for adding an option for loyalty cards storage. Could you please add editable fields for the cards like Notes or something where you would be able to save PIN-codes and other info about your cards (yes, sometimes loyalty cards have PINs). Also most cards look the same (except for well-known global brands like Adidas). Hope they will have the desing of physical ones in the future. Or at least add an option to change colors.

Yes it works, I can use it to pay. But its security system doesn't work. I have tried multiple times to setup a pin/password/fingerprint security and it never worked. So does it work? I guess so. But does it work as a secure payment system/tool? No, it's a big fat NOOOO!

Great app when it's working. I have 2 different cards set up in my Google pay app, both are contactless cards. Without any sort of logic, they both disappear from my profile after a couple of days and I have to go through the whole process of adding them and setting up contactless payments. Very inconvenient when you try to make a payment and when you get your phone to the terminal a message shows up "set up contactless"

title: Western Union: International Money Transfers, 24/7
description:
Easy to Send, Simple to Receive.

Send money 24/7, easily view exchange rates, and quickly repeat transfers all from The WU® App.

Download the Western Union® money transfer app and start sending cash worldwide today!

Send money with a few taps and pay for it with your card or start a transfer and complete the payment in cash at a nearby agent location. Your family and friends can receive the money in their bank account, mobile wallet or pick up the cash at more than 500,000 locations in over 200 countries and territories.

SEND MONEY ON THE GO
• Transfer money 24/7, virtually anywhere you have your phone
• Check currency exchange rates* 
• Scan your debit and credit cards1 for quick setup – less typing, less mistakes
• Start a money transfer on the app and pay in cash at an agent location 
• Reach billions of bank accounts worldwide
• Send cash to over 500,000 international locations
• Quick-login with Touch ID

MANAGE YOUR TRANSACTIONS
• Track transfers on your phone
• Look up nearby agent locations
• Set up repeat transfers for your family and friends
• Pay bills to thousands of companies within in The WU(R) App
• See past or pending transactions
• Update and change account details

Western Union also makes money from currency exchange. When choosing a money transmitter, carefully compare both transfer fees and exchange rates. Fees, foreign exchange rates and taxes may vary by brand, channel, and location based on a number of factors. Fees and rates subject to change without notice.*

^Card issuer cash advance fee and associated interest charges may apply. Use a debit card to avoid these fees and charges.

Services may be provided by Western Union Financial Services, Inc. NMLS# 906983 and/or Western Union International Services, LLC NMLS# 906985.  See terms and conditions for details.

• Quick-login with Touch ID

MANAGE YOUR TRANSACTIONS
• Track transfers on your phone
• Look up nearby agent locations
• Set up repeat transfers for your family and friends
• Pay bills to thousands of companies within in The WU(R) App
• See past or pending transactions
• Update and change account details

Western Union also makes money from currency exchange. When choosing a money transmitter, carefully compare both transfer fees and exchange rates. Fees, foreign exchange rates and taxes may vary by brand, channel, and location based on a number of factors. Fees and rates subject to change without notice.*

^Card issuer cash advance fee and associated interest charges may apply. Use a debit card to avoid these fees and charges.

Services may be provided by Western Union Financial Services, Inc. NMLS# 906983 and/or Western Union International Services, LLC NMLS# 906985. See terms and conditions for details.
summary: Send cash abroad & make payments on the go. WU is easy to use, quick & secure.
recentChanges:
Thanks for your feedback. We’ve listened and made improvements to the WU app.

What’s new:
- Bug fixes
comments: I've been using it from over an year and it's the most user-friendly app available right now for money transfer and gives the best conversion rate most of the time. The best part is that I've been getting instant transfers from the last 5 months without an extra fee for which you get charged on other similar apps. It has become my go to app for the transfers. Love it!!

It seems like there's always a problem. It either says that my address doesn't match or it wants me to enter another card. Calling "C.S." doesn't help. I don't like waiting for 45 minutes to an hour for someone who doesn't speak clear English. I'm very tired of WU garbage. It's time to look for a better way to send cash. I guess my friend and her family can go without rice/food until the quarantine is over. That's only a month. Thanks Western Union you really suck!!!

I found international transfers difficult and confusing at first. But now, having established regular friendships and having their info in this app? It is so easy to send them funds, and easy for them to pick up...And with the World in crisis now? I am so glad I can help them. Every little bit helps!!

This app says that you can have money sent to your bank account and offered a promo code. But, the app itself did not have recieving money as an option not did it have transferring money to your bank account an option either. Also, when I wanted to put in verification to pick up money, it kept saying there were "Technical issues. Try again later ".

The app is exceptional I have never had a problem with it and if I have any questions customer support is always there for meI highly recommend it to anyone that is going to send money anywhere in the US or overseas the only thing that I don't like about it is when they make that long speech about getting ripped off other than that it's a great app

title: Albert: Save and Spend Smarter
description:
YOUR FRIEND IN FINANCE
Combining human guidance with cutting-edge technology, Albert automates your financial life — so you can be free to enjoy it. Build savings, meet bills, end the overspending cycle and develop your financial IQ, right from the palm of your hand.

Download now to see why Forbes, Huffington Post, The New York Times and others have recommended Albert.

INVEST FROM ANYWHERE
Take your money to the next level with Albert Investments. Even if you have zero experience, you can put your money to work with commission-free investments.

Let Albert customize an automatic, diversified portfolio for you or mix and match to build your own.

SAVING GOALS IN REACH
Whether you want to pay off debt or book a dream vacation, Albert puts your goals in reach with automatic savings. We identify dollars you won't miss throughout the week, then set them aside for what's important.

GENIUS ADVICE + HUMAN WISDOM
Meet Albert Genius: a revolutionary feature offering guidance from our team of financial experts, or "geniuses."

Our geniuses are real people, not bots, with knowledge that covers most financial areas. They work alongside the app to improve your financial health and provide personalized advice.

Questions about investment plans? Meeting your bills? Paying off credit cards? Send us a text and we'll get to work.

Some topics our geniuses cover: Budgeting • Credit cards • College savings • Insurance • Investments • Debt • Retirement • Student loans

ALWAYS WORKING FOR YOU
We work in the background to spot unfamiliar charges, find extra savings and identify bills to lower. We send smart alerts in real-time, putting an end to financial surprises so you can stay on top of your money.

PRAISE FROM THE PRESS
⁃ “The Albert app provides a personalized savings account and can look at car insurance policies and credit cards to find better deals. Banks are racing to catch up with such digital advances." — NEW YORK TIMES

⁃ "Dying for an app that takes the math out of budgeting? Albert would be the best choice for you." — FORBES

⁃ "For a clear picture of where my spending is going, access to advice and suggestions for where to improve, I’ll definitely stick with Albert." — HUFFINGTON POST

FEATURES
• A custom financial plan
• Our on-demand support team of real financial geniuses
• Albert Savings: the cutting-edge feature created to help reach your goals faster
• Albert Investments: our commission-free service that helps anyone become an investor
• Smart alerts for rising bills, bank fees and new subscription charges
• Automatic account syncing puts all your finances in one clean interface
• Thousands of supported U.S. financial institutions
• 24-7 account monitoring for fraud and fees

SECURITY
• Your peace of mind is our highest priority.
• Albert uses cutting-edge technology to protect your most sensitive information.

INSURANCE
• Funds in your Albert Savings account are FDIC-insured. Should anything happen to the member bank or company holding your savings, you'll be insured for up to $250,000 of your money in the account.

• Funds in your Albert Investments account are SIPC-protected. This is a more limited protection against the loss of securities and cash held at a member firm up to $500,000 in the event the firm fails. This does not protect the securities you own from going down in value if the market changes.

Albert Investments, LLC is a Registered Investment Advisor. Albert can only offer investment services to clients where Albert and its representatives are properly licensed. The content posted is solely to inform. Investments are risky: you could lose money, and past performance is no guarantee of future returns. Albert is only available to U.S. residents who are 18+. For more information, see our Form ADV Part II and our Terms of Use at albert.com.

recentChanges:
Your Genius just got a bit smarter: introducing Albert Investments!
• No matter your budget or experience, put your money to work with our commission-free guided investing service.
• Select and manage your own funds. Or, tell us about your goals and receive a Genius portfolio customized to your profile in minutes.
• And, don’t miss the interactive Genius tab. Get help with the financial topics you care about most.
• As always, enjoy our latest handful of tweaks and bug fixes.
comments: So far, so good! I've received my advanced after being asked a bunch of questions including asking your SSN just letting you know. They do ask that you put back at least $1 for what they call a rainy day fund which is withdrawn from your account attached monthly as well. I have not however used the Gold feature of the app, which actually asks that you expend more money to interact with that and I don't need that feature anyway.

Bank balance updates are a little slow but I love having all my accounts monitored in one place. I keep track of my student loans and credit cards. Also the investing portion has been working out well. It's simple, easy and great for me to get some experience playing around in the stock market.

Loving it already. Day one and I've already switched my car insurance because of the app's insurance comparing tool. I have a clear idea of what I spend on (bills/non essentials) and where I can save. I feel productive and set up for success.

Just give me the money on my prepaid debit cards until I get an actual bank debit card. I will spend as I want to spend. But this app could keep track of it all in a cute funny way. Lol good like better for me. I want to have my money already in my ears in my eyes like so to move on and a way for it to always get to me Real fast and easy.

Im so upset. I tryed this app thinking it was lime dave and it is really not! They charge you right from the start. They wont let you get to the main menu untill you pay. They take money from your real account and put it into their own account. So they can take my money and are all in my bank and i cant get out of it or cancle it in anyway. I feel like i just got scammed and now they wont answer me.. Someone please help me.

title: GEICO Mobile - Car Insurance
description:
Life is full of lane changes. Some expected. Some not as much. No problem, because The GEICO mobile app is here to lend a hand if you ever need a quote, policy update, tow, or you just need to change your address. Now, when life changes lanes we’ll be right there because we’re always headed in your direction.
Not to toot our own horn but we’re the #1 Insurance Mobile App. Find out why below.
 
FEATURES
 
DIGITAL ID CARDS
The days of rummaging through your wallet, past expired gym memberships and old receipts to find your insurance ID cards are over. Now they’re always easy to access right on your phone. 
 
BILL PAY 
Now you don’t have to slow your roll to pay or manage your bill. The GEICO mobile app makes paying on the go a piece of cake, or slice of pie or whatever dessert you’re into. 
 
ROADSIDE ASSISTANCE
No one likes being stranded in the middle of nowhere – or even in the middle of somewhere. The GEICO mobile app lets you tap for a tow anyplace, anytime.
 
SUBMIT AND MANAGE YOUR CLAIM
Let’s be real - claims aren’t fun. A fender bender, crash or broken windshield can all be nerve-racking. That's why GEICO Mobile makes it easy to file and manage a claim.
KATE – YOUR VIRTUAL ASSISTANT
Ever wish you had a teeny tiny person in your pocket that you could ask questions about your policy, billing or more? Us too. So just ask Kate, GEICO’s Virtual Assistant.
 
VEHICLE CARE
Vehicles need tender loving care too. That’s why we make it so easy to get your car serviced, find out about recall alerts, and even get maintenance reminders. It’s like a hug for your car.
 
GEICO EXPLORE – AUGMENTED REALITY
With GEICO Explore, you can augment your world like a futuristic robot by customizing the types of places you want to see. Find restaurants, gas stations, parks, even your own car!

NOTE: To log into your account from GEICO Mobile, your GEICO policy must:
- Be an active auto or motorcycle policy
- Not be subject to other policy restrictions

summary: Car Insurance Made For You.
recentChanges:
GEICO Mobile just went from awesome to SUPER awesome. This release is rolling out a new look and feel that you're going to love at first tap. Check out what’s new:
+Always up to date, our new Dashboard has your most important policy tasks waiting for you
+Access ID cards, roadside help, and billing from our new Quick Actions
+Navigate with ease from billing, claims, and policy details with our new bottom navigation
+Access all of your GEICO policies seamlessly with the new policy selection view
comments: This app makes everything Geico very easy. I suggest that if you're going to have their insurance coverage you use the app. Save-A-Lot on paperwork saves a lot of hassle for the customer service people. And if you have to use customer service it's no big deal they're some of the most amazing people on Earth anyways.

The EASIEST app for all of your insurance needs! I had to make a claim a few months ago and was able to do it completely through the app in minutes. Also I needed to postpone this weeks payment and literally had it done after 3 taps on the screen! Great job, Geico!

I've had GEICO insurance for almost 30 years. I didn't switch to USAA after joining the military and I won't switch to any other insurer when I retire soon (Yay!). The reason is, no other insurer could give me full coverage including a rental if needed plus towing if needed for the same price or less, than GEICO. With GEICO I get more coverage for less money. Other insurers offered me less coverage for more money.

This app stops responding more often than it actually returns any data when you click something. I'm often putting my phone down for it to lock before the app actually loads anything. Either it's an issue with the app or geicos api. Either way, nearly unusable.

Old version was infinitely better. In this version there's no telling if what you click on will get you stuck in an endless loading loop. What are your developers doing? Did none of this show up in QA testing??

title: Progressive
description:
Easy access to your insurance, whenever and wherever you need it.

Here are some things you can do with the Progressive App:  
· View coverages, discounts, ID cards, documents, and policy details.
· Report and add photos to a claim.
· Pay your bill by credit card, debit card, or checking account.
· View your billing history and upcoming payment schedule.
· See your progress in Snapshot®.
· Quote or make a policy change.
· Request roadside assistance, exactly when you need it most.
· Take and submit photos of documents that we've requested from you.
· Get in touch with your agent and claims rep.
· Start an auto insurance quote—and then buy online.
 
Learn how we use your app permissions:
http://www.progressive.com/android-app-permissions/

recentChanges: • We've made performance improvements and fixed some bugs.
comments: With five drivers on the policy, only the primary to access the app to use the digital id cards? I'm on the chat right now (seems like a bot or not knowledgeable) and I don't think it is going to work.... Seems like false advertising when they show a person using the app to have id cards. What is everyone supposed to do? Log in with the same username and password?

Every single aspect of obtaining insurance with Progressive has been really simple! They're really nice and I would recommend them to anyone needing insurance for any vehicle at all. In addition, I could easily understand every conversation I've had with them on the phone...no weird accent to deal with! I fully intend to keep them forever!

Switched to progressive to save money. Lack of customer service immediately made me regret it. Will gladly pay a little more to not have every claim challenged or interrogated as fraud. The app is just as bad, require sign in EVERYTIME you sign out despite finger print enabling. It a scan to keep the app on always, assuming its collecting data on you while the app is open. Delete this.

Flo is always right there to help. She prompts you along and keeps everything simple and easy to use. I'm glad I switched to Progressive. I had StateFarm for as long as I could remember. Anytime I had to access their App it was a nightmare. Here I just paid the monthly premiums, in just a few minutes. And I pay a lot less too
Not able to log in.. Starts information is incorrect but, the information is correct. I'm able to log in on my laptop

title: TD Ameritrade Mobile
description:
On the move? So is the market. Stay on top of it with the TD Ameritrade Mobile app. Monitor the markets and your positions, deposit funds with mobile check deposit, catch up on the latest news and research, or browse educational content—all from your mobile device. Trade with confidence everywhere you go, with the security and precision of your desktop right in the palm of your hand. 

All the features you need:

• Keep up on the market with price alerts, real-time streaming quotes, helpful charts, Level II quotes, and News

• Track and trade stocks, options (up to two-leg strategies), options chains, and exchange-traded funds (ETFs), and even check your order status when on the go

• Transfer funds to and from your account, and use mobile check deposit to deposit funds whenever you want

• Use fingerprint authentication to sign in and to authorize trades and transfers

• Take advantage of educational offerings and browse videos on investing strategies, stocks, options, and more—anytime, anywhere

• Access third-party research like on-demand video from Thomson Reuters and CNBC, plus stay up to date with the latest analyst reports, Social Signals, and Twitter integration

• Use alerts to spot potential trading opportunities, get notifications when certain price targets are met, and stay up to date when key news breaks or events occur. 

• Manage and monitor your account with real-time balances and positions, statements and tax documents, transaction history, and our secure Message Center—right at your fingertips

• Customize your experience by setting up your Positions and Watch List screens just the way you want

Don't miss a minute of the market. Download the TD Ameritrade Mobile app and take your portfolio with you, wherever you go.

recentChanges:
Cost basis info
From the Positions page, see your unrealized and realized gain/loss, detailed transaction history, and more.

Social Signals
We discontinued this feature to streamline our technology and provide you with better service.

Trade ticket upgrades
Get more detailed quote information with new data fields, including bid/ask size and volume.
comments: To all those looking for a better MOBILE trading app, I promise you this is not it. This app is horrible and needs a lot of work...it may be better on computer but for a phone app it is ridiculous like for example the price/share is very inaccurate and takes forever to update, my limit orders NEVER get filled (had to use a market order in order to trade), and TD ameritrade offers 24/5 trading but I havent been able to trade in pre-marker...got no problem paying for trades as long as the app work

Can't believe I switched from Robin hood. Everything is so complicated! Can't find anything. Doesn't update on real time. Have to go looking for my accounts and orders.... There's got to be a better way to have more features without burying the basics.

Awful lagging app. It takes forever to update figures, keeps saying I don't have enough buying power when and I do, and my limit orders seem to just hang in the wind. Moreover, it processes order limits as a duplicate request, doubling the amount of shares you're ordering. Awful.
App is generally stable and does what it's intended. Currently saved contingent trade is impossible to locate, among some other less important features. App desperately needs a dark theme.

Huge improvement since I last wrote a review 3 months ago. The dashboard is a huge plus and works smoothly compared to the initial release in November. If you run into issues, just uninstall and reinstall it but remember to save your WL to the servers. One major issue is when I place an order, it takes 5-30 seconds for the order to show up in the position tab so I can't update it in a fast moving market. I had to switch to thinkorswim app to update my order as it's faster. Already sent this bug

title: Green Dot - Mobile Banking
description:
The Green Dot app is designed to help you manage any Green Dot debit card or bank account! This includes the new Unlimited Cash Back Bank Account by Green Dot Bank which pays rich rewards. If you’re not using Green Dot Bank, you could be missing out on hundreds of dollars per year. Spend like normal, save up like crazy!   

Earn 3% UNLIMITED cash back with online, in-app and mobile pay purchases
Save up money in the Green Dot High-Yield Savings Account and earn up to 3% annual interest
Free ATM network
Free cash deposits using the app
NO overdraft fees
NO minimum balance requirement
 

Easily manage any Green Dot Bank account at any time. This app allows you to…

Sign up for or register a new account
View balance and transaction history and see other account information
Pay bills and P2P money to friends

Access chat customer support

recentChanges: Green Dot has invented the richest cash back bank account in America. Earn an unlimited 3% cash back bonus on all online and in-app purchases. Plus, save up money in the High-Yield Savings Account that comes with the app- paying 3% annual percentage yield. The app has been redesigned for ease of use and an improved visual design.
comments: Great banking experience, No overdrafts. I get paid 2 days earlier than my coworkers. Their an FDIC bank. Easy online site to navigate. The downside is their isn't a way to get a new card without calling. And they have a $9.95 monthly fee. Which I can live with, since their is no overdrafts. All my coworkers are changing their direct deposit now too.

The app claims to have 24/7 live chat support. I've tried to connect to live support many times at all different hours only to get the "not available at this time" message every single time. I used auto fill to sign up, they effed up my address. The app won't let me correct it. Green dot claims you can do a mobile check deposit, but the app won't let me. Perhaps if I could connect to live chat these issues could be resolved. Oh well. Totally worthless app.

I keep getting an error after I log in & do the verification code that's says, “You need to login to your account to check balance!” Which is extremely frustrating because I can't use my card online because of this. I would not recommend this card to anyone. The fees are ridiculous & they lie. To check my balance at an atm, I have to pay 50 cents, which is bullsh*t, it didn't say anything about that!!!

Great, reliable, intuitive. I love the option to make deposits with no transaction fee, simply using a bar code at select locations. Evidently this so cutting-edge that some cashiers don't know how to do it yet, and a manager had to come figure it out. Walmart is the only company I know of that can deposit not only cash, but also from another debit card. You can keep your account locked in your device, but set the app to key you guess your balance without signing in, for quick access.

Bloody awful. You cannot talk to a live person, so don't expect any customer support. Further, the chat feature on the app never works. I bought a card two weeks ago, and I can't even load it. This company is dealing with UOUR money, and they have zero customer support. It is surreal. They never fail to take their monthly fees though.

title: Turbo: Financial Score & Free Credit Report
description:
Turbo Key Features:
 
●	*New* Goals: Set your goals and get actionable advice to help you save, reduce your debt, and improve your credit score. 

●	*New* Streaks: See your credit & financial health progress over time. Keep track of the little things that can have a big impact.

●	Refund Tracker: See your TurboTax filing status and refund date estimate

●	Free Credit Score: Check your credit for free with Turbo. Learn your VantageScore credit score, directly pulled from TransUnion. Quickly see changes in your score, celebrate with Turbo when it increases, and monitor credit streaks as you achieve them. Checking your credit report won’t affect your scores.

●	Free Credit Report: Sign up and get a free credit check with the touch of a button; we’ll provide you with your credit report instantly. Turbo pulls together three important numbers to provide you with further insight into your financial health: verified income, credit score, and debt-to-income ratio. Examine your payment history, credit utilization, types of credit, derogatory marks, and more.

●	24/7 Credit Monitoring: Turbo can help you spot identity theft with 24/7 credit monitoring*. Access your free credit report instantly to determine what’s changed.

●	View Verified Income and Debt in One Place: Turbo is more than a credit score app. Import your taxes from TurboTax to see where you stand with your verified income, debt-to-income ratio, and credit score in a single account dashboard.

●	Let Smart Tools Do the Math for You: Get insights to help you reach your financial goals. You can see what you may qualify for today and what you might be able to afford in the future on different types of loans.

●	Totally Free: Turbo is completely free to use. We won’t upsell you or ask for any credit card info. Check your credit score for free, with just the click of a button.

●	We value your security: Turbo works hard to safeguard your information by encrypting all of your data stored in our systems.


Turbo is the financial tool you’ve been waiting for. With up-to-date data and expert knowledge, your credit report may be able to provide you important insights into your financial health. Run a free credit check with Turbo and discover your financial potential.

*Credit reporting provided by TransUnion. There are various types of credit scores, and lenders use a variety of scores to make lending decisions. The credit score provided by Turbo may not be the specific credit score used by your lender.

comments: Very aggravating. This app went from being user friendly to a list of different things you have to sign up for or make an account just to get basic w2 info from years before. Why should it be so hard to just sign in and view my w2 details. Do I really have to download your app, sign up for credit score monitoring, and all the other BS? Going downhill insteadve up

I have been using turbo tax for about 4 years now. I love the easy steps and I especially love that I get consistent credit score updates. I am a huge fan that it shows me all the debt I have and organized methods for me to pay them off. Thank you for such an awesome app!!

I really like this app. Having this has helped me get my credit score up steadily and I'm saving better for a house. If you're looking to improve your financial situation then downloading this will be like having a personal financial coach pointing you in the right direction.

Turbo has organized my credit info for me very well. It answers the vital questions you may have about your credit score without you even asking, and always gives me timely updates! My credit score is up 33 pts in 1 month, and I know that thanks to Turbo!!

Very cool and helpful I got my first credit card and paid of a couple debts its only been a week and my credit score just went up one point. I just wish it had links to the creditors that i could just click on it would make setting up payments easier.

title: Truebill Budget Planner, Bill Tracker and Reminder
description:
TRACK EVERYTHING IN ONE PLACE
Truebill, the most convenient and big picture personal finance tracker, budget planner and bill reminder app.

Bill tracker app, Truebill’s user friendly interface lets you seamlessly track everything from expenses & spending to upcoming bills  - all while putting money back into your pocket! The budget planner and bill reminder keep track so you don’t have to.  

OVER A MILLION USERS TRUST TRUEBILL?
◉ NBC: This Startup Is Helping People Find Forgotten Money

◉ CNN: How To Shave Hundreds Off Your Credit Card Bill

◉ Fortune: There’s Now A Startup To Help You Cancel All Those Subscriptions

◉ TechCrunch: Truebill Wants To Help You Manage Your Online Subscriptions

◉ Chicago Tribune: 15-Minute Fixes For Your Family’s Finances

THE BUDGET PLANNER AND BILL REMINDER
Truebill, a budget planner and bill reminder app, evaluates your financial standing holistically, giving you a personal finance tracker & bill tracker app that balances automation and customization to make money saving as easy as possible.

Truebill is free to use and offers a wide array of tools all on one simple platform. Save money by managing your subscriptions and bills. Truebill, monthly bill organizer, will automatically detect and manage subscriptions, helping you to keep track of everything --even the ones you may have forgotten about! 

Truebill is a budget planner and bill reminder you can trust!

 THE BILL TRACKER THAT ACTUALLY HELPS YOU SAVE MONEY
Log-in to easily view your monthly bill organizer to stay on top of subscriptions, enjoy easy cancellation and bill negotiations handled by Truebill on your behalf. Having a personal finance tracker in your pocket to manage bills will put an end to late fees and overdraft charges.

Join the thousands using Truebill, expense tracker & spending tracker app to feel confident and in control of your finances. Users see savings of $512 per year by using the budget planner to track spending, manage subscriptions & lower bills. You can even receive credits for things like internet outages - automatically by using this simple expense tracker and spending tracker app.

Examples of how Truebill will save money automatically:

✓ Negotiating the best rates on cable, internet, and cell phone bills
✓ Getting you credits for service outages you may not even know about
✓ Manage subscriptions, cancel unwanted subscriptions, and keep track of recurring bills
✓ Track and manage bills with our monthly bill organizer
✓ Get bank fees refunded, automatically

 MANAGE BILLS & SUBSCRIPTIONS TOGETHER
Bill tracker app, Truebill, is easy to use and your next step towards taking back time and money lost on managing subscriptions, tracking expenses, spending, and budget planning. Truebill expense tracker is your free personal financial tracker and the only app designed to put money back into your pocket.

Truebill is an intuitive monthly bill organizer & bill tracker app created to save money automatically. Our proactive spending tracker & expense tracker tool highlights trends and subscriptions, keeping you in the loop with alerts from the budget planner.

Download our amazing spending tracker &  bill tracker app today and enjoy the best personal finance tracker in the play store!

By downloading and using Truebill, you agree to our current Terms of Use (truebill.com/terms) and Privacy Policy (truebill.com/privacy).

recentChanges: We've added a bills toggle to your spending tab so you can see your spending pie chart without bills (which often eat up too much of the pie!). We've also fixed some bugs.
comments: Amazing! This app helps me better my spending habit with little to no effort. Its not amazing at automatically categorizing your purchases but pretty good. The app automatically sets a budget for each category on an average of your spending for that category but you can lower or raise them if u want. It will notify u when your getting close to your budget limit. Splendid!
Excellent app. Helps to show how I can save more and renegotiates bills with companies like cable to lower your bill. So you don't have to renegotiate it yourself.
For someone using this app for about 2 weeks now, I think this is amazing to see were your money is going the most which can help you plan better and save more. Great job Truebill
Failure to receive code. Despite many attempts to receive the message that's supposed to be sent to my number, none have succeeded. I assure that the correct information is being put in.
Having the same issue as others have posted before. Oneplus 7 pro. Formatting issues. Text cut off. Words missing. Letters cut off.

title: Coinbase – Buy & Sell Bitcoin. Crypto Wallet
description:
Coinbase: the simple, safe way to buy, manage and sell your cryptocurrency.

We’re the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange, with over 25 million users across 32 countries worldwide. Coinbase allows you to securely buy, store and sell cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, Ethereum Classic, Litecoin, and many more on our easy, user-friendly app and web platform.

Here’s a little taste of what our app does:

BUY EASILY
Own crypto in an instant: Coinbase makes buying bitcoin, bitcoin cash, ethereum, ethereum classic, litecoin and more simple and fast. All it takes is a bank account or debit card.

SUPPORTED ASSETS
Bitcoin (BTC), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Ethereum (ETH), Ethereum Classic(ETC), Litecoin(LTC), Basic Attention Token (BAT)*, 0x, (ZRX)* and USD Coin (USDC)*.

*Available in select territories.

SMART TOOLS
Brand new to crypto? We’ve got you covered. Stay informed with our updates and features that help you build your knowledge and your portfolio, including automatic buys and price alerts.

STAY INFORMED
Keep track of your crypto: Our clear, user-friendly dashboard helps you see prices and the value of your assets, any time of day, anywhere you are through our website or mobile app.

SAFETY FIRST
Over 98% of cryptocurrency is stored securely offline and the rest is protected by industry-leading online security. Your account is also subject to the same scrupulous safety standards, including multi-stage verification and bank-level security. You can even lock the app with a passcode, or remotely disable your phone’s access to the app if it gets lost or stolen.

BEGINNER TO EXPERT, WE’RE HERE 
Whether you’re just starting your crypto journey, or a seasoned expert, you’ll find everything you need to build your crypto portfolio on Coinbase. Purchases start from as little as $20. 
Take the first step towards blockchain, bitcoin mining, bitcoin games, bitcoin cash games, ethereum games, litecoin games, or bitcoin trading. 

SUPPORT WITH EVERY STEP
Having issues? Send us an email at support@coinbase.com

recentChanges: Coinbase is the easiest and most trusted place to buy, sell, and manage your digital currency. This update includes a new feature offering 1.25% APY rewards just for holding USD Coin for eligible customers.
comments: Their support team is the worst. I'm a registered user for many months and have had to go through the verification process countless times because, although the app and website say I am fully verified, they apparently messed something up and I'm not, for some weird reason. They don't solve it, they simply stop responding... I've sent multiple tickets and they respond once or twice with pre-written stuff and then just ignore you. Very, very disappointed.

I dont know why but for some reason the app will just flash but closes. I have no idea why? I have tried everything from unistalling to clearing cache, and force stop etc. This has never happened before. I called customer service and they said that it has too do with the API on coinbase but thay didn't work, so when i tried contacting them the person got mad, and asked me for my email 5 times, and my phone number over and over. Still not fixed when my wife downloaded the app she had no issues?

Even after multiple attempts I never got the sms to confirm signup. They now have an email address, a phone number and a password. If I now move on to another wallet someone there might use that data to take over the new wallet I use. Not saying this will definitely happen but that is now possible where before it wasn't. Obviously I'll use another password but we all know some people won't. They deal with people's money and can't even get security right? Dangerous app. Stay away!

Update: you advertise all sorts of free money if you sign up and learn about the different currency's. However, most are ended. And those still going out you on a wait list that can take years. How is this not false advertising? App works well enough. However, coinbase fees are high and it takes way to long to process a transaction. As in days!!! I am unable to do any trading due to pending transaction.

The app is sub par and they have absolutely horrible support. I have opened three separate tickets with their support staff and my issue isn't even fixed yet. Every time I opened a new ticket they gave me some blanket response that does NOT resolve my issue. Then they close the ticket without checking if my issue was resolved. The worst experience I have had with any crypto company by far. If you aren't on coinbase pro they couldn't care less.

title: Citi Mobile®
description:
Simpler
All Mobile Account*: Open a checking or savings account right from the app without setting foot in a bank branch
Fast Navigation: Quickly get to your favorite features with an intuitive navigation menu and smart shortcuts 
Card Replacement: Request a new card if your original is lost, stolen or damaged
Citi Mobile® Snapshot: Quickly review key account info – without having to sign in every time
Zelle®: A fast, fee-free way within the Citi Mobile App to pay and easily split payments with people you trust.**  
Mobile Check Deposit: Quickly and easily deposit checks from your mobile device
Find an ATM: Easily locate one of more than 60,000 fee-free ATMs in the U.S near you
Account Information: View your statements, check balances and recent activity 
Make same-day or scheduled payments easily

Smarter 
Aggregation*: Link virtually all your bank accounts, credit cards and investment accounts for a more holistic financial view to managing your finances
Spending insights*: Track your spending habits and trends across your accounts 
Bill management*: View and manage your bills, and recurring payments in one place
FICO® Score : Citi credit card customers can view their FICO® Score for free 
Make payments including automatic payments, and transfers and manage payees
Dispute credit card transactions if ever needed and track the status
Stay informed with Account Alerts: Choose the alerts you want and even when you want them
Change your credit card due date: Choose the beginning, middle, or end of a month
Secure 
Citi® Quick Lock: Lock or unlock your lost or misplaced card 
PIN Reset: Reset your debit card PIN from your mobile device
Enable Fingerprint Authentication for a fast way to access your account
* Features are available today on a limited basis.

**Zelle and the Zelle related marks are wholly owned by Early Warning Services, LLC and are used herein under license.

Citi’s Mobile App has been certified by J.D. Power for providing “An Outstanding Mobile Credit Card Experience” for customers.”
J.D. Power 2019 Mobile App Certification Program recognition is based on successful completion of an audit and exceeding a customer experience benchmark through a survey of recent servicing interactions. For more information, visit jdpower.com/awards.

Your trust and confidence in how we collect, use, and share information about you is a priority. Review our privacy notice at  https://online.citi.com/JRS/portal/template.do?ID=Privacy and our notice at collection at https://online.citi.com/JRS/portal/template.do?ID=Privacy#notice-at-collection to learn more about privacy at Citi. Additionally, California residents may submit requests in connection with the California Consumer Privacy Act at https://online.citi.com/dataprivacyhub

summary: The Citi Mobile® App lets you manage your accounts virtually anytime, anywhere.
recentChanges: Thanks for using the Citi Mobile App! To give you the best experience, we’re constantly improving our app. Stay updated with the latest version so you can get the most from Citi Mobile.
comments: Uni stalling because it never works. The past month every time I try to log on it tells me I need to reset my password. Go through the whole process only to get the "temporarily delays" message trying to change my pass. Not even going to bother with this app until it gets fixed. I literally can't use the app so no need to keep it on my phone

Terrible app. Continue to receive (temporary delays) message on my Android mobile device. Will not let me log in. A reputable financial institution such as Citibank should have their act together. I have deleted the app and will consider other Banks for my finances should this problem not be resolved soon. This has been an ongoing issue. Have spoken with customer service and was told they are aware of the situation yet nothing has been done about it.

When I first downloaded the app, I had a terrible time trying to log in. And the automated customer service hot line was not helpful at all. However, once I was contacted by Citi's actual customer service people, my issues were solved promptly, and the app has performed flawlessly ever since. Many handy features, I highly recommend.

Still not logging in. For a major bank to have such an underwhelming, buggy, limited functionality app, that speaks volumes. I can't remember the last time this fingerprint log in worked. Frequently even typing the password doesn't work, frequently it forgets that it logged in from my device 5 min ago and needs to send a text. Frequently it gets stuck on the log on screen forever. Standard reply, send us an email.. I have a flagship Samsung device, latest OS and app updates. No excuse!

App isn't bad when it works, unfortunately that's only about once a year. Most of the time the app won't let you sign in with error messages like "Having trouble? Try again." and "Temporary Delays." There's not much choice in managing Citi credit cards, just don't depend on this app to give you any access/information - especially when you need it.

title: Webull: Stocks, Options & ETFs
description:
Zero commission trading. Zero minimum deposit. Free real-time quotes (NASDAQ Last Sale). Enjoy Tech. Enjoy Investing.

Current Promotions*:
1. Get Your Free Stocks
a) Open a Webull brokerage account and receive a free stock valued between $2.5-$250.
b) Deposit ANY amount and receive a 2nd free stock valued between $12-$1400.
c) Refer a friend to join us and get THREE free stocks, each valued between $12-$1400.

2. Transfer Fee Reimbursement
Transfer your brokerage account over to Webull, and we will reimburse your transfer fees, up to $100.
* Currently U.S. citizens only.

Truly Commission Free
- Zero Commission for Stocks, ETFs, and Options
- Zero Contract Fees for Options
- Zero Deposit Minimum for Brokerage and IRAs

Options Trading
- Complimentary Real-time OPRA quotes
- Straddle and List Views for Option Chain

In-depth Analysis Tools
- Powerful Charting Tools
- Webull Charting supports 44 technical indicators, as well as 12 charting tools designed to help you analyze trends and decipher market information.
- Free Real-time Quotes

Voice Commands
- With simple voice prompts such as “buy”, “sell”, or “search”, place orders and look up tickers using only your voice on Webull.

Place Orders Quickly
- Enter “Big Button Mode” to quickly place trades at the push of a button. Access the Price Ladder to get a view of the order book and seamlessly place your orders by tapping on the bids and asks.

Full Extended Hours Trading
- Full pre-market (4:00 AM - 9:30 AM ET) and after hours (4:00 PM - 8:00 PM ET) sessions.

Save for Retirement with an IRA
- Invest fee-free and commission-free. Grow your investments by making tax-deductible contributions and tax-deferred earnings.

Multi-platform Accessibility
- Free, in-depth data and analytics in one customizable application across desktop, web and mobile platforms.

24/7 Online Help
- We offer 24/7 online help to guide you through our multiple platforms and answer all your questions.
- Email: CS@webull.com
- Facebook / Twitter/Instagram: @WebullGlobal
- Reddit: /r/Webull/
- Website: https://www.webull.com

DISCLOSURES
System response and account access time may vary due to a variety of factors, including trading volumes, market conditions, system performance and other factors.

Risk Disclosure: Trading of stocks and all other investment products involves substantial risk of loss and is not suitable for every investor. The value of stocks may fluctuate and as a result, clients may lose more than their original investment.

No content in the App shall be considered a recommendation or solicitation for the purchase or sale of securities, options or other investment products. All information and data in the App are for reference only and no historical data shall be considered as the basis for judging future trends.

Webull Financial LLC is a member of Securities Investor Protection Corporation (SIPC), which protects securities customers of its members up to $500,000 (including $250,000 for claims for cash). Explanatory brochure available upon request or at www.sipc.org.

Our clearing firm Apex Clearing Corp has purchased an additional insurance policy. The coverage limits provide protection for securities and cash up to an aggregate of $150 million, subject to maximum limits of $37.5 million for any one customer’s securities and $900,000 for any one customer’s cash. Similar to SIPC protection, this additional insurance does not protect against a loss in the market value of securities.

Free trading of stocks refers to $0 commissions for Webull Financial LLC self-directed individual cash or margin brokerage accounts that trade U.S. listed securities via mobile devices or Web. Relevant SEC & FINRA fees may apply.

Check the background of Webull Financial LLC on FINRA's BrokerCheck (https://brokercheck.finra.org/).

- Enter “Big Button Mode” to quickly place trades at the push of a button. Access the Price Ladder to get a view of the order book and seamlessly place your orders by tapping on the bids and asks.

Full Extended Hours Trading
- Full pre-market (4:00 AM - 9:30 AM ET) and after hours (4:00 PM - 8:00 PM ET) sessions.

Save for Retirement with an IRA
- Invest fee-free and commission-free. Grow your investments by making tax-deductible contributions and tax-deferred earnings.

Multi-platform Accessibility
- Free, in-depth data and analytics in one customizable application across desktop, web and mobile platforms.

24/7 Online Help
- We offer 24/7 online help to guide you through our multiple platforms and answer all your questions.
- Email: CS@webull.com
- Facebook / Twitter/Instagram: @WebullGlobal
- Reddit: /r/Webull/
- Website: https://www.webull.com

DISCLOSURES
System response and account access time may vary due to a variety of factors, including trading volumes, market conditions, system performance and other factors.

Risk Disclosure: Trading of stocks and all other investment products involves substantial risk of loss and is not suitable for every investor. The value of stocks may fluctuate and as a result, clients may lose more than their original investment.

No content in the App shall be considered a recommendation or solicitation for the purchase or sale of securities, options or other investment products. All information and data in the App are for reference only and no historical data shall be considered as the basis for judging future trends.

Webull Financial LLC is a member of Securities Investor Protection Corporation (SIPC), which protects securities customers of its members up to $500,000 (including $250,000 for claims for cash). Explanatory brochure available upon request or at www.sipc.org.

Our clearing firm Apex Clearing Corp has purchased an additional insurance policy. The coverage limits provide protection for securities and cash up to an aggregate of $150 million, subject to maximum limits of $37.5 million for any one customer’s securities and $900,000 for any one customer’s cash. Similar to SIPC protection, this additional insurance does not protect against a loss in the market value of securities.

Free trading of stocks refers to $0 commissions for Webull Financial LLC self-directed individual cash or margin brokerage accounts that trade U.S. listed securities via mobile devices or Web. Relevant SEC & FINRA fees may apply.

Check the background of Webull Financial LLC on FINRA's BrokerCheck (https://brokercheck.finra.org/).
summary: Zero Commission Trading. Zero Contract Fees for Options.
developerAddress: 44 Wall Street, Suite 501, New York, NY
recentChanges:
1. You can check your account P&L components for customized date ranges;
2. Bug fixes.
comments: Unfortunately you can't use this to trade in Canada, but this is the most well-made app I've ever used for anything. It's the best way to view stocks. It literally has everything. Super, smooth, clean and looks really good especially dark mode. You can name and create your own watch lists, swipe between them, and follow everything super fast.

Overall app is great for charts across globe. Haven't had a real-time trading experience yet. I would like to suggest in fundamental data, kindly include current imp ratios like - debt to equity (D/E), Price to Sales (P/S), EV to EBITDA, Cash Flow per share, Free cash flow, Price to cash flow ratio, and imp growth rations. Including above mentioned ratios can really help traders, investors in taking informed decisions. Thanks for great app.

This is a fantastic intermediate level trading platform. From a technical analyst style of trading, both the desktop version and app allow for user friendly drawing of trend channels, fibonacci tracements, and a plethora of chart indicators. I recommend this to anyone looking for a fantastic trading platform. This just about has it all, an online chat community, paper trading, margin trading, short selling, options trading, and news relating specifically to the ticker all organized fantastically

This app is a joke. I signed up almost a month ago, somehow it took 2 weeks to process my first deposit, then it bounced back had to pay a fee and fund even more to cover the fee. After $75 later and my deposits finally cleared I was hoping it was the end of it. When I went to place a trade somehow my account still has restrictions. I've tried to contact customer support but everytime I message I get an auto-reply. Horrible experience so far, YouTubers getting pay to promote looks like

Perfect mobile trading app.....almost. The user interface is very well thought out, and quite frankly puts many desktop platforms to shame. The downside is their level 2 premium subscription doesn't appear to show the true level 2 quotes, most of the time, when compared in real time to competitor level 2 quotes.

title: Credit One Bank Mobile
description:
Conveniently manage your credit card accounts with the Credit One Bank mobile app. Schedule payments and review account activity, balances, payment history, offers and more!

FAST AND SECURE ACCOUNT ACCESS
Fast and secure sign in with Fingerprint (available on capable devices)
Use Quick View to see a snapshot of your account without signing in 

ENJOY ON-THE-GO ACCOUNT ACCESS
Schedule, edit or cancel payments
Change your payment due date
Check your balance and available credit, and view recent transactions or monthly statements
View your Free Online Experian Credit Score & Summary and see what factors contribute to your score
Manage your profile and account settings
Easily manage multiple accounts
Enroll in paperless documents and statements to keep your account information secure and ensure important communications won't get lost in the mail

OFFERS & DEALS
View the latest offers and More Cash Back Rewards on purchases at participating retailers
View exclusive credit card offers

STAY INFORMED
Choose how you get alerts including mobile notifications, email, and text 
Set up notifications for important account activity, payment reminders and special offers
Get notified when exclusive credit card offers and rewards are available  
Receive alerts if fraudulent activity is suspected on your account

recentChanges:
Credit One Bank releases regular updates to improve performance and enhance your experience. In this release, we’ve added:
* Enhanced browsing for More Rewards
* New shortcuts for Pay Bill, Quick View, Offers, and Support
* Performance enhancements & bug fixes
comments: It's easy to use. They're a little behind but definitely improving consistently. But there's a few features that I'm not 100% in love with. Like the payment stuff. Only saving one bank account to make payments. And it's slow to make them. I do like it overall, though. Definitely have experienced way worse. And anything they lack here has been made up with on the phone customer service in my experiences. Thanks, guys!

I had to uninstall this several times, I have nothing but problems with this app it used to work until my last update. I don't remember what date that was but I haven't used this app for several months now,I install it again and it's telling me my password or username is incorrect, I can use it online and everything is correct, but the app won't work. with this coronavirus scare tactic I am not able to get in touch with anyone by phone it's long wait times. 🤔🤷

Thank goodness for apps such as these that make payments easy! Credit One is the only company who took a chance on me, due to my not having any credit history except hospital bills that are illegally on my report (I'm disputing them) because they've been on there over a decade and should've been removed from my report years ago. Now, I pay each full balance of my credit card off before the minimum payment is even due just to show CO they took a chance on the right person!! Thank you Credit One!

I really like using the app more so than logging onto site via computer, laptop, etc. It makes it a lot easier for me, because I suffer from some serious PTSD, which @ times gets my anxiety ratcheted up for no logical reason 😔😔. It's also great to be able to get notifications of statements so I can schedule my payments way in advance because with FMS &PTSD, my brain no longer has some serious issues with time and not realizing how much time has passed. 👍👍 for this app AND company!! ♥️♥️

The app always gives you an error message stating that i do not have internet service even on wifi. Other apps work on my phone as well as rhe internet. Customer service was a waste of time. 2 hour phone call for nothing...the outsourced customer service reps are the worst. They are very unhelpful and rude. The only way to get anything done is to get a rep in the U.S. otherwise it will be a frustrating experiance. Save time amd frustration and get a card with another financial institution.

title: E*TRADE: Invest. Trade. Save.
description:
Welcome to E*TRADE. No matter your level of experience, we help simplify investing and trading. With our mobile experience, you have everything you need in the palm of your hand—including investing, banking, trading, research, and more. It’s all here on our award-winning app. Download now to get started!

INVEST WITH CONFIDENCE
• Enjoy commission-free online stock, ETF, and options trades
• Trade mutual funds
• Get help from real people whenever you need it  

SEIZE OPPORTUNITIES
• Get streaming quotes, charts, and portfolio information
• Set alerts and create watchlists for the investments you’re interested in 
• Use comprehensive research, tools, and screeners to spot opportunities

BANK AND SAVE
• Deposit checks, pay bills, transfer money, + more
• Get unlimited ATM fee refunds with your E*TRADE debit card
• Get rates 15x the national average from E*TRADE Bank Premium Savings Account

STAY IN THE KNOW
• Breaking news, independent research, and live Bloomberg video
• Chat with customer service in the app
• Access education to help you along the way

FEEL SAFE AND SECURE
• Fraud protection—you're not liable for unauthorized use of your account

DISCLOSURES 
Investing in securities products involves risk, including possible loss of principal. 

Read more about the awards E*TRADE received in Stockbrokers.com 2018 Online Broker Review at https://etradefinancialcorporation.gcs-web.com/.

With Max-Rate Checking, E*TRADE Bank will not charge you a fee for withdrawing funds from any institution's ATM nationwide but the owner/operator of the ATM may. These fees will automatically be credited to your account. E*TRADE Bank does impose a charge equal to 1% of the transaction amount (including credits and reversals) for non-U.S. currency transactions. In the event E*TRADE Bank in its sole discretion determines that there has been either fraudulent or excessive use of the feature on a given account, E*TRADE Bank reserves the right to remove this feature and not refund the ATM fees. For additional information and important details about how the ATM fee refund will be applied, please visit www.etrade.com/atmrefundpolicy.

National average for savings annual percentage yield (APY) courtesy of Bankrate.com, as of 10/3/18.

Android is a trademark of Google Inc. Use of this trademark is subject to Google Permissions. 

The E*TRADE Financial family of companies provides financial services including trading, investing and banking products and services to retail customers. 

Securities products and services offered by E*TRADE Securities LLC, Member FINRA/SIPC, are not insured by the FDIC, are not guaranteed deposits or obligations of E*TRADE Bank, and are subject to investment risk, including the possible loss of the principal invested. 

Banking products and services are offered by E*TRADE Bank, a federal savings bank, Member FDIC, or its subsidiaries. 

E*TRADE Securities LLC and E*TRADE Bank are separate but affiliated companies. 

View End-User License Agreement: https://mobile.etrade.com/etmobile/EULA_2.0.html

System response and account access times may vary due to a variety of factors, including trading volumes, market conditions, system performance, and other factors.

© 2018 E*TRADE Financial Corporation. All rights reserved.

recentChanges:
Thanks for choosing E*TRADE! We update our app regularly to improve your mobile experience.
In this release, we’ve fixed some bugs and made minor improvements.
comments: App worked great when I could actually log in. Problem is that I have to enter my VIP token, a separate app, and when I switch back from the VIP app, my user name and password disappear. So no copying and pasting. And since the token expires after 30 seconds (vs 60 like every other token) , there is not enough time for me to reenter the information before it expires. Hence the app is now quite useless.

Nothing but problems right now!!! Everytime I launch the App I get an error message that states none of my data loaded. I cannot see any of my account, can do nothing! Obviously other users are having the same issue. I cannot understand how a major financial company like E*Trade cannot keep there app running. Super frustrating!

Its not user-friendly. The app is complicated and busy and it looks designed by someone in finance. Being someone that doesn't trade a lot at all and kinda just messing around. I downloaded a couple of the apps and was extremely disappointed by this one when some of the others offer very well put together designs with next to no difference in fees.

This app is beyond broken. It crashes every time you open the "Help" menu, it takes almost two weeks for money to transfer from yoyr bank account to the trading account, what money you do transfer over will randomly disappear, and the layout of the app itself is beyond inept, which requires needing to use the "Help" menu, thus causing the cycle of frustration to begin anew. Nothing makes sense, and if you are a first-time investor like myself I would absolutely NOT recommend. 0/10

5 stars if one tech issue is resolved. App offers every mobile tool an investor needs for a live account. However, error notifications are displayed for any Watch List that has a cash balance. I like to configure stock watch lists with a dedicated cash purchase amount. The app will not display these accounts which defeats the whole purpose.

title: Credit Sesame-Personalized Credit Score Tips
description:
Biggest Update to take your credit to the next level!
IN-DEPTH ANALYSIS of your credit score with interactive graphs
NEW PERSONALIZED INSIGHTS: bite-size actions you can take now  
INTUITIVE CATEGORIZATION of recommendations based on your approval odds.

Get your free credit score, report card and monitoring with Credit Sesame.  Our mission is to empower you to achieve your financial goals. With our credit score app we provide millions of people access to free credit scores and coach you to grow your financial potential. No credit card is required, and checking your score will not impact it.  Start the journey today to improve your credit score.


Here is what you can expect in addition to your monthly updated FREE credit score check:

• Free Credit Report Card - We'll break down your score and show you what's impacting your credit.

• Free Credit Strategy - Once you know where you stand, we'll give you a custom action plan to take control of your credit.

• Free Credit Alerts and Monitoring - Free 24/7 credit monitoring with early identity theft warnings and fraud detection

• My Borrowing Power - Get personalized recommendations for the best credit cards, mortgage rates, and refinance options.

• Free ID Theft Protection - You're always protected with $50,000 in identity theft protection insurance.

• Our Robo Credit technology helps us provide customized, tech-driven recommendations so you can make the most of your finances.

We help you answer questions such as:
-What is my credit score?  
-How can I check my credit score?
-How can I better manage my credit?


1000's+ news mentions, including:

• The Wall Street Journal

• The New York Times

• NBC’s TODAY Show

• CNN Money

• CNBC

To learn more, visit Credit Sesame.

developerAddress: 444 Castro St, Mountain View, CA 94041
recentChanges: We are always making improvements to Credit Sesame. To make sure you can access the latest analysis and alerts about your credit score, keep your Updates turned on!
comments: So far things are working fairly well with app. Although I find it strange that since I am using the app often,I have been receiving calls from robo-messeges stating my ssn is being "suspended " due to suspicious activity and to call a specific number. I call the number and usually receive a voice recording telling me that the mailbox is full and to try again later. If this is true at all, wouldn't it be posted in all this glorious information that you provide to me?

I highly recommend this app. It's not only free, but more importantly, a great educational tool to teach you how to use credit wisely as well as improve your own credit score. And now offering even more updated financial advice to help you wisely get through the Covid-19 pandemic. Love all the new features! Bravo Credit Sesame! 😊

One of the most reliable Apps you could find out there. Compared to other apps that provide similar services, I wished Credit Sesame could keep track of score updates on a more timely fashion. Other than that, it is reliable, and provides best tips towards a healthy credit score.

Quickly showed me my credit score, and negative mark against that I didn't know of. Quickly matched me to banks that I had the best odds of being approved for line of credit to start building my score again. It's been fast and painless. Great job!

Credit Sesame is very good it helps you put your credit back into place. I have told all my friends and I hope they start checking their credit scores that is why I gave you a 5 stars you guys are awesome.

title: State Farm®
description:
With the State Farm® mobile app, you can manage your insurance and banking accounts, request roadside assistance, file and track claims, and much more. Just another way we’re here to help life go right.®

View and manage your insurance policies.
•	Quickly pay your insurance bill- even with Android Pay
•	View your auto insurance ID card
•	View your insurance policies and coverage details

Here to help when you have a claim.  
•	File a vehicle, property or vehicle glass claim
•	Track the status of your claim
•	Get assistance with tire changes, dead batteries, stuck vehicles and more
•	Search for repair facilities

Banking with ease. 
•	Transfer funds between State Farm Bank® accounts
•	Check your account balance and view transaction history
•	Deposit checks
•	Pay your State Farm credit card bills
•	Pay other bills (ex. cable bill) using Bill Pay

But wait, there’s more!
•	View details of your mutual funds products
•	Personalized reminders and notifications when you login
•	FAQs available in the app when you need them
•	Learn about our other products

recentChanges:
Tired of waiting for your new insurance card in the mail? You can now view your auto insurance card PDF in advance when you are coming up for renewal.

When you have a claim, you can now view even more details about the status; keeping you informed every step of the way.
comments: After my original review I was contacted by the developer who told me that this option is available on the map. I guess I missed it. Hopefully I won't need roadside assistance soon, but this is good to know. Thanks. Original review: App is getting better/easier to use but one big improvement that could be made to roadside assistance would be to allow the option of typing in an address rather than tap the destination on a map. If I break down in an unfamiliar city and need a tow to a place where I've never been, it might be difficult to locate the destination on a map.

App is almost as bad as there service. No feature works properly. Doesnt save anything correctly. The features they choose to implement wouldn't be that helpful even if they worked properly. Not to mention there service is abhorrent and actively tries to screw you out of what you paid for.
I've been trying to make a payment for 3 days and it keeps telling me theres a technical difficulty and to try again later. PLEASE FIX THIS.

Terrible app! Is never up to date when it should be the most up to date thing i can view as far as my policy. Cant pake payments until they are late and policy is about to be cut off. But i can make a full years payment on my homeowners policy...makes no sence. I should be able to make a payment at any point in time. Till then 1 star

The app developers got back with me and it looks like they fixed the app!!! First problem I was having was logging in, but that's been corrected, then the app wouldn't show my current due bill, but that looks liked it's been corrected as well!!! I'll see when the time comes and give 5-STARS!!! Great app!!! Thanks!!! : ) DW, OH

title: Dave - Banking For Humans
description:
Advance up to $100 from your paycheck interest free. No credit check. With Dave, you can budget your upcoming expenses and be protected from bank fees for only $1/month. 

***Dave Banking is here!*** Sign up for Dave Banking and you’ll get up to a $100 advance from your next paycheck. 

***Winner of the prestigious JP Morgan 2017 Financial Solutions Lab***

Dave provides paycheck advances and budgeting assistance to anyone in need. Dave will help you avoid overdraft fees, plan for upcoming expenses and spot you up to $100 when you need cash fast.

Worried about spending too much? Dave can help you budget your personal expenses and avoid overdrafts with friendly announcements. Automatic payments for things like Netflix and insurance can make budgeting tricky, but he can help there too!

Dave can even help you find a “Side Hustle” to bring in extra money between paychecks.

Want to be philanthropic but don’t have the budget for it? Dave even helps the environment. If you tip Dave, we plant a tree for every % that you tip. 

Whether you’re hit by sudden expenses or need a little extra to make it to the next paycheck, Dave is here to help. Download Dave now and to stay ahead of overdrafts and get a payday advance when you need it.

DAVE FEATURES:

►NEVER OVERDRAFT AGAIN◄
• Instantly advance up to $100 from your next paycheck.
• No interest. No credit checks. Just pay your advance back on payday. 
• Connect directly to your bank account to borrow money fast.
• Dave saves the average American an average of $500 a year.

►BALANCE YOUR BUDGET◄
• Supercharge your checking account with budgeting tools and predictive alerts.
•:  Plan for upcoming expenses like your rent, phone bill or even places you go to often like McDonald’s. 

►ALERT◄
If you spend more than you planned for, Dave can send you alerts.
Budget and account for automatic recurring payments.

►SIDE HUSTLE◄
• Find ways to earn extra money on the side.
• Apply for side gigs like Uber or Doordash right from the app.

►GIVING BACK◄
• For every % tip you leave, Dave plants a tree in partnership with Trees for the Future.
• Thanks to Dave users, millions of trees have been planted so far.
• Planting trees provides families with food, income, empowerment, unity, leadership, education and even saves lives.
• Now you can give back by borrowing, no matter what your budget is.

►WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING◄
“This $1/mo subscription appears radically reasonable beside the cost of overdraft fees ($34).” Dave advances are 0% interest. The average overdraft has an interest rate of 17,000% and payday loans are crazy expensive at 600% interest or more.”

FORBES
“For Workers In A Pinch, Dave.com Experiments With No-Interest Paycheck Advances”

LIFEHACKER
“This App Will Loan You $75 Interest Free to Avoid Overdraft Fees. Overdraft fees are the worst. A solid solution: Dave. Not your buddy from college, the app.”

BLOOMBERG
“Bank overdraft fees are here to stay. Thankfully, there's Dave.com.”
