• For every % tip you leave, Dave plants a tree in partnership with Trees for the Future.
• Thanks to Dave users, millions of trees have been planted so far.
• Planting trees provides families with food, income, empowerment, unity, leadership, education and even saves lives.
• Now you can give back by borrowing, no matter what your budget is.

►WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING◄
“This $1/mo subscription appears radically reasonable beside the cost of overdraft fees ($34).” Dave advances are 0% interest. The average overdraft has an interest rate of 17,000% and payday loans are crazy expensive at 600% interest or more.”

FORBES
“For Workers In A Pinch, Dave.com Experiments With No-Interest Paycheck Advances”

LIFEHACKER
“This App Will Loan You $75 Interest Free to Avoid Overdraft Fees. Overdraft fees are the worst. A solid solution: Dave. Not your buddy from college, the app.”

BLOOMBERG
“Bank overdraft fees are here to stay. Thankfully, there's Dave.com.”
summary: Get a payday advance of up to $100, budget, and avoid overdraft fees forever.
recentChanges:
I’m partnering with companies to create side jobs you can do without leaving home, just in case you find yourself cooped up at home during these tough times. Here are two options with more on the way.

- Swagbucks
Earn gift cards for taking surveys, watching videos, shopping online and more.

- Survey Junkie
Get paid to share your opinion on cool products or services.

If you run into any issues that are just un-bear-able, please go to https://support.dave.com/ to get some help.
comments: Great app but makes no sense. Supposed to help prevent overdrafts, but only if you're gonna overdraft within eleven days of payday, and if you overdraft before then, it considers you a 'risky investment' and won't even loan you $20 so I've been able to use it once and apparently that's all she wrote because it's only good for the end of the month. if you get paid monthly instead of bi weekly you're basically screwed. Edit: now it's only $5 instead of $20....

It's nice and all that a quick $50 or $100 shows up when you need it. Like when your gas tank is too close to low and too far from payday, or you racked up a high dinner bill, that money shows up pretty quick. It also let's you know that you are too risky or broke so restricts the amount. I appreciate that the most since other payday loans will just rob you.

During this time of unstability you can't get an advance is crazy. A rule is if your card expires in 2 or 3 months you can't get an advance which is crazy because the banks don't send out cards months in advance. So now we're stuck for the next 2 months. But good app. Has helped me last until a payday if i need it. Much easier to use then other apps like it. Much more giving to people that get money any many different ways unlike other apps being strict with their acceptance of certain incomes.

Only complaint I have is that once you automatically pay back what you owe you have to wait until the next business day before you can use it again. Definitely not a reason to not use by any means as you can have a negative balance and they will still deposit in your account. I've used other payday services like branch and moneylion, and they all let you take money out the same day you pay back. Overall I give 5 out of 5 though and am currently on the waiting list for the $100 advance.

it was nice to get the cash advance right away after signing up, but I felt a little bit like I was tricked into leaving a tip, which I didn't feel comfortable doing yet the first time around, especially because the whole reason I got the app was since money has been tight. By default 15% tip was selected, and then hitting the thank-you button submitted my choices tipping that amountand there was no obvious way to select no tip. I think what you have to do is actually just close the application

title: Varo: Save money with a mobile bank account
description:
Welcome to mobile banking that charges no monthly fees, lets you get paid up to two days early with direct deposit^, offers easy automatic savings tools, and gives you new ways to manage your money. Forget everything you know about banking. This is banking that actually helps.


LET’S DITCH THESE FEES

Your Varo Bank Account comes with a Varo Visa® Debit Card — which you can safely lock in your mobile banking app — but none of these fees:

• No Fee Overdraft up to $50 (see requirements below)
• No fees at 55,000+ Allpoint® ATMs worldwide. Get cash whenever you need it
• No foreign transaction fees
• No monthly maintenance fee
• No ACH transfer fee
• No debit card replacement fee

Plus:
• No minimum balance requirement
• Get paid up to two days early with direct deposit^
• Use Google Pay™ and Samsung Pay™ for quick and easy payments



MANAGE YOUR MONEY EASILY

Your Varo Bank Account helps you stay in control of your money.

• Instantly send money to anyone who uses Varo
• Track spending and account activity with instant alerts
• Send money to and from external accounts
• We’ll mail checks for you for free


SAVE AND EARN MORE

Automatic savings tools let you save and earn money easily. First get a Varo Bank Account, then set up your high-yield Varo Savings Account.

• Automatic savings tools let you save money without thinking
• No minimum balance requirement to earn interest
• Start earning 1.92% APY*, then earn up to 2.80% APY* if you meet these three requirements each calendar month:
• Keep a savings balance of $50,000 or less
• Make at least five Varo Visa® Debit Card purchases each calendar month, AND 
• Receive total direct deposits of $1,000 or more each calendar month


NO FEE OVERDRAFT REQUIREMENTS
 
To be eligible for No Fee Overdraft to overdraw your Varo Bank Account up to $50 on transactions on any transaction made with your Varo Visa Debit Card you must meet both of these requirements:
• Make at least five qualifying Varo Visa Debit Card purchases in each calendar month, AND
• Receive total payroll or government direct deposits of $1,000 or more in the same calendar month.

Once you qualify, enroll by turning on No Fee Overdraft in the app.
 

STAY SAFE AND SECURE

Keeping your money and data protected is at the top of our list.

• Your deposits are FDIC insured to at least $250,000 through The Bancorp Bank; Member FDIC
• Your debit card is protected with Visa® Zero Liability‡
• Your data is protected with advanced 256-bit AES-level encryption, access control, secure processes, and audits


LEGAL THINGS

If you’re a current customer with a Varo loan, we strongly recommend you do not switch to the Android app right now. We’ll start offering lending services for Android next year!

^Early access to direct deposit funds depends on timing of payer’s submission of deposits. We generally post such deposits on the day they are received which may be up to 2 days earlier than the payer’s scheduled payment date.
 
*Varo Annual Percentage Yields (APYs) are accurate as of January 22, 2020. These rates are variable and may change. No minimum balance required to open account. Balance in Savings must be at least $0.01 to earn interest.
 
‡You must notify your financial institution immediately of any unauthorized use. For specific restrictions, limitations and other details, please consult your issuer.
 
Bank Account Services provided by The Bancorp Bank; Member FDIC. The Varo Visa Debit Card is issued by The Bancorp Bank pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc and may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.
 
Google Pay is a trademark of Google LLC. Samsung Pay is a trademark or registered trademarks of Samsung Electronics Co. Ltd. Samsung Pay is available on select Samsung devices.

developerAddress:
222 Kearny
7th Floor
San Francisco, CA 94108
recentChanges: Courageously conquering bugs and enhancing the app so we can make banking even easier for you. Keep sending your feedback and questions to help@varomoney.com!
comments: Pretty Good for online Banking. My only issue with Varo is the fact that if you lose your card, your only option is to wait until you get a new one in the the mail which can take up to 14 business day, before you can access your money. Over the counter Cash withdrawal are available at 3rd party vendors/ Banks, but you must have or card.. Which brings me to the point above. Varo savings do offer pretty high yielding APR's on its customers.. Which is cool, , LOANS, loans I say is what I want.

To me this app is very convenient because I never have to go to a bank, I didn't need any money to open the account, It was very simple to set up and it has already helped me get a credit card. My freinds find this hard to believe but its true. I plan on using this app alot.

Best bank I've ever used. Period. I was reluctant to get this because I'd been getting F'd in the A by ridiculous fees from Wells Fargo for years, and didnt want that again. My employers convinced me to go with a bank for efficiency. So I gave this a shot. Not only is it by far the simplest easiest to use bank ive ever encountered, it doesnt buttrape you with fees EVER, and it gets the job done. This app is a breath of fresh air for anyone who's struggled with predatory banks in the past like me
No fees so far, very easy to navigate and transfer money to other accounts!

This is a great way to get paid earlier and as of right now I have not had any issues. I like the fact you can save your change with the round up feature of the debit card. This is one of the easiest to use banking apps I have seen if you a tired of bug banks keeping your money for 2 days on your paycheck deposit to make money from the interest then you need to switch I did and I love it.

title: Xoom Money Transfer
description:
We get it. You want to send money to friends and family around the world, quickly and conveniently. That’s why PayPal brings you Xoom.

Xoom is a fast and secure way to send money directly to banks and cash pick up locations abroad. You can even reload phones and pay utility bills in other countries right from your mobile device.

We give you the power to move your money amazingly fast.

Send money abroad fast
Send money from your phone directly to banks, cash pick up locations, and even cash delivery services around the world.

Send it again even faster
Want to send money to the same person again? After the first time, simply slide to resend in seconds – no need to fill in their recipient information all over again.

Reload phones in minutes
Add minutes quickly to prepaid phones of your friends and family in other countries.

Get text updates and access to help

Never worry about the status of your transactions with text updates and access to real human customer support in multiple languages.

You can update your opt-in status for push notifications through your device settings at anytime.

LEGAL
Limits and fees on transactions vary based on type of transaction including transaction history, payout location, payment instrument, and delivery method.

recentChanges:
Thanks for using Xoom, a PayPal Service!

In this update, we’ve made it easier to review your transaction details and have included enhancements to make your send-again experience more intuitive!
comments: Terrible app. Was letting me transfer money all along until one fine day the team decided that they couldn't verify information in my account. So now I can't transfer any more. If the information could not be verified how was i transferring before? Very unreliable. Might stop working right when you need to transfer money urgently. Thankfully there are many other apps that do the same thing, with less headache.

Its was good past 6 years Im using it. It was legit and transaction will be completed right away..you only have to wait a second!!! However, now its either website are slow or you have to wait 5 days before transaction will be completed.. If its going to be like this , might as well use western union or other money remitance If I have to wait that long!

Be careful and make sure your not over paying. No longer using this app unless of an emergency. They keep about 800 pesos after charging me a 5 dollars for fee. 800 pesos is about 40 dollars at the time. So they try to fool costumers thinking it was inexpensive. But at the end of the day they are taking a 45 dollar fee. Very expensive. Other than that for me the app was very easy to use and very handy.

Very slow - a simple 100 EUR transfer from PayPal balance within SEPA took 3 working days to complete. The process feels dated, competing services provide ID verification to speed up transfers setup and often complete transactions within the same day. Fees and exchange rates do not stand out either.

Useless system. They allow you to start a transaction, deduct the funds from your account and then make demands for documents to prove that you actually have the funds in your account before they authorize your transaction. Wasted over 12 hours trying to send money but eventually had to cancel because of their illogical demands. Avoid at all cost.

title: Netspend
description:
With the Netspend Prepaid Card, you’re in charge.

Features like direct deposit offer a convenient way to add money to your Card Account and get paid up to 2 days faster.(3) Use your card anywhere Visa(R) debit cards or Debit Mastercard(R) is accepted. And with the Netspend Mobile App(6) you can manage your account wherever you go. You’ll be able to do things like:

* Load checks directly to your Card Account—just by taking a few pictures.(4)
* Check your Card Account balance and transaction history.
* Send money to friends and family.
* Find no cost reload locations.(2)

With the Mobile App(6) it’s all at your fingertips.


(1)ID verification required.  We will ask for your name, address, date of birth, and your government ID number. We may also ask to see your driver’s license or other identifying information. Card use restrictions may apply.  See netspend.com or card order page for details. Residents of Vermont are ineligible to open a card account. 

(2)While this feature is available at no cost, certain other transaction fees and costs, terms and conditions are associated with the use of this Card. See the Cardholder Agreement. 

(3)Faster funding claim is based on a comparison of our policy of making funds available upon receipt of payment instruction versus the typical banking practice of posting funds at settlement. Fraud prevention restrictions may delay availability of funds with or without notice. Early availability of funds requires payor’s support of direct deposit and is subject to the timing of payor’s payment instruction.

(4)Mobile Check Load is a service provided by First Century Bank, N.A. and Ingo Money, Inc., subject to the First Century Bank and Ingo Money Terms and Conditions, and Privacy Policy. Approval review usually takes 3 to 5 minutes but can take up to one hour. All checks are subject to approval for funding in Ingo Money’s sole discretion. Fees apply for approved Money in Minutes transactions funded to your card. Unapproved checks will not be funded to your card. Ingo Money reserves the right to recover losses resulting from illegal or fraudulent use of the Ingo Money Service. Your wireless carrier may charge a fee for message and data usage. Additional transaction fees, costs, terms and conditions may be associated with the funding and use of your card. See your Cardholder Agreement for details.

(5)Fees for bank transfers are determined by the transferor’s bank and may be charged to the transferor’s bank account by the service provider or originating bank. No cost for online or mobile Account-to-Account transfers between Netspend Cardholders; a $4.95 Account-to-Account Transfer Fee-CS Agent applies.

(6)Netspend does not charge for this service, but your wireless carrier may charge for messages or data.

The Netspend Visa Prepaid Card is issued by Axos Bank®, The Bancorp Bank, MetaBank®, and Republic Bank & Trust Company, pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. The Netspend Prepaid Mastercard is issued by Axos Bank, The Bancorp Bank, MetaBank, and Republic Bank & Trust Company pursuant to license by Mastercard International Incorporated. Axos Bank, The Bancorp Bank, MetaBank, and Republic Bank & Trust Company; Members FDIC. Please see back of your Card for its issuing bank. Netspend, a TSYS® Company, is a registered agent of Axos Bank, The Bancorp Bank, MetaBank, and Republic Bank & Trust Company. The Netspend Visa Prepaid Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted. The Netspend Prepaid Mastercard may be used everywhere Debit Mastercard is accepted. Certain products and services may be licensed under U.S. Patent Nos. 6,000,608 and 6,189,787. Use of the Card Account is subject to activation, ID verification, and funds availability. Transaction fees, terms and conditions apply to the use and reloading of the Card Account. See Cardholder Agreement for details.
Mastercard is a registered trademark, and the circles design is a trademark of Mastercard International Incorporated.

summary: An app made with one thing in mind. You.
developerAddress:
NetSpend Corporation
PO Box 2136
Austin, TX 78768-2136
recentChanges: Fixed minor bugs and performance improvements.
comments: I have been with Netspend for 4 years. And for the most part been happy. But I gave 1 star due to my experience today. I got a bigger sized credit from a refund we got and all of a sudden I can't use my card or my account. Then we try to call it says the info we put in is wrong so we can't even talk to anyone. App and online pulls up and everything looks fine. This is a nightmare. All the money I have is in that account and I can't touch it. Thanks a lot! Hope ya'll get it fixed soon!

Its a great app. Especially if use the flash pay . money is sent from one card to another instantly no charge but only to other cards whose bank that NetSpend supports. This card has saved me numerous times when I needed money transferred immediately to me. Customer service was excellent handling an issue with monthly fees

I have to at least like this app since I use their prepaid card, but the "Mobile Check Load" is horrible. It's problem is that it's Autocapture doesn't capture at all. It complains that it's too dark to take a picture. Despite using a dark background, and trying to keep the phone still, and trying to find a light or nonshade to use to brighten the check, I usually have to manually take the picture. Why can't I manually take the picture to begin with? I could before the last update. Trying to use it today, I had to manually take the picture 13 times to get it accepted at all. Look, if I could afford Hollywood lighting to take a picture of a check, I probably wouldn't need a prepaid card, right? Ingo Money Inc. is very bad.

I have been with netspend for almost 3 years but most recently I can't sign into the mobile app no matter what I do I have had the same username and password forever!!! It's really frustrating and disappointing at times... other then this recent issue it's great!! Hope netspend fixes this ASAP!!!!

Just like other preload Visa's that can be used internationally. Except that sites will suddenly stop accepting and you gotta buy another one. They charge $1.50 a transaction unless u shell out $10 a month. They also have maintenance fees. I don't recommend unless no other choice. If u use with any frequency I'm sure your getting gouged in the long run.

title: Givelify Mobile Giving App
description:
Use the Givelify mobile giving app to conveniently give and track donations to your place of worship or charity from your smartphone.

Enjoy easy access to accurate donation records for tax time. 

The app removes the frustration of passwords, text-to-give codes, and endless electronic forms. Givelify’s mobile giving app is the most desirable option for donating electronically during fundraising events, religious services or on the go.

Learn more at http://www.givelify.com

summary: Givelify makes giving to your place of worship or charity easy and beautiful
developerAddress:
47 S Pennsylvania St.
Ste 902
Indianapolis, IN 46204
recentChanges:
"I have always loved the app. It makes things easier to pay my tithes. I just wish there was a way to refer the app to my college son so that he can do the same." Feature Request by Neffateenia T.

Neffateenia, we have an update just for you. With our new share link on every organization's profile, you can share your favorite place of worship or nonprofit directly with your network and do more good together with Givelify.
comments: A user-friendly app that is safe and secure. It verifies your gift via e-mail immediately after you make it. It keeps a running total per annum and allows you to print your info, which is very handy for tax purposes. Very helpful during this pandemic when church services are being cancelled or are going virtual. Highly recommend this ap.

🤗 Today, was my first time using this app. With practically every venue being shut down on due to the coronavirus, I'm not attending my church. I'm thankful that with this app, I'll be able to continue to financially support my church. The process was simple and you're able to designate each amount as you see fit. Thank you, Givelify developers. 👏🏾👏🏾
Convenient and Easy to use! Thankful that God's Church Ministries and so many other churches we visit have this option for me because I never carry cash and cannot stand writing checks!
Very easy to use. In a time pf crisis where churches are being shut down. It's good to habe an EASY way to still give God his 10% and support the church.

My experience has been great! With this app. Provide good friendly customer service that's ready to answer any questions or concerns you may have and my donations get to my church the same day been using it for year now. So far no disapointments here

title: Acorns - Invest Spare Change
description:
Acorns is your guide to financial wellness. We’ll help you invest, save and spend responsibly for just $1, $2 or $3 per month. No surprise fees, just surprise upgrades. Join over 7 million investors and start investing your spare change for the future. Supported by leading investors, innovators and press like BlackRock, PayPal, Ashton Kutcher and CNBC.

CNBC recommends Acorns as a “simple, low-stress way to start investing.” (1)

Invest for your future
• Automatically invest your spare change from everyday purchases
• Learn how to get more from your money with easy-to-understand articles and videos from financial experts
• Add or withdraw your money whenever you need to
• Just answer a few simple questions to get your own investment portfolio built by experts and personalized to fit your goals

“Acorns takes saving to the next level by helping you automatically invest.” -Forbes(2)

Spend smarter
• The only checking account with a debit card that saves and invests for you
• No low-balance or overdraft fees and free or fee-reimbursed ATMs nationwide
• A sleek, tungsten metal debit card in signature Acorns green
• Earn up to 10% extra bonus investments from select local restaurants and businesses

“You think you need thousands of dollars to invest...not the case anymore because there’s an app called Acorns.” -Good Morning America(3)

Earn bonus investments with Found Money
• 350+ top brands that invest in you when you shop
• Earn even more from side gigs with Airbnb, Uber, Lyft and more

“Acorns is my favorite money app, because it makes it simple and cheap to make small investments.” -Business Insider(4)

Grow your knowledge
• Learn how to get more from your money with easy-to-understand articles and videos from financial experts

Security that’s strong as oak
• All your information is protected by bank level security, 256-bit encryption and never stored on your devices.
• Acorns Securities, LLC is a member of the Securities Investor Protection Corporation (SIPC). Your investments are protected up to $500,000.

recentChanges: To help your 2020 get started right, we made some enhancements and fixed a few bugs, because we believe small change adds up. Happy New Year! Grow your oak!
comments: Just horrible. I had this app and I was trying to cancel my subscription and it doesnt even let me. I know others have this issue as well. It says I need to withdraw all my later money before unsubscribing and it doesnt let me withdraw because I have less than 5 on my account. I had this issue for over months now and it just keeps billing me every month $2. I didnt take it seriously but those 2 dollars add up. On top of that I never made a cent of a gain and I just lost. Horrible app

I love this app and everything it could be. Let Acorns invest for you from one of several different strategy profiles. My only issue with this app currently is the UI is a little complicated. It feels like running around a messy room. Finding a specific place can be a huge run around. This app is a must if you want to invest but not be bogged down with having to complicated financial strategy.

I use Acorns as my main checking account. Infinitely better than the bank I had before (Chase). I like that it immediately subtracts spent funds from your account so you don't end up in the negative when a transaction takes a while to go through. You can choose how aggressive you want your investment portfolio to be and how much you want your round ups to be. Anytime I've had to call them, they answer almost immediately and support is knowledgeable and helpful. I definitely recommend them.

The only thing thus far I don't like is the now 3 dollar a month subscription. It was 1 dollar at first now it's 3 dollars. I didn't request for the increase. This may affect my decision to stay ... Also there's no option to change your bank at will, you have to contact someone to detach your account but not to enter it, this is suspect to me. If this does not change. I'm gone. Thank you for the opportunity ...

They won't let me link my debt card. I have notified them several times. They say it is my fault because of an old version. So I unloaded and reloaded the app. I was told to do it off of my computer, and that didn't work. It is just too bad they do not have a good enough tech team to fix problems. They were supposed to give me $5.00 for each person I got to sign up. That didn't happen and I was there when my friends signed up. Closing my account has become extremely hard. I have emailed acorn!!

title: Remitly: Send Money & Track International Funds
description:
Send money internationally quickly, safely, and at a lower cost. Join the over 1 million customers who send money around the world with us and download the Remitly app today.

With Remitly you get:

SAFE AND SECURE DELIVERY OPTIONS: We let you choose how you want money delivered to your recipient. You can fund your transfer with your bank account or card and your recipients can receive funds directly into their bank account or at a cash pickup location. We also give you the ability to send money to a mobile wallet such as M-Pesa or home delivery in select countries.

SPEED & PRICE OPTIONS: With our EXPRESS option we can send your money within minutes. We offer great exchange rates and little-to-no transfer fees.

DUAL CURRENCY: We give you the ability to send money in the currency your recipient needs. Once you fund a transfer, the money you send can be picked up in your recipient’s country in USD or local currency. This option is available at cash pickup locations, select bank accounts, or through home delivery in select countries.

We back every transfer with our PERFECT DELIVERY PROMISE, an exact date and time that you and your recipient can expect the money to arrive. Once the PERFECT DELIVERY PROMISE is provided to you, we provide you with tracking on the movement of your funds as it approaches the destination and we keep you updated each step of the way. Your money arrives when promised or we will refund your fee.

We follow strict PCI Data Standards and 256-bit data encryption. Remitly is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Payment Services Regulations 2009 for the provision of payment services. We are also registered with the HMRC as a money service business.

Send money to the 49 countries shown below:

LATIN AMERICA & CARIBBEAN 
Send money directly to a bank account or instantly to 57,000+ cash pickup location in Mexico, Costa Rica, Ecuador, El Salvador, Guatemala, Honduras, Nicaragua and Panama, Argentina, Bolivia, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Paraguay, Peru, Uruguay, Haiti, Jamaica and the Dominican Republic. 

In Mexico alone you can send to 25,000+ cash pickup locations in Mexico including Bancomer, Elektra, BanCoppel, Bansefi, and many more or have money delivered right to your recipient’s doorstep with Caribe Express in the Dominican Republic.     

AFRICA 
Send money directly to a bank account in Nigeria, Kenya, Rwanda, Ghana, and Morocco.

Send money instantly to 11,500+cash pickup locations in Ethiopia, Kenya, Morocco, Rwanda, Senegal, South Africa, Ghana,Tunisia and Egypt.

Send money instantly to mobile wallets such as M-pesa in Kenya and several major Mobile Money operators in Rwanda, Uganda and Ghana.

ASIA 
Send money directly to bank accounts in India (i.e. HDFC, Axis Bank, ICICI, SBI), China, South Korea, Nepal, and Malaysia.

Send money directly to a bank account or instantly to 72,000+cash pickup locations in the Philippines (BDO, BPI, Metrobank, Cebuana Lhuillier, M Lhuillier, GCash, any SM mall), Vietnam, Sri Lanka, Indonesia, Bangladesh, Thailand, and Pakistan. 

Send money directly to your recipient’s doorstep with Home Delivery via Sacombank in Vietnam. 

Send money to Mobile wallets in the Philippines, Bangladesh, Indonesia, Nepal, and Sri Lanka.

EUROPE
Send money directly to bank accounts or instantly to 12,500+ cash pickup locations in Poland, Bulgaria, Romania, and Turkey.

Send money directly to bank accounts in Hungary, Croatia, and Czech Republic.

We are actively working on adding new countries and expanding our network coverage. Stay tuned!

recentChanges:
Thanks for being a Remitly customer!

- This update includes a handful of bug fixes and tweaks to improve your experience.
- You can now send money from Singapore!
- You can now send money to Guyana, Comoros, Cameroon, Cote d'Ivoire and Tanzania!

Remember: We are always here for you. Feel free to reach out to us or find a number of help topics at help.remitly.com.
comments: This is my first use for this app and so far came through with flying colors! I usually read reviews to assess a company, I came across some very negative ones about this company and was wary about using but I took a chance. Customer service and speed was great! I was using two well known services but dropped them! The "invasive" questions was for my protection which was okay with me due to the many scams. I needed to send a relative funds right away and they came through! For now 5 stars!

Excellent service and the best app to send money. Been using for almost 2 years now. I've tried a couple others, but always come back to Remitly. They finally added ACH and debit cards to receive money. Best customer service. Chat is often available and the reps are always helpful. I can basically manage my own transactions; cancel etc on my own. Rates are a little delayed and the Android widget doesn't have an option for different update increments. As close to perfect as it can be.

USER BEWARE! Transfers stay in limbo for days, every time you call their help desk they ask you more private, personal information, and even though they make you stay on the line for over 2 hours and supposedly have cleared your transfer, next day it still hasn't made it through. Now even their phones are down! This app should be reported as a scam

I read the positive reviews after getting a bad experience with other sending apps. I am happy with the service money reflected same time and it is easy to use and it let's you know on the status of the transaction. I will delete all the apps for sending money and use Remitly only! ❤

For the main reason that it was developed and provided by anyone or possibly an Indian or Pakistani, this will never be safe to have. Good luck on having your money taken or mistakenly overcharge. I wish you all the best of luck and will never use this app again. Use a tracert program and you'll be able to find out where it goes.

title: Yahoo Finance
description:
Your #1 finance destination to track the markets and the economy.

Follow the stocks you care about most and get personalized news and alerts. Access real-time stock information and investment updates to stay on top of the market.

Favorite features:
• Track the performance of your personal portfolio
• Follow stocks to get real-time quotes and personalized news
• Discover detailed financial information such as historical financials, ESG ratings, and top holders
• Go beyond stocks and track currencies, bonds, commodities, equities, world indices, and futures
• Compare and evaluate stocks with interactive full screen charts
• Sign in to view and edit your web portfolio on the go

Helpful tips:
• Follow all the stocks you care about by searching for the ticker and tapping the star icon
• Create multiple watchlists to organize the stocks you follow
• Enable notifications for price alerts, breaking news, earnings reports, and more
• Sync your portfolios across devices

About Premium billing:
Want to make the most of Yahoo Finance? Upgrade to a Premium subscription for exclusive tools that help you maximize your profits with confidence.

You can choose to be billed $34.99 monthly or $349.99 annually. Payment will be charged to your iTunes account as soon as you confirm the purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew at the end of each billing period unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can cancel at any point in your App Store account settings.

recentChanges: We update the app as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you.
comments: Charts stopped updating about half way through the day. Cost me a few good entry points, but luckily it wasnt the other way around and I didnt lose any money. This was easily a 4 star app at the beginning of the day, but about 1 PM it just stopped automatically updating the charts I was following. Please fix this ASAP!!

In the most recent update, it seems you guys tried to fix the alignment of % change (y-axis) such that it aligns with the leftmost bar. It is still messed up. The 0% aligns with the top of the solid bar and the bottom of the hollow bar. It should be the other way around. Please fix it asap. It is nuisance.

The look of the app changed and got slower, so I updated it . Still looks the same, very slow , almost unusable. ..I use this for several hours per day .I had no problems for years , now this....I would be happy how it was 6 monts ago...fix it please...we all are saying the same thing...I have an android phone f.y.i... Update 3/20/20 updated today, all better, fast, seems as good as it was a while ago....thanks

It's a battery hog. That needs to be fixed. There should be options for lower battery consumption mode. Not everyone needs stock updates every 100 milliseconds when app is running in the background. I am following up for the third time. When is this issue going to be fixed? Why should an app consume 25% battery in 4 minutes of use with background disabled? You have a lot of teams and hoops and loops... but this is insane. Let these go directly to the concerned person and fire the middleman.

New version is great. It got rid of the clunkiness and slowness of the old one. Thanks very much. One bug I noticed is a mention of three new posts for a ticker, when in fact nothing has been posted for that ticker in the last 24 hours.

title: JPay
description:
Your favorite JPay services – money transfer and email to prisons – now on the go! JPay Mobile email allows you to send photo attachments* and email multiple recipients.  With the updated Send Money service, you can quickly transfer funds to inmate trust accounts with your credit or debit card. You can even manage your JPay account.   
 
Features:
-Push Notifications for JPay email
-Send money with your credit/debit card*
-Prepaid Reply for JPay email*
-Write and receive emails*
-Attach and send photos*
-Buy JPay stamps*
-Create a JPay account       
-Manage your JPay accounts
-Search for inmates
-Saved payment options

*Available in select facilities

recentChanges:
- Fixed issues with payments going through and app crashes

- General bug fixes
comments: Works great, in all honesty, I'm glad I'm able to contact loved ones inside prison. I've encountered no issues with being able to contact them, or get a reply. Only thing that I could say would need improvement, is the time it takes to verify a safe message, but that doesnt come directly from the app, so I won't remove a star for that :)

All of a sudden it doesn't work anymore. I was logged out for some unknown reason then I logged back in and it makes me set it up all over again then when it gets to the part where I add the innate it says hes already added thennn there is no other option. If you hit back it logs you right back out. Thennn when you restart the app it just stays on the loading screen. Thennnn when you uninstall then re install it, it is the same damn process all over again...

This app used to work. Now, after the 20.1 update, it does not work. Trying to roll back to an earlier version also does not work. The usual troubleshooting does not work. This is a jpay server issue. Uninstalling and reinstalling does not fix, calling customer service does not fix. Guess their IT guy went on vacation or something. I'm expecting to get a cut and paste response to this rather than actual results, but we'll see.

My original rating was 3 stars because the email function isn't working properly. The app developer responded suggesting I call an 800 number or email support. I did both. During my call the agent explained that the email function didn't work because I needed to purchase stamps, so I purchased stamps.JPay still will not let me send an email. Same problem as before. The field does not auto fill with the recipient name as it should. Please help.

I am barely receiving any emails at all until a few days after they are sent & absolutely nothing at all during the weekends. Even if the facility flagged one or more of my emails I seriously doubt the system would be lagging as bad as it is. Something is seriously wrong with the overall speed of this app. Perhaps your IT department should run some type of diagnostic test to determine the overall issues. I pay money(my money that I earn) to buy stamps in order to send emails to my Loved One.

title: Fidelity Investments
description:
Put 70 years of Fidelity’s financial experience in the palm of your hand with the Fidelity Investments app. Quickly review news about your investments and interests with your customized Feed. Then trade, manage your money, deposit checks, and pay bills in just a few taps. You’ll stay ahead of the game using our in-depth market research—including Zack’s Bull & Bear of the Day—combined with timely, customizable notifications.

Stay connected to every aspect of the financial world so you can learn, track, and trade anytime—anywhere. 

Cutting Edge Design 
• New look and feel with simplified navigation 

Customized Feed Just for You
• Industry-first dynamic experience
• Timely portfolio, market, and research information 
• Customized news and tailored content

Manage Your Money 
• Manage your Orders, History, and Pending Transactions under Activity in Accounts
• Trade, Transfer, Deposit Checks, and Pay Bills under Trade + Transact 

View More Information in Your Watch List

Markets + Research
• Stay ahead of the game by gaining insights on: International Markets and Zack’s Bull & Bear of the Day 

News + Video 
• Access Fidelity Viewpoints and view Live Bloomberg streaming videos 

Accessibility

Alerts and Push Notifications 
• Receive timely, customizable alerts via push notifications or the message center 

Call a Rep

To learn more, go to fidelity.com/android.

comments: There are no 'Push Notifications' for Fidelity credit card or debit card or Cash Management transactions. There are no 'Push Notification' settings for these accounts. There used to be, but they are gone. The only notification setting is for trades. This problem has persisted since Version update 3.40. Recent update to 3.46 did not fix. Telephone calls and emails have not resulted in a fix.

My phone just upgraded to Android 10. Once it's upgraded, this app cannot start any more. I uninstalled and reinstalled again. It worked for once in the beginning, and then when launch next time it stopped on the first screen. And freeze there. It seems cannot start anymore. It worked perfectly fine with Android 9 but not after upgrade. I am a heavy user of the app, and need it fixed asap. Thanks.

The mobile app is not user friendly. I would like quick easy snapshots of investments. Desperately needs easier method if making and adding watchlist! I'd like to see my stocks and watch list's current, last open/close rates easily all together in one easy to see page. And why in the world are the watchlist from the website NOT SUPPORTED ON THE APP!?

Until a recent update in March, which happened right around the market crash, the app was working great. Now, I can not set any of my feed settings. I have set all of the parameters to show nothing, yet nothing changes. I have certain markets I was watching but decided I didn't want to see them every day, and I can't get rid of them now. Very frustrating. It WAS a great app. Now it take more of my time than I prefer.

Great app. I liked it better with the news and market stuff on the front page above account summary. Lot more colorful and interesting. Would be great if it showed daily info for 401k shares too. They seem to have pre loaded pages it fetches based on how good or bad the market is doing, and it seems to change throughout the week for reasons unknown. It can be a pain in the ass and frustrating because it's always changing where I have to look for the info im looking for.

title: Discover Mobile
description:
Discover card app is ranked highest in Customer Satisfaction by J.D Power among Mobile Credit Card Apps and Credit Card Websites and is #1 in:
 - Navigation
 - Availability of Key Information
 - Range of Services
 - Clarity of Information 

You can manage your Discover credit card and bank accounts conveniently and securely from anywhere, using Discover’s Mobile App. Check your account balance, view your account info, make and edit payments, manage your rewards, and more - all from your mobile device.

FAST ACCOUNT ACCESS
• Log in quickly with a 4-digit Passcode
• Enable Quick View to view account information without logging in 

MANAGE YOUR DISCOVER CREDIT CARD ACCOUNT
• Check your balance and available credit, and view or download monthly statements
• View and search transaction activity
• Make payments and edit or cancel pending payments
• Redeem rewards for statement credit or direct deposit in  any amount

recentChanges: - Bug fixes and performance improvements
comments: The app is easy to navigate. I love the products they offer and their customer service, but the app is down to do routine maintenance more often than I'd like, leaving you to have to call in. I also don't like how long it can take for pending transactions to be posted. App can be a tad bit slow when navigating from screen to screen, but generally straightforward and easy to understand. Love it 9/10 times.

Cannot log in, keeps giving " info does not match our records", or "temporarily unavailable". But, on webpage on browser I seem to have the SAME problem. It won't let me log in giving "technical difficulties" error message, or "temporarily unavailable, and that they are working on it". I know my log in is correct, but neither system let's me in. It must be a server problem... DEVELOPER, THIS NEEDS TO BE FIXED!!! THIS IS NOT WHAT YOU'D EXPECT FROM DISCOVER CARD.

It was working fine and then there are errors. I waited for the error to be fixed but it still doesn't take my payments and I couldn't message help on the app. And I am currently abroad now. Also, I changed my password twice and I still cant login to get in my credit card account like I normally did before;I have to reset and reverify over.. If this not get fixed, I may have to consider canceling Discover.

Doscover is just always there through any crisis. This card is really the only card I feel safe using. The representatives are always courteous, helpful and they want to make sure the company is working for their customers. I have been with Discover since 1974. I hope I never have to eat and swallow these words, but I really trust Discover Card.

Terrible, I just want to check my statements and this app takes forever to login with fingerprint every single time. When connected to high speed wifi it takes long enough, about 30+ long seconds, but when cell service drops to 3 bars of 4G or less forget about it, won't even load. Funny, Capital One app doesn't have this issue at all lol. Fix this issue and I'll fix my review to be better too.

title: Current - The Bank for Modern Life
description:
Current is the bank for modern life. We are a mobile bank and Visa debit card that gets you paid faster with no overdraft fees, no minimum balance and no hidden fees.

At Current, we believe our members should spend their hard-earned money on the things that matter most to them, and not on unnecessary fees and requirements. We deliver your paychecks up to two days faster than traditional banks when you sign up for direct deposit because while there are plenty of things in life worth waiting for, we don’t think your money should be one of them.

Signing up takes just two minutes and there is no minimum balance requirement to open or maintain an account. We’ll then ship your new card for FREE. Join the Current Community today!

CURRENT BENEFITS:

• GET paid up to 2 days faster with direct deposit
• NO overdraft fees
• NO minimum balance requirement
• NO hidden fees
• FREE cash withdrawals from 55,000 ATMs worldwide
• INSTANT gas hold refunds at the pump
• MOBILE banking w/ instant spending notifications
• SAVINGS PODS to help you automatically save money
• INSIGHTS personalized to track where and how much you spend
• DEPOSIT checks easily using your phone's camera
• INSTANT free, money transfers using Current Pay
• APPLE PAY and GOOGLE PAY supported
• TEEN bank accounts for those under 18
• BLOCK transactions from specific merchants
• SECURITY of an EMV chip on each debit card and the latest technology
• PRIVACY controls of fingerprint and facial recognition locks
• SUPPORT 24/7 (even on holidays!)

We offer a transparent pricing model with a completely free basic checking account and a premium account that costs $4.99 per month. A teen bank account has an annual subscription and costs $36 per teen per year. 

With accounts for those under 18, parents link their Current mobile app with their teen’s app and set the card’s spending limits, have full visibility into purchases and balances with real-time alerts and can instantly transfer money onto the card, all while teaching their teens how to manage their own money. 

Download the Current app today and sign up for an account in just two minutes!

summary: Get Paid Up To 2 Days Faster
recentChanges: Individual users now have access to over 55,000 in-network ATMs. Tap on the Free ATM finder in the app to find the ATM closest to you!
comments: So, I've been an advocate for Current since I had heard good things about its features. However, when you lose access to logging in because of a phone number change?? makes you glad that you only put in $40… but I kinda need my money that I saved for a rainy day (hmm maybe 'pandemic' day)?? Now my app is trying to make me apply for a new card… Get your coder tested. I think they're sick!!

First of all the only thing I have liked about this card is my check was deposited early. The fact that I did not want the premium account and wanted to read the fine print about it, because I hit the button and signed up for the 4.99 a month. Then you deactivate the old card before I received a new one is just ludicrous to me. Next, I go to transfer my funds from the account and the system is down. Let's just say you have lost a customer. I immediately stopped my check from being deposited.

They can get better. Need to fix current to current pay sometimes doesn't work you gotta send an email and wait like 7 days for a reply. And they need to stop putting accounts under review for over 6 days while holding your money is ridiculous. Also the chat team is not very skill. You ask them a simple question and they answer like a robot. 3 out of 5 times they don't understand or don't care what you're going through.

My Current card is excellent. My direct deposit arrived in 4 days. I am also excited about how my new current Card has an option button to either continue to keep the card "active" or to turn off the "active" function, when your current Card has been lost or stolen and perhaps compromised. I highly recommend the current Card to those wanting a more saver and secure card. I give the Max rating of "All Stars" to the creator of the current app & card.

I created an account. Waited the time and received my card. Between those i got a new phone and number. Still have the same email. It's been at least two weeks that current has said my account is under review. Well, current now you're under review and it's not looking good. I'm not so sure i want an account with you anymore. The customer service is terrible. After two emails to you about this nothing has been done.

title: Allstate Mobile
description:
Allstate Mobile is anytime access to one of the nation’s most trusted insurance providers. Pay bills… Report claims… Get roadside assistance, accident support and more.

You’re in Good Hands with these features: 
•	Drivewise® – Earn rewards for safe driving*
•	Insurance ID cards – The glovebox digging ends now
•	View auto coverage – Know how you’re protected
•	QuickFoto Claim® – File claims in a (camera) flash
•	My Agent – Access your agent’s info
•	Gas Finder – Locate and compare prices of nearby gas stations 
 
*Using Drivewise® as part of Allstate Mobile uses your phone’s GPS services. Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

summary: Wherever you are, you’re in Good Hands with Allstate®
recentChanges: We hope you’re enjoying Allstate Mobile!  In this update, we’ve fixed a few things to make the app faster and easier to use.
comments: It Is Basic I is basic and straightforward which I love. Being basic has its pluses and minuses. The plus is there is no clutter and you know where to find what you need. The negative of this app is there is no way to make contact with customer service. Which I over look because when I tell you my customer service is OUTSTANDING and ABOVE all other companies I have ever been with. Those are all understating the service I get from my team. Jay Haidari of Allstate and his team are AWESOME!!!

App hasn't worked for a few days since update. I can't even access my proof of insurance. Drivewise is buggy, constantly saying I'm "hard braking" and speeding over 80, when I'm in an area with low cell service.

If I'm somewhere without signal I can't pull up my ID card to show a police officer. The app must be able to show proof of insurance without an internet connection or the purpose is completely useless!
The app itself is great and easy to use. I originally gave 2 stars for DriveWise being very inaccurate but the update so far (for me) has fixed the issues so back to 5. Thank you
Constantly shuts down and have inquired as to why and it seems nobody knows. Have to always sign in. Need to be a stable app like spotify, weather channel and a few others.

title: BRD Bitcoin Wallet. Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, Crypto
description:
Trusted by 2 million users in over 170 countries, BRD is the fastest growing bitcoin and cryptocurrency wallet. Exchange, sell, and buy bitcoin (BTC, XBT), bitcoin cash (BCH), ethereum (Ether ETH), and ERC20 tokens in your bitcoin cryptocurrency wallet. 

With over $6B USD in cryptocurrency under protection, the BRD Bitcoin Wallet app for Android is the simplest, most secure way to purchase and protect your bitcoin wallet and cryptocurrency.

★★★Featured in the Wall Street Journal, TechCrunch, Fortune, Bloomberg & Business Insider★★★

EASY BITCOIN CRYPTOCURRENCY WALLET
Get started in seconds on our user-friendly cryptocurrency app! No registration or sign ups required to start your bitcoin wallet. Easily exchange, sell, hold or buy bitcoin, BTC, bitcoin cash, ethereum and other cryptocurrency. 

BUY BITCOIN & OTHER CRYPTOCURRENCY
Buy bitcoin and other crypto with a credit card, checking account, cash, or another cryptocurrency. Trade bitcoin (BTC, XBT), bitcoin cash (BCH), ethereum (Ether ETH), and over 100 popular ERC20 tokens instantly with other cryptocurrencies or tokens in your BRD bitcoin cryptocurrency wallet.

BITCOIN CRYPTOCURRENCY WALLET
Our crypto wallet stores bitcoin (BTC, XBT), bitcoin cash (BCH), ethereum (Ether ETH), and ERC20 tokens. Start your crypto wallet today! Buy, exchange and sell in your cryptocurrency wallet. Or store your bitcoin and other cryptocurrency.

SECURE DIGITAL CRYPTO WALLET
Store all your valuable cryptocurrency (bitcoin, BTC, bitcoin cash, ethereum, ether, ERC20 tokens) in a virtually unhackable environment, all for free! All cryptocurrency is protected on your own device utilizing industry-leading hardware encryption. Have peace of mind with your bitcoin crypto wallet.

BITCOIN WALLET & CRYPTOCURRENCY PRIVACY
No app signup is required. BRD connects directly to blockchain networks, not BRD’s servers. You are in total control of your privacy and bitcoin crypto wallet.

FAST BITCOIN WALLET SUPPORT
Get all your crypto wallet questions answered in less than 2 hours. Our global support team is ready to help everyone, from first-time bitcoin wallet buyers to longtime cryptocurrency wallet holders.

DESIGNED FOR CRYPTO WALLET BEGINNERS AND EXPERTS
The BRD Bitcoin Wallet app is easy for everyone, from crypto wallet beginners to seasoned bitcoin wallet experts. You’ll see how easy it is to exchange, sell, and buy bitcoins (BTC, XBT), bitcoin cash (BCH), ethereum (Ether ETH), and ERC20 tokens and other cryptocurrency in your bitcoin wallet. 

Want to see your favorite feature added to the next version of the BRD Bitcoin Wallet app? We'd love to hear from you at support@brd.com.
Follow us: Twitter @BRDHQ, Instagram @brd_wallet, Facebook @BRDHQ

Start today on our secure bitcoin cryptocurrency wallet app! Buy bitcoin (BTC, XBT), bitcoin cash (BCH), ethereum (Ether ETH), ERC20 tokens, and other crypto for your cryptocurrency wallet.

developerAddress:
Schindellegistrasse 3
8808 Pfäffikon SZ
Switzerland
recentChanges:
- XRP is now live!
- Introducing Fastsync. Fastsync enables wallets to sync in seconds, getting rid of those long syncing times. Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, and XRP are all backed by Fastsync. For Bitcoin, you have to go into your settings to enable it. Bitcoin Cash and XRP are enabled automatically. Let us know what you think!
- Bug fixes and general performance improvements.
Show us some love! Leave a review if you’re enjoying the improvements
comments: I've used them for years. For the most part everything works fine. However, when things don't go well there is no mechanism for contacting customer support other than sending an email...which may or may not be answered in a timely manner. It is frustrating to lose access to your wallet and then not be able to reach them for any help. It makes me very uncomfortable to use them for anything other than very small transactions.
Great wallet. Simple and easy to use. Fantastic customer support. Replied straight away to my email and fixed my problem. Very happy
I have sent money to my BRD account and it hasn't shown up yet! I have no idea where it went.
Love it. And a nice and safe way to send money anywhere in th world.

After days of jumping through all your hoops, sending down all your documents, seven full days later, my deposit was finally approved...now, it seems to be stuck there. I can't move it to a merchant. There's no hotline for help, and it takes you hours to respond to my emails. I received no concrete help with steps to fix the problem. You guys have been no help at all. Really disappointed.

title: U.S. Bank - Inspired by customers
description:
SIGN-UP & LOGIN
Easy access is the first step in saving time.
• Streamlined sign-up – We’ve made it easier than ever to enroll!
• Easy options for login – Choose to log in with a username & password or fingerprint.
• Login help – Step-by-step guide to reset your password if you get locked out.


ACCOUNT DASHBOARD
View accounts and manage money all in one place.
• Easily view accounts – Log in once to view checking, savings, credit cards, mortgage, loans, lines of credit, leases, brokerage, trusts, IRAs and CDs.
• Find it fast – Quick-action menus to quickly launch commonly used features.


PERSONALIZED INSIGHTS
Personal insights delivered to you.
• Personalized – Based on your spending habits, our app will offer insights on travel, cash flow, spending, saving and investing to help you manage your finances.
• Proactive – Insights highlight opportunities for you to better save, grow and protect your money.


MOVE MONEY
Moving money is easier than ever.
• Zelle® – Send, request and split money quickly and securely with friends and family and pay businesses that accept Zelle payments.1
• Mobile check deposit – Updated experience including improved photo-taking capabilities.
• Bill pay – Continue to pay bills and manage billers.
• Transfers – Available for your deposit, investment, broker and IRA accounts.


MANAGE ACCOUNTS AND PREFERENCES
Now it’s easier to customize your settings.
• Control your cards – Set travel notices, change your PIN, lock and unlock debit cards.
• Customize preferences to enable fingerprint login, manage overdraft options or remember username.
• Set account alerts to track balances, deposits, withdrawals, transactions and statements.


MARKETPLACE
Products and services to help you with your financial needs and goals.
• Personal – Compare and apply for checking and savings accounts, credit cards, mortgages and Simple Loans.
• Small-business lending – Compare and apply for business loans.
• Investment – Find an advisor, open brokerage and Automated Investor accounts and IRAs.


HELP YOURSELF
Here to help with what you need, when you need it!
• Share your screen – When you call for help, you can allow an agent to view your device’s screen to provide better support.
• Guided help – When you pause while making a transaction because you’re unsure what to do next, the guided help feature will automatically appear and recommend next steps (available in Zelle initially).
• Help Center – When searching for a topic, access the Help Center through the main menu.


The Fine Print:
1. Must have a bank account in the U.S. to use Zelle. To send money to a business, a consumer must be enrolled with Zelle through their bank’s mobile app or enrolled in the Zelle app with a deposit account. Businesses are not able to enroll in the Zelle app with a debit card and cannot receive payments from consumers enrolled in the Zelle app using a debit card. Terms and conditions apply. Please refer to the Digital Services Agreement for more information. A fee applies when a Zelle payment is received into a U.S. Bank business account. Zelle and the Zelle related marks are wholly owned by Early Warning Services, LLC and are used herein under license.


U.S. Bank is committed to protecting your privacy and security. View our privacy pledge at usbank.com/privacy. The U.S. Bank Online Risk-Free Guarantee protects customers from fraud loss. Learn more at usbank.com/riskfree. For more information about mobile banking at U.S. Bank, please visit usbank.com/mobile or call us toll-free at 800-685-5035.



© 2019 U.S. Bank
Deposit products offered by U.S. Bank National Association
Member FDIC, Equal Housing Lender

- New feature updates can be viewed by visiting the Help section.
Thank you for choosing U.S. Bank!
comments: Update, March 2020: The app has become unusable. I mostly use it to deposit checks and every time I try to photograph a check it photographs the front over and over and over. Then after 4 or 5 times the app crashes and reboots. For the past 2 weeks it was similar but not as bad. It would photograph the front numerous times and then finally let me photograph the back. But in between there I had to dismiss a bunch of warning screens. It took about 15 minutes to deposit each check.

EDIT: I had to reduce my rating due to a bug. The check-scanning software asks for a front photo twice, then, instead of prompting for the back photo, exits, but puts the last photo taken of the two in both spots. This was very confusing. Fortunately I was still able to complete my deposit by tapping the back-of-check button and similarly taking two pictures. - The app works pretty well, with the features you'd expect like mobile check deposit, external payments etc. Good on ya guys.

The requirement to provide & verify my cell number to receive a verification code which needs to be inputted each and EVERY time I log into the app is a serious pain in the ass. I do not use the app because of this. Well, tried the app again 3 months later, still requires my device to be verified with an additional code via text every time I log in, even after inputing my password and selecting the "remember me" option. Deleted once again.

Loaded it fine. Sign in took several tries. Depositing a check is too hard. 3 photos of each side! I don't know if I made 1 or 3 deposits. Signs me out after a couple of minutes of non-activity (how is it non-activity if I'm trying to deposit a check), not 5 like it claims. I'll try to work with it, but it's rough.

I just downloaded this app and have tried to deposit a check. After I choose the account to deposit to & enter the amount, I can't find a way to take the picture of the check. I have tried calling the bank numerous times for help and always get a 15 or 30 minute wait. Gave up till later I guess. I am one of the high risk seniors with COPD/not supposed to get out. I am going to delete app and download again. PLEASE HELP!

title: Amex
description:
Access your American Express® account from virtually anywhere with the American Express® App. Take advantage of what your U.S. Personal, Small Business, and Corporate accounts have to offer: Track spending and rewards, find offers, pay your bill, add your Card to your mobile wallet, and enjoy features available only in the app.

STAY ON TOP OF YOUR SPENDING
Track recent purchases with a timeline of your activity, and sort your charges by amount and date. Easily see your payment status and pay your bill from virtually anywhere. Turn on AutoPay to pay your bill automatically from your bank account each month. Check your spending power to find out if your purchase(s) will be approved*. For Basic Card Members: filter transactions to see spending and subtotals for each Card on your account.


FIND AMEX OFFERS
Discover offers from places you shop, dine, travel, and more, and add offers to your Card with just a few taps. Explore a map of nearby offers and get personalized alerts.


ENJOY PEACE OF MIND WITH REAL-TIME ALERTS
Turn on purchase alerts to be notified when your Card is charged so you can stay on top of daily spending and unexpected charges. Receive instant fraud alerts if suspicious activity is detected, and verify charges with just a few taps so you can get right back to using your Card. To help prevent fraud activity, you can also freeze or unfreeze your Card to limit purchases if it is misplaced, without closing your account completely. Set up Card payment alerts as a helpful reminder when your payment is due, and confirmations when payments are received. Enjoy the convenience of electronic billing statements, and you can set up alerts to tell you when your statement's ready.


EXPLORE REWARDS AND BENEFITS
Check your rewards balance and find ways to use Membership Rewards® points - from gift cards to credits on your statement.** For eligible Card Members: refer a friend and earn rewards when friends and family get an American Express Card through your referral. For Platinum Card®, Centurion®, and Hilton Honors Members: find an airport lounge on the go. Locate nearby lounges and plan for an upcoming trip by searching the 1,000+ lounges across the globe Plus, Platinum and Centurion Members can seamlessly access Platinum Concierge, Travel or your Customer Care Professionals through the app.


*Approval based on account status at time of request
** Terms and Conditions for the Membership Rewards® program apply. Visit membershiprewards.com/terms or call 1-800-AXP-EARN (297-3276) for more information. Participating partners and available rewards are subject to change without notice.
The value of Membership Rewards points varies according to how you choose to use them. To learn more, go to membershiprewards.com/pointsinfo.
App and app features are available only for eligible Card accounts in the United States. American Express® Prepaid Cards and cards issued by non-American Express issuers are not eligible.
To log in, Card Members must have an American Express user ID and password or create one in the app. All access to and use of this app is subject to and governed by the American Express End User License Agreement, Terms of Service and Privacy Statement

The American Express® App supports devices that are operating on Android 6.0 and later. To access your account information please visit https://www.americanexpress.com

recentChanges: • Bug fixes and enhancements
comments: I love the one finger tap of convenience feature throughout the App. I never have buffering issues or the pause forever, and then white screen never loads problem. I'm truly pleased with the AMEX app and their CSR Team for whatever & whenever I need assistance. AMEX "IS" the way to go!!!

User friendly app but i often try to use my rewards points and get a message that says "our system is not responding, please try again later". I havent been anle to use my points for a month now. Other than that the app is great
This app is fine, but it's incredibly frustrating. Keeps making me enter password, when I set up fingerprint login so I don't have to remember the password.

I had no problem with fingerprint sign in. I had to look for the "log out" function: click on "My Account" to find it. Log out should be immediately visible as a single-click function (bank accounts also require hunt-and-search for log out --- why? I'd also like to see a running balance beside each charge listed. Four Stars: someday, someone will figure out how to set up finance apps for clarity and efficiency.
Great app, very convenient. Sldo use it to pay the balance, quick and handy.

title: Walmart MoneyCard
description:
Easily manage and access your money on your Walmart MoneyCard at any time.
• View balance and transaction history
• Find nearby Walmart stores and ATM locations
• Pay Bills
• Stash money in the Vault

For Cardholders with the Walmart MoneyCard with Cash-Back Rewards, you can also: 
• View Cash-Back Rewards balance  
• Deposit checks using your smartphone
• Order paper checks

OTHER CARD BENEFITS INCLUDE:
• Shop online or in-store everywhere Debit MasterCard® or Visa® debit cards are accepted in the U.S.
• NO overdraft fees
• NO minimum balance or credit check to get a card today

Questions about your Walmart MoneyCard?

Call us at the number on the back of your card. Or log in to walmartmoneycard.com & email us through the Help & FAQs - Contact Us page.


Optional services, features or products, like using photo check deposit, may require additional customer verification and will require your acceptance of those applicable fees, terms and conditions.

Other fees apply.  ATM access only available on personalized cards. ATMs may incur a $2.50 charge, $0.50 for balance inquiries, plus any applicable ATM owner fees. Visit walmartmoneycard.com for more info.

Technology Privacy Statement: https://www.walmartmoneycard.com/account/legal-info

Terms of Use: https://www.walmartmoneycard.com/account/legal-info

Green Dot Corp adheres to PCI DSS compliance. The Walmart MoneyCard is issued by Green Dot Bank, Member FDIC.

Green Dot Bank operates under the following registered trade names: GoBank, Green Dot Bank and Bonneville Bank. All of these registered trade names are used by, and refer to, a single FDIC-insured bank, Green Dot Bank. Deposits under any of these trade names are deposits with Green Dot Bank and are aggregated for deposit insurance coverage.

recentChanges: Enjoy a new visual design. Now Walmart MoneyCard Cash Back Accounts acquired after October 8 can get free cash reloads at Walmart stores when using the app.
comments: I have had my card over 5+ yrs now. I only had an issue once with it. I get paid 3 days before pay day, direct deposit hits early in the day, no extra or hidden fees EVER. Anytime i have had an issue with a transaction, they fixed it immediately. I always recommend this card over all other pre paid cards. Its easy to use online also. If you cant understand it then you may need to use a rush card or something.

It doesn't work! Update: I have uninstalled and reinstalled this app a number of times on my cell phone and it still won't accept my user name and password! I've tried everything I can think of and can't get it to work! It appears I'm the only one having this issue so there would be no reason so it to be updated or fixed! Very frustrating that I can't check my balance when I'm away from my laptop!

Have very few problems with this card. I've read the other reviews, most are user error. Not the card. I've had it over 2 years. I dont have my apps on auto update so I have to go in an update myself. If I wait to long Walmart Card will send me an email just to remind me. I use the lock feature all the time, and live it. Only issue I've had is poor internet will make the app fail to load properly or not allow for me to unlock my money. And again this is not the app's fault that the internet where I am is slow or down.

I have had this app for years, and an account even longer. All of a sudden recently I moved and called the bank to have them update my info. The next one time I tried to use the app after that, it started making me verify by sending a code that my email or phone number. Well I the bank never updated my phone number, and the app is not sending the code to my email. I have yet to speak to a supervisor or anyone that could help. I'm changing to Chime. Hire ppl that can be understood on the phone.

The in app 24/7 chat support never works. Always looks like it's connecting then say sorry unavailable try again later. I've been trying since I downloaded the app and it still hasn't worked. Also the P2P isn't working on my end. I'm able to send money, but never receive it. Customer service hasn't been able to help with this either. I'm gonna go back to my regular greendot card which worked better and with no problems.

title: MyBlock
description:
Take control of your tax life and manage your Emerald Card® Account all year long.
- Capture charitable donations, receipts, and tax documents on-the-go. 
- Check your card balance, view your transaction history, and find ATM and Reload locations.
- Estimate your potential refund.
- Find an H&R Block office or schedule an appointment.
- Access your current and prior-year tax returns with ease.
- Keep tabs on your return status. 
- Make a payment to your Emerald Advance Line of Credit.

recentChanges: Thanks for using the MyBlock mobile app!  Our team recently released a number of performance improvements and bug fixes.  If you have questions or comments please contact us at 1-800-472-5625 or email us at myblockapps@hrblock.com.
comments: This app is so buggy! It's okay if you only have a small number of docs to upload, but the more I tried to upload, the more problems I had! It took several attempts to successfully upload documents until it finally froze completely. When I restarted the app, it no longer recognized my login credentials. What a waste.

Great 😁 I've used hr block to do my taxes for 15 yrs and they are always absolutely awesome. They make sure I get back every single cent back that I am owed.and the my block app let's me know with in a min or two when my refund is added to my emerald card before the IRS informs me,hr block is the best company to deal with for your taxes 😁

It's beenore than a month using this app .and up to now I haven't received notifications or updates at all...I used every help they offer regarding my refound return status and zero( 0) nada ..careless on notified alerts or progress on tax filings ..sucks ...H&R ARE RATED BEST TAX PRO AGENTS .....they are bit to expensive foling ure W-2.....o know people that paid less then half theoney they charge me...already got return tax money on them .
Not sure what happened but I can't login in anymore. I click on login and it just goes blank. Previously last night I was still have to login, but all of my info was gone, just not there.

Horrible I can't even sign in I've even updated to the latest version and your app just sits there and stares at me I've tried several different ways make this work I highly recommend don't even bother with this app it sucks

title: NYSE Live Stock Market
description:
The Market Edge Stock Tools app is the best stock market app to track NYSE Stocks and stay on top of the global stock markets.
- Easy to manage and track your money and stocks anytime and anywhere.

App covers multiple assets from DOW Jones, NYSE & Nasdaq exchanges, so that you may track Indices & Sectoral Indices from NYSE Exchange Market.

What makes The Market Edge Stock Quotes app different?

■ Feature of Market Edge App :
- Get Real time Prices of NYSE Stocks.
- Get Stocks Related News
- Streaming Price on Watch-list and Stock Detail Page.
- Get Global Finance Information.
- Get Key Details Of Stock Such as PE Ratio, EPS , Shares , Market Capital , Volume ,Inst
own , Day Low - High , Year Low - High , Day Change etc.


■ Easy-to-Use Interface
- Extremely light & User-friendly interface and easy-to-use stock app to be compatible with all mobile devices. You Track DOW,INX,,NYSE,TOP Gainer,Top Looser & Most Active.

■ Real time Price Info : Get live quotes of major stock APPL ,GOOGL, MSFT ,FB ,BOA,SP100,VIX,NDX,JX,LUV,SIG,JWN,ULTA,AMZN,BABA,HRB etc.

■ Personalized Watchlist :
- Create your own customized portfolio as a personal tracker to add the ticker and monitor your investment of favorite stocks.


■ App disclaimer :
Data is provided by Google and Yahoo ,Money Control and may be delayed as specified by financial exchanges or our data providers. Endro Edge does not verify any data and disclaims any obligation to do so. All data and information is provided “as is” for personal informational purposes only, and is not intended for trading purposes or advice. Please consult your broker or financial representative to verify pricing before executing any trade.
