Fix Data Issues
Fix Bugs & minor crashes.

Let me know if any concerns.
comments: I really like all the info that this app has available. I do wish that users could reorder the tabs. For instance, I would rather open straight to the graph and have the news as my second tab. I love the easy access to all info but I want to be able to personalize by my preference.
Great app so far. I like the stories and the watchlist ability. It would be nice to be able to rearrange list though. 4.5 stars for that reason, otherwise, solid app!
I like this app, keeps me up to date. One less star because the live stream is behind real time. Don't use this for buying, only monitoring.
Very handy app. Has what I need and up to date on the fly. The only thing I can wish for is an ad free version. If there is one, I don't see it.
EXTREMELY INFORMATIVE!!!! It is a treasure trove of information. It is an AWESOME educational tool. I have learned so much by using the particular app.

title: Self - Build Credit While You Save
description:
The Self credit app (formerly known as Self Lender) is a way to build credit history while you save*. Build credit with Self, even if you have a low credit score (or no credit score!)

Over 500,000 people have used Self’s Credit Builder Account to build credit and save more than $300 million. With the Self Visa® Secured Credit Card, you have even more opportunities to build credit after you get started.

How does it work? Think of it as a plan that builds credit while you save, starting at $25** per month.

1. Apply for a Credit Builder Account. Your money is safe and secure in a bank account.***
2. Pay off your Credit Builder Account in 12-24 months.** You can choose the payment term and dollar amount that best fits your budget.
3. Each on-time monthly payment builds credit history and adds to your savings*. Your monthly payments are reported to all three credit bureaus while the principal gets saved in a bank account.***
4. Unlock your savings. Once you’ve paid off your Credit Builder Account, your money unlocks and comes back to you (minus fees and interest).

BUILD CREDIT. SAVE MONEY*
With an active Credit Builder Account, your payments are reported to all three credit bureaus.
 
CREDIT SCORE MONITORING INCLUDED****
With the Self credit app, you can check your credit score at no cost. The mobile credit tracker!
 
NO HARD CREDIT PULL
Self does not do a “hard pull” credit check when you create an account. In fact, no credit score is required at all!
 
SECURE ACCOUNTS
All accounts use two-factor authentication, 256-bit encryption, and fraud detection to protect your money and private information.
 
UNLOCK THE SELF VISA® SECURED CREDIT CARD
Have an active Credit Builder Account in good standing, make at least 3 credit builder account monthly payments in full and have $100 or more in savings progress and you could unlock access to a secured credit card – no extra deposit and no hard credit check needed.
 
WHY PEOPLE LOVE SELF
“Love love love this program and this app! In eight months my credit went up a hundred and nine points Super happy and can't wait to renew once the first year is up” - customer Debbie G. Individual results may vary.
 
Featured on ABC News, USA Today, Newsweek, TechCrunch and NerdWallet
 
TERMS
When you download and use Self, you agree to the Terms of Service at: https://www.self.inc/terms-of-service

PRIVACY POLICY
You may review Self’s privacy policy at: https://www.self.inc/privacy-policy
 
*Savings are minus fees and interest. Results are not guaranteed. Improvement in your credit score is dependent on your specific situation and financial behavior. Failure to make monthly minimum payments by the payment due date each month may result in delinquent payment reporting to credit bureaus which may negatively impact your credit score. This product will not remove negative credit history from your credit report.
 
**Sample products are $25 monthly loan payment at a $520 loan amount with a $9 administration fee, 24 month term and 15.92% Annual Percentage Rate; $150 monthly loan payment at a $1663 loan amount with a $9 administration fee, 12 month term and 15.91% Annual Percentage Rate. Please check the pricing page in the Self mobile app or www.self.inc for current pricing.
 
***Credit Builder Account — proceeds are held in a deposit account until maturity
 
****Credit scores will only be available to customers who our third-party vendor is able to validate.

All Credit Builder Accounts are issued by Lead Bank, Member FDIC, Equal Housing Lender, Sunrise Banks, N.A. Member FDIC, Equal Housing Lender or Atlantic Capital Bank, N.A. Member FDIC, Equal Housing Lender. Subject to ID Verification. Individual borrowers must be a U.S. Citizen or permanent resident and at least 18 years old. Valid bank account and Social Security Number are required. All loans are subject to ID verification. All loans subject to approval.

The Self Visa® Credit Card is issued by Lead Bank, Member FDIC, Equal Housing Lender.

recentChanges:
Thank you for using Self! This app update includes:
- Improved handling for unstable internet connections
comments: Awesome app. Definitely helps that stupid loophole of " to have good credit, you have to have credit already in order to build credit". This app and many others alike help young people like me get started on building credit out of nothing. Very happy with it. The credit card though, is there anyway to increase the credit without paying off the balance just yet? The whole point is keep paying over the year or two to build said credit, but a higher credit limit would be nice.

This is the most amazing app ever for anyone who needs to build/rebuild their credit. I had filled ch. 7 bankruptcy and been discharged about a year ago now. Needless to say, my credit was looking rough. Now, after 2 months of payments, credit is up 136 points! I don't know how it works, but it works and that's all I care about. Amazing service being provided here with equal opportunities for all.

Since I was already working on my credit prior to getting the CD (Dec 19) and CC (Feb 20) thru them, I can't say for sure which did what or anything at all but my credit has gone up at the minimum 50 points already! But the app is very useful and user friendly. Has an answer for pretty much everything I had a question regarding. I have the $150 12 month loan!

My credit went up a couple points after opening account. The thing that i do not like is the daily withdrawls that come out if my account. It is only pennies daily but after a year this will add up. I am sure it is some kind of interest or fees. I will finish off the term of the loan and will most likely be done with it but anything can happen. I have only had this account for two months. So a little early to tell

Excellent service. I was skeptical as there are a lot of "fake" or misleading services that exploit people with no/low or bad credit, especially of lower incomes. If used responsibly, this WILL build your credit, and build a bit of savings that can be used to also get a secured VISA credit card that compliments the main account. It WILL hurt your credit if payments are missed, etc... but if you are trying to build/fix your credit but are on a fixed or lower income it's still manageable $25/mo.

title: PNC Mobile
description:
Get 24/7 access to your PNC Bank account information and services from your Android mobile device. PNC Mobile Banking is a free service offered to all PNC Online Banking customers.

•  Check Balances - See current account balances for your checking, savings, and credit card accounts.

• View Transactions - View recent transaction history in your checking or savings accounts.

• Transfer Funds - Transfer funds between your eligible PNC banking accounts.

• Mobile Deposit - Use your camera equipped Android device to deposit checks.
 
• Pay Bills - Make one-time bill payments to billers you have entered in PNC Online Banking.

• Send Money with Zelle℠ - The new way to send money simply, securely, to almost anyone in minutes.

• Cards – PNC Pay lets you make in-store purchases using your PNC credit, debit and SmartAccess cards using your Android mobile device.

• Locate PNC- Locate the nearest PNC Bank Branch or ATM using built-in Location Services or search by zip code and street address.

• Security - With PNC's security & privacy, you can be confident that your personal and financial information will be protected while using PNC Mobile Banking.

summary: Get 24/7 access to PNC Bank accounts and find the nearest branch or ATM.
recentChanges:
Thank you for using PNC Mobile. In this release, we’ve made some minor enhancements and added the following:
Hide or display accounts on the Accounts Summary screen
comments: Deposit process worked as described. It complains that I don't have my mobile phone number registered but errors when I attempt to register my phone number. I'm told it's because multiple profiles (a PNC requirement because one account is a business account) and the phone numbers can't be used in more than one profile? If you can't manage the small business owner with one phone user story, maybe the constant request for phone setup isn't a feature. Maybe the error message could be less vague.

I have been using this app since 2013 and in all of that time, never have I ever had so many issues with this app as I have in the past 4 months. I used to be able to deposit checks without issue, now keep getting "unable to validate the amount" error. Tl;dr: App is useless for depositing checks since December 2019

The app seems to be working again with this new update. Thanks. Next time, do not tell me it's my fault and that there have been no complaints when so many of the reviews state otherwise. - - - - - I have loved this app in the past. Since the last update it crashes as soon as I open it. I will give a 5 star rating when this issue is fixed

Not able to log in or change password even though I've input my SS number, pin and account number correctly on the PNC bank app. (Also tried on laptop- no better) I've even called if for assistance and they can't figure out what's wrong with the PNC app. Zelle was better before the forced merger between Zelle and PNC apps. I wish I could use Zelle alone. 2 years on Zelle and never had a problem. One DAY fooling around with PNC and I can't get anything done.

Network error....please check connection. I cannt log in all of a sudden. I have emailed developer three times. No answer. With covid 19 i really rely on this app and its been great but i need help now so please help fix this and ill give 5 stars.

title: Drive Safe & Save™
description:
You’re in control of your auto insurance discount with Drive Safe & Save. Get a discount of about 5 percent just for signing up! Then at your next renewal, we’ll tailor your rate based on how you drive.

How it works
•	 Record your driving habits using your smartphone, along with a free Bluetooth beacon we ship to you
•       Review your trips on interactive maps featuring alerts for rapid acceleration, fast cornering and hard braking
•	 Get tips on how to improve your driving scores based on key driving characteristics
•	 Trips record automatically. No need to log in or manually start the app each time you drive

Installation instructions for the app: 
1. Download the Drive Safe & Save app. 
2. Once downloaded, log in using your statefarm.com® user ID and password**. 
3. We’ll ship you a Bluetooth beacon after you enroll. When it arrives in the mail, come back to the app and follow the “Complete Setup” instructions. 

That’s it!
•A trip automatically begins when you start driving, so there is no need to manually start or repeat app login.
 •Do not use your phone while driving.

 You’re on your way to a discount* on your State Farm auto insurance premium.

*In some cases, how you drive determines how much discount you may receive. Discounts may vary by state and coverages selected. A discount may not be available in California or North Carolina, depending on individual facts and circumstances. 

  **We use your statefarm.com account for Drive Safe & Save access.  No account yet? No worries. You can create a statefarm.com user ID and password in the Drive Safe & Save app. The policy must be in the format of a first and last name. Businesses, trusts, DBA, etc. are not eligible at this time for a statefarm.com account. Contact your State Farm agent for details.

summary: Take control and save on State Farm® auto insurance with Drive Safe & Save™
recentChanges:
What’s New
Version 3.3.0

This latest version of Drive Safe & Save™ includes various fixes and other enhancements so that you:
· Get a red notification on the Trips tab to indicate that there are new trip details to review

· Can scroll on multiple screens (if you have a smaller phone)

Like Drive Safe & Save? Write a review.
comments: Hasn't recorded a trip since 3/2. I've uninstalled, reinstalled several times. It connects to the beacon, and the next screen is the odometer. I enter it, hit OK, and it goes right back to asking me to enter the odometer. I've restarted the phone, uninstalled and reinstalled again, and it won't work. Too much time wasted on this thing. I do not recommend.

I thought the app would be great to shave money off my insurance as I only drive to and from work. I just don't see how this will work when not all my trips get recorded, or it only records a mile of a 18-mile trip. This app is very faulty and, now I'm not able to use the app at all. The beacon refuses to pair accurately with the app. I am on the 3rd beacon in as many weeks. This is ridiculous. I really despise Drive Safe and Save. This app has been extremely annoying and severely unreliable.

The way that this app registers phone usage is fundamentally flawed, and the devs will just copy and paste a generic response to every review that is pointing out this issue. The detection of being "movement and screen on" captures false positives for a plethora of different situations. It's silly to implement a half-baked feature like this. I get dinged for every trip when using my phone once I've PARKED AT MY DESTINATION. It's silly that your algorithm doesn't remove these.

This app is like a virus it sucks the life out of your phone. Is constantly trying to connect to your phone. Brings your rating down when you answer the phone on bluetooth. Shows erratic driving while in construction zones. Said I was speeding I am about ready to say the hell with my discount and send it back. I turn the bluetooth off and the app keeps telling me it cant record my trip when I am sitting at home. The damn thing beeps all damn night. I uninstalled and reinstalled several times.

This app was good, and I got almost a 30% discount for the current 6 months of my policy, but it feels like lately the sensitivity has been turned way up. I was always been 96% and 99% for the first 6 months I had the app, and now I am sitting at 91%, and it feels like I'm getting points taken off on like half my trips. I used to be able to go a week or more and 20+ trips without losing any points.

title: CNBC: Breaking Business News & Live Market Data
description:
The CNBC mobile app lets you access accurate and actionable business news, financial information, market data and primetime programming faster than ever. Breaking news alerts are delivered instantly to your phone, enabling you to stay on top of the market. Watch the live stream, video clips and episodes directly on your mobile phone or Android TV device so you can keep up with your favorite CNBC primetime television anytime, anywhere!

Following stocks and keeping up with the market is easier than ever with our mobile app. Stocks are easily tracked in customizable watchlists so you can get real-time stock market quotes and global market data on your phone throughout the day. View trading data pre-market and after-hours, with charts with customizable time frames, all from your mobile device.

In addition to following stocks and the markets, you can watch video clips and full episodes of daytime financial programming from CNBC’s top commentators and the best of CNBC primetime entertainment.  With streaming support for mobile devices and Android TV, you can stay up to date on business news, politics, finance and primetime shows wherever you are.

---

CNBC Mobile App Features:

Stock Alerts
- Global stock market coverage around the clock - create and track your favorite company stocks from your mobile device in real-time.
- Investments made easy with stock quotes, interactive charts and customizable time frames.
- View trading data - pre-market and after-hours.
- Cryptocurrencies now available.

Business News
- Live stream news while you’re on the go so you never miss an update.
- Finance News updates can be sent directly to your phone, so you know all the latest in stocks, investing and economics. 
- Political News – be the first to know the latest in politics with CNBC
- 24-hour coverage of top business news, economic analysis and expert opinions, personal finance, investment, technology, politics, energy, health care and more.

Stream TV Shows on your mobile device and Android TV:
- Watch news clips for free, or log in with your cable or satellite subscription to live stream full episodes.
- Search for topics and shows on Android TV with your voice or remote.
- Live stream your favorite CNBC TV business day and primetime shows, including:
    - Mad Money with Jim Cramer
    - Closing Bell
    - The Deed
    - The Profit
    - American Greed
    - Jay Leno’s Garage
    - Shark Tank
    - Squawk Box with Joe Kernen, Becky Quick and Andrew Ross Sorkin
    - And all of your favorite CNBC programs!

Download the CNBC App and get all the latest updates so you’re always on top of the latest entertainment, business, finance and stock news.

Do Not Sell My Personal Information: https://www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy/notrtoo?brandA=CNBC&intake=CNBC

developerAddress:
30 Rockefeller Plaza
New York, New York
10012
United States
recentChanges:
Bug fixes and performance optimization.
We always read your feedback so please keep it coming! You can submit feedback to our Customer Care team at customercare@cnbc.com
comments: I like this app. It is very clean in that it presents a lot of info in an uncluttered way. The news section is informative with a good list of top stories. The watchlist section loads very quickly, easy to navigate, very straight forward to set up multiple watchlists. Top grades for this app. I also use it with tabldt and phone, all synched. Thanks!

All the news you get is great, you just cant share. Changed to s10+ from s8 and the complete action screen has usless choices no texting just email, continue on pc, bluetooth. Had Verizon look in my phone and found they couldn't do anything about it. That it must be the app not the interface of the phone which they suspected at first.... update..still nothing. Have reset the phone & reinstalled the app Nobody interested in communicating. Just there proprietary news I guess or they would fix it

I do not like the home page what so ever. The website gives you news every 5 mins and on the app, it does not relay the same news. The same articles will come 30 mins or even an hour or more after. Please fix this and I'll give a better rating. It needs to be as good as/better than the website.

Excellent app that is easy to use. Even a novice, like myself, can easily be guided to set up a watchlist. The app has good clarity, provides lastest news & gives you the ability to watch "on the go" literally. This is my "go-to" app first thing on a weekday morning to check important market news that would relate to any investing.

Very easy to use. I use this App to track my stocks in multiple watchlists, and track the markets and the futures. Also, the news. As a new user, I am sure I am not using all the advanced features. But, I am hoping to get there soon. Thanks.

title: MoneyGram
description:
With MoneyGram’s mobile app, you can send money worldwide (as a guest or a registered user!), track transactions, pay your bills, estimate transfer fees for online and cash transactions, find locations, manage your account, and much more! 
 
Send Money Quickly and Affordably

• Send money as guest, with no registration required
• Send cash, deposit to a bank account, or send to a mobile wallet
• Pick up cash in more than 200 countries and approximately 350,000 locations worldwide
 
Pay Bills Securely and Reliably

• Pay Bills as guest, with no registration required
• Make payments to thousands of companies including auto, mortgage, child support, utilities and more
• Safe, convenient, reliable and easy-to-use
 
Estimate, Track, & Locate

• Estimate transfer costs before you start a transaction
• Check the status of transfers you’ve sent or are expecting to receive
• Map locations near you or anywhere in the world
 
Enjoy the Benefits of MoneyGram Plus

• Exclusive promotions and discounts
• Faster cash transactions 
• Receive notifications and view your cash transaction history

Enhanced Security & Information Protection

• Protecting you and your financial information is our first priority
• 24/7 monitoring of online activity

recentChanges: Some bug fixes and improved app performance.
comments: Does not allow access even after an account is created, it says the information is incorrect. (I'm well aware it isn't.) then upon creating a new account (assuming it didn't go through) it comes up with an error saying an account already exists, then tells me the MoneyGram services are unavailable. What? I'm trying to get a homeless friend home during this Coronavirus epidemic so he can be with family and this shuts down? BBB ain't gonna be too thoughtful about this.

experience is very good, works good and fast, had login problem that i caused by mistake on my end, site locked me out until i talk to someone live, was very fast and polite representative. site very secure. Updates work well, been using app for several months now and no problems yet.
My early experience like not being able to select names of people I have previously sent money to. I always have to manually add them. Not being able to edit a transaction like name correction.

I send money home all the time, and moneygram has been easily the fastest, most convenient, and reliable app that I have used. There are limits on how much you send, but a little inconvenience for such a reliable service is not the end of the world.

During coronavirus pandemic my credit union has limited service...I was short $13 to pay a bill....with moneygram I was able to deposit money from a credit card into my checking account. This was very important and saved me alot of stress! I mailed my check out on time to pay my bill

title: BofA Prepaid Mobile
description:
With the BofA Prepaid app, you can easily access your BofA Prepaid accounts anytime anywhere all from your phone! You must have received a BofA Prepaid card from an employer, government agency or company with whom you do business prior to using the BofA Prepaid app.* 
This application is free to download and makes it easy for you to manage your Prepaid accounts on the go!
 FEATURES 
Once you've created a passcode for logging on, you'll have access to:
* View Prepaid Card balances
* View Prepaid Card transaction history
* ATM Locator
* Suspend or reactivate Prepaid Cards
* Manage alerts
 MOBILE SECURITY
Your security is our priority. Mobile data transmissions and account information are protected by the same highly secure SSL Standards, just like they are when you access your Prepaid accounts online. Experience the freedom of mobile account access at the palm of your hands!
 For questions about the BofA Prepaid app, please contact us by calling 844.511.1331 or emailing mobileservices@prepaidcard.bankofamerica.com 
 *This is not the Bank of America Mobile Banking app, which allows you to access your Bank of America, N.A. bank and Merrill Lynch brokerage accounts.
 
Terms and Conditions: https://prepaid.bankofamerica.com/content/PRC384/_Docs/DIGITAL-BofAPrepaid-Terms.pdf 	

Privacy Notice: https://prepaid.bankofamerica.com/content/PRC384/_Docs/DIGITAL-BofAPrepaid-Privacy.pdf   
 
Bank of America N.A. Member FDIC
© 2020 Bank of America Corporation

recentChanges: ​Patch to fix biometrics and Quick Access issues
comments: Unable to log in, keeps having error. Logged in on a computer to make sure that my information was correct and had no problem. Unless this is resolved I will not be able to use this app as much as I would like to be able to. I have seen it work on a friend's phone without issues, not sure why I (like many others here) am unable to log in.

This app is very simple and intuitive in its format but many things are full of glitches and it is very limited in what it offers. I cannot figure out how to transfer my funds to a different bank account. I have a prepaid card for plasma donation at Grifols and they used to use Wirecard before they switched to BoA. I preferred Wirecard infinitely more.

Be PATIENT! The "fingerprint" login WORKS just fine. When you get the "fingerprint recognized" message - if you wait just a moment - you will be rewarded with your account balance and other click-able settings & information. Believe me, please... The biometric login WORKS!

App works as it should. Quick to update transactions. The only downfall (which isn't a huge deal) is the fingerprint access doesn't work. I set it up, it recognizes fingerprint, but when I go to log in the next time it doesn't work. All my other banking apps have no issue.

Worst banking app. From day one months ago I made a account. Have never been able to log in. Ive try many of times to reset password never ever ever has it emailed me any type of link with a code to do so. Never. Huge pain in the ass have to call every time. And at the least why cant i just send a txt to see balance so i dont have to even bother with the app.

title: CreditWise from Capital One
description:
Know your credit score and much more
 
Capital One CreditWise® is a free tool to check and monitor your credit score and it’s AVAILABLE TO EVERYONE not just Capital One® customers. Use CreditWise to understand what makes up your score and find helpful ways to take action to improve it. If your score is where you want it to be, use CreditWise to keep an eye on your accounts and get alerts when something changes on your TransUnion® or Experian® credit report.
 
Used by millions of Capital One customers, CreditWise (formerly CreditTracker) is key for anyone who wants to know, improve, or monitor their credit score. Using CreditWise won’t hurt your score, and you won’t ever be asked to enter a credit card number.
 
All features are free:
● Weekly TransUnion® VantageScore 3.0 credit score.
● Review your credit report from TransUnion® to look for signs of error, theft, or fraud. Your credit report includes open/closed accounts, balances, hard inquiries, personal information, and public records that have been reported to TransUnion®.
● Use the Credit Simulator to see how everyday decisions affect your credit score.
● Learn about the key factors that make up your credit score and how you’re doing on each of them.
● See personalized suggestions to help improve your credit score.
● Get alerts letting you know about changes to your TransUnion or Experian credit report, if your Social Security Number or email address were found on the dark web, and if any new names or addresses were associated with your Social Security Number.
● Simple, everyday tips on how you can take control of your credit.
 
Prepare Before You Act
 
How could closing a credit card account affect your credit score? How much could your score change if you pay off half your credit card debt or all your debt? See how these decisions could impact your score before you act by using our Credit Simulator.
 
Frequently Asked Questions
 
Q: Can everyone access the CreditWise app?
A: Yes. You just have to be 18 or older.
 
Q: Does using CreditWise hurt my credit score?
A: No. You can utilize all of CreditWise’s free tools and features without hurting your score.
 
Q: How can I use my CreditWise credit score?
A: Your CreditWise score is a good measure of your credit health and its progress. And just like any score from any source, chances are your CreditWise score won’t be exactly the same as the one your lender uses. That’s because lending decisions are complex and consider a number of different factors and scoring models.
 
Q: I’m already enrolled in Capital One CreditTracker. Can I use the same username and password?
A: Yes. If you’ve already enrolled in CreditTracker, use the same username and password that you use to sign in to service your accounts on CapitalOne.com or to access the Capital One Mobile servicing app.

And just like any score from any source, chances are your CreditWise score won’t be exactly the same as the one your lender uses. That’s because lending decisions are complex and consider a number of different factors and scoring models.

Q: I’m already enrolled in Capital One CreditTracker. Can I use the same username and password?
A: Yes. If you’ve already enrolled in CreditTracker, use the same username and password that you use to sign in to service your accounts on CapitalOne.com or to access the Capital One Mobile servicing app.
summary: CreditWise from Capital One - Free credit score and monitoring
recentChanges:
Here is what's included in our latest update:
We made some performance improvements to make your experience better throughout the app.
comments: Best CC app I've ever used. And I would recommend Capital One/CreditWise to anyone trying to rebuild their credit. Don't fall for others charging annual fees. It will hurt you in the long run when you inevitably cancel the card. Who wants to pay annual fees in perpetuity? That's how the others make their money on the backs of people with bad credit, sometimes thru no fault of their own. GL.

Let's me know if my email address was found on the dark web, so I changed my password and installed additional authentication to be able to access my email, as well as additional security on other personal items. It also alerts me when inquiries are made, and new accounts opened. This is 100 times better than just checking your credit once or twice a year. You are alerted, you can check for accuracy to make sure you- not someone inquired/opened the account so you take appropriate actions.

I like this app because it shows all my credit reports and updates every 7 days which I think is very great in my book. Also, it tells me what I can do to improve my credit score even more. I just wish that I can pay all my bills at once and then my credit score will be going up the roof😂😉 Anyway, when I get a more secure job I will pay more amounts but definitely when I pay off Capital One off, I will go back to them! Keep up the good work!

Making payments is simple. It alerts me of any impact to my credit score and who and what is making the impact. This app also gives updates on your credit score, tells you when the next credit score update will take place, and gives you stats on areas that impact your credit good or bad. Informs you of ways to improve in areas that are not execellent. I log in with my fingerprint so I've not been having any log in issues like the others have mentioned in their reviews.
Love the app, it's easy to use and understand. But I would like if there could be more details. Like dates of past inquiries, what company opened the inquires, things like this. Like credit karma.

title: QuickBooks Self-Employed:Mileage Tracker and Taxes
description:
Are you self-employed, a freelancer or an independent contractor? Organize your finances with QuickBooks Self-Employed and let us help you find your tax deductions & returns in time for tax season!. Put more money in your pocket during IRS tax season with this convenient mile tracker, expense tracker, invoice generator and tax deductions estimator. Become a tax pro with easy-to-use online services. 

QuickBooks Self-Employed users have found billions in potential tax deductions by automatically tracking mileage for work. Save receipts and attach them to business expenses, send  invoices and categorize business expenses apart from your personal finances. Get all the tax refunds a self-employed business owner is entitled to! 

Track Mileage Automatically!.
•  Mileage tracking automatically works using your phone’s GPS, without draining your phone’s battery.
• Trip mileage is saved and categorized to maximize mileage tax deductions.

Scan Receipts
• Receipt scanner enters transaction information & can easily save receipts.
• Business expenses are automatically matched and categorized – saving you time and maximizing your tax refunds so that you are ready for IRS tax time.

Expense Tracker to Organize Business Expenses
• Self -employed, freelancer or small business owner – manage business finances easily and keep up to date so you do not miss out on any tax deductions.  
• Import business expenses directly from your bank account.

Get Paid Faster
• Create invoices and send invoices easily on the go. 
• Enable payments and bank transfer services to get paid faster.
• Invoice generator – get notified when invoices are sent, paid, and money is deposited!

Stay Prepared For Tax Time
• We take care of your bookkeeping so you can avoid year-end surprises 
• Easily organize income and business expenses for instant tax filing
• Directly export Schedule C income and expenses.
• Instantly export your financial data to TurboTax Self-Employed by upgrading to the Tax bundle*.

*Users will receive one state and one federal tax return filing.

Purchased TurboTax Self-Employed? Activate QuickBooks Self-Employed today at no extra cost

Already have QuickBooks Self-Employed on the web? The mobile app is FREE with your subscription, and data syncs automatically across devices. Just download, sign in, and go! 

Price, availability and features may vary by location. Subscriptions will be charged to your credit card through your account. Your subscription will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage your subscriptions in Account Settings after purchase. QuickBooks Self-Employed is from Intuit, the maker of TurboTax, QuickBooks, and Mint. 

To learn how Intuit protects your privacy, please visit http://security.intuit.com/privacy
*Based on QuickBooks Self-Employed users who have identified less than $100k in deductions
*Based on TY15 subscribers that have identified >$0 in business expenses and of those users that have >$0 in tax savings

 *Getting paid 2X faster based on U.S. customers using QuickBooks Online invoice tracking & payment features from August 2016 to July 2017

recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements to help you make the most of QuickBooks Self-Employed.
comments: I have been using QuickBooks for a year now, it is ok , you can follow your expenses and have all organised when the app is working properly. In my case, recently the transaction function does not record all data from my bank for the last month , is the second time this happens. Also they make it so difficult to get human help , I have to spend half an hour goin through the AI questions to get the help I need. Not really reliable when you have to check expenses continuously.

If you get a new phone you start from ZERO . Unlike other receipt keepers. That's super problematic and makes this make all effectively useless. Glad I changed phones earlier in the year rather than later when I may have had months of receipts to try to categorize. Pass on this app until it figures out a way to be able to transfer business rules, receipt saving and etc across multiple phones for a single email/account

Today my phone (android) has installed the latest update as promissed. Problem is... it has changed all my "milleage" tab km to miles on my phone. ALL my logged km have automagically converted to miles eventhough it still shows in km. I cannot even, with some certainty, tell if the conversion is even accurately due to not having a back up log. What's going on with you guys?

I would not suggest this paid app. If I could get my money back I would. The software kept increasing my expected tax payments every time I modified transactions to the point that my expected payment was 3 times my actual income. Pretty poor functionality for the most fundamental of purposes for this app.

Update 3/10/2020 Wish I could get a refund. Customer service is non existent. The assistance they claim to provide me is the same as my last complaint. App is currently not accepting mileage updates when I select personal or business. App still shows wrong bank account information. They still deposit funds into the wrong account and have zero ways of changing the default account, or at least they've not provided me a means to change accounts. They also like to bombard you with TurboTax spam.

title: Turbo Card
description:
Track your account 24/7 and more with Turbo® Visa® Debit Card



FEATURES:

Activate a new card
Find a free ATM* 
Pay bills anytime, anywhere
Deposit checks
Get direct deposit info
Slide for balance
Find places to deposit cash
Stash money in your Vault
Send money to friends and family



CARD BENEFITS:

Shop online or in-store everywhere Visa Debit cards are accepted in the U.S.
NO overdraft fees, ever
NO minimum balance




What else can this account do?

Monthly and other fees apply.

recentChanges: We’ve enhanced our features to include a total of fees paid within the transaction history.
comments: Great but depends on where you go to reload. Some of the locations I've been to ask for ID which I understand but I've had a few places not letting me add cash money to my card maybe because it was above 500 dollars but then again I guess it depends on the place some locations are more knowledgeable than others I guess.

I'm not one to complain but I did my return Feb 23rd, my return said I got it March 11th but I never received the card. I try accessing my account but you need the card to even login. I want to talk to a specialist but I've been on the phone for 40min. I want a direct contact to talk about my card and when it's coming in, not an automatic message.

Have not recieved card with tax return yet it has been since february 11 when I filed Balance shows on card but still don't have the card Have been calling number to report missing and have yet to get anyone to answer phone and send it App is only good for use when you have card not still waiting for it to arrive Help!!!!!!!!! This wait to get someone to send card is deadly

So I set everything up on the card after we got it. I was able to set up what I wanted and check my accounts etc. Today I try to get into my account, using the same info saved on my tablet to sign in. All of a sudden it is telling me we don't have an account. I go through resetting the log in info. It let me reset it but now it is telling me there is a problem with my log in info.....so I tried resetting the sign in stuff again thinking I might have messed up. No success. Will not use again.....

I did my taxes on February 26th 2020 and it gave me the option of getting the turbo card and that it would arrive between 5-10 days and it is now march 11th 2020 and i still have not received my card and i was told i was supposed to have a temporary card information but i did not get it and i cant get to the money in my account and I have Bill's that I need to pay so I called them the lady was rude as hell and she told me that I would get my card faster at no cost but they still took the money.

title: TD Bank (US)
description:
Bank anytime, anywhere with the TD Bank app – for personal and business.

The updated TD Bank app gives you secure, on-the-go access to your accounts, along with powerful and intuitive tools for managing them.

•	Deposit checks with a convenient check-capture tool
•	Pay bills to almost any company or person
•	Lock and unlock misplaced or lost debit/ATM cards
•	Open an account in app
•	Send or receive money to and from friends and family
•	Make transfers between your accounts
•	Change your password and other profile settings
•	View account balances and activity
•	Review your statements
•	Give us your feedback right inside the app
•	TD ASAP (TM) - Live Customer Service 24/7

By clicking "install," you consent to the installation of the TD Bank (U.S.) app provided by TD Bank, N.A. and to any future updates/upgrades. You are also acknowledging that you understand that the TD Bank (U.S.) app and any future updates/upgrades will/may perform the functions described below at TD Bank, N.A.'s sole discretion. You may withdraw your consent at any time by deleting or uninstalling this app.

TD Bank, N.A. Member FDIC

recentChanges:
You asked, we listened! You can now access your TD Bank credit cards account from within the mobile banking app. View credit card statements, manage alerts and redeem your rewards all in one place—no extra apps or passwords required!
 
We’ve also fixed a few bugs.
comments: Most of the time it's just better to use the mobile website. I don't see much benefit in using this app. Biggest downfall not able to use fingerprint login which is a huge inconvenience. Check mobile deposit took forever to get working. Other issues more general with TD like not able to pay a loan from external account & accounts disappearing overnight.

Compared to other similar apps I have used for over two years, this is just excellent. The technology is designed with the seniors in mind. I never had to repeat taking pictures of my deposit instrument, unless I made an entry mistake by my self.

App easy to install and use. Depositing a check once it has been set up on the devise to be used. It's simple, sign, take pictures both sides, amount deposited, to account. A note lets you know, put deposit on check & date. You're done.

User friendly, except for the photo capture. It takes the picture automatically and is quick. Should at least give an extra second or two to adjust the position of the phone or check. Or maybe let the user have the option to use a button to take the picture.

I have a mobile access to my account and very much appreciate being able to deposit checks online. However, sometimes I want to send a deposit of more than $5000 in the same month. That means I have to drive to the bank and make that deposit in person. I live quite far from my bank, so that takes time and gas. I would very much appreciate being able to deposit more than $5000 a month when needed.

title: Root Car Insurance: Good drivers save money
description:
Root is the easier, more affordable way to insure your stuff. Good drivers can save up to 52% on car insurance. Renters insurance starts at just $6/month when you bundle with auto. It’s affordable coverage for the things that matter most, and it’s all conveniently located in the Root app.

-----
Root car insurance:
Unlike traditional car insurance companies that base rates on demographics, like your age, marital status, or gender, we use a mobile app to measure driving behavior and base rates primarily on how people actually drive. By removing bad drivers from the equation, we’re able to keep our rates low. Good drivers save up to 52%. There's a reason we’ve been featured in Forbes, TechCrunch, Wired, The Washington Post, and Fortune Magazine. (See disclaimers below.)

Why choose Root car insurance?

Good drivers save up to 52%
• Drive with the Root app for a free quote
• Your driver score is the #1 factor that goes into your rate (progressively making car insurance more fair)
• Don’t pay for bad drivers (like you would with other companies)

Car insurance, all in an app
• Customize to fit your budget and pay for your policy
• Add vehicles and drivers
• Make changes and instantly see the difference in price
• File a claim and snap photos to submit in 5 minutes

Root member benefits
• Good driver discount automatically applied
• Roadside Assistance included with every policy
• Free Lyft rides on select holidays
• Earn referral bonus offers

-----
Root renters insurance:
If you rent your house, condo, or apartment, you can get renters insurance starting at just $6/month. And that covers more than just the stuff in your home—your stuff stays covered even when you take it out into the world, like when you’re traveling. It also helps replace items damaged from smoke or fire, and helps pay for a place to stay if your home is too damaged to live in. It even helps pay for medical expenses if someone gets hurt in your home. It’s a whole lot of coverage, for a very low price.

It’s easy to use and conveniently located in the same app as Root car insurance, so you can have everything you need in one place. And, you get a 5% discount for bundling car and renters insurance.

-----
Root Insurance. No agents. No paperwork. No hassle. Bringing simple, affordable insurance nationwide. Get the good driver discount you deserve, and make sure all your stuff is covered for less. To start, download the Root app today.

Start saving money with car insurance based primarily on how you drive. Bundle with renters insurance to get a 5% discount. Download the Root app and get a quote now.

Learn more by visiting our website: https://www.joinroot.com
Being cheap is smart: https://www.joinroot.com/cheap-is-smart

Connect with us on social:
https://www.facebook.com/rootinsuranceco
https://www.instagram.com/rootinsuranceco
https://twitter.com/rootinsuranceco
https://linkedin.com/company/rootinsuranceco

-----
Disclaimer for quotes: We reserve the right to refuse to quote any individual a premium rate for the insurance advertised herein.
Disclaimer for savings: Based on savings reported by actual customers who purchased a new Root policy between September 2018 - August 2019; changes in coverage levels not evaluated.
Disclaimer for coverage: Coverage is available in the event of a covered loss. Exclusions may apply.
Form 1. Not available in all states.

Copyright ROOT 2019. ROOT is a registered servicemark of Root Insurance Company, Columbus, OH.
Telematics is not used and resulting represented savings are not applicable in California. Referral program also not applicable in California. Visit joinroot.com/califaq for more information. Roadside Assistance purchased as separate coverage in CA.

recentChanges: This week's release contains a few bug fixes and performance updates.
comments: I have had no problems with the driving test but weird how I did perfect on my test but my rate went up not down so I'm a bit skeptical and feel like a bait and switch is at hand . I'm not sure as to why the rate went up either . No explanation was offered that I could plainly see . But it maybe that i didn't look closely.

Root has been absolutely awesome. I know that most of us are just looking for the cheapest monthly payment, and honestly this is it. If you're not a crappy driver, you're probably gonna save money with root. Besides that, the app is great, and they let you push payments back. What more could you want?

Drains half the battery on a brand new s10+ This is totally unacceptable. The app CAN NOT tell the difference between you driving and being a passenger the GPS in your phone is only accurate to around 1-3 feet (huge discrepancy) with a metal roof over your head. I'll be cancelling soon, I spend more time worrying about this stupid app, yes even in the car, then I ever would have paying the little bit per month it saved me (less then 10$). Get it together your app is killing your business!

Yes it is convenient and quick getting a quote, sign up and do everything through the app however even if you complete the 30-day test drive with a PERFECT 10/10 result, your rate will still go up anyway!! They claim it is still lower than most competitors which may be true. However, the initial discount offered is misleading and can never be actually achieved, no matter how safe you drive. Be aware!!

App is great. I was excited initially and recommended Root to everyone I knew because I got such a great rate. Then 6 months later my policy is up for renewal, and my rate is literally going to DOUBLE, from $90 to over $180 a MONTH. Nothing has changed on my end, not my vehicle or driving record, I haven't gotten any tickets or had any accidents at all. They have no explanation. I have no idea what happened but I will be cancelling my policy with Root.

title: SoFi: Trade and Invest in Stocks, Buy Crypto
description:
Earn high interest on all your cash* and pay no account fees when you spend with a SoFi Money® debit card. Trade stocks, shares, cryptocurrency & ETFs with SoFi Invest®. SoFi Personal Loans & Student Loan Refinancing have competitive rates & no hidden fees.

Spend money, invest, trade stocks, save money. From saving to cash management, we can help you Get Your Money Right®

Invest: Stocks, cryptocurrency, Bitcoin
• No account fees, no account minimums to invest in stocks
• Buy & sell Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ethereum
• Auto-investing, trending stocks, ETFs

Money: Save, spend, earn
• Earn high interest on all your cash*
• Pay zero account fees. No annual, transactional, overdraft, or other account fees*
• Use any ATM that accepts Mastercard® & we’ll reimburse the fees*

*We work to give you high interest & charge no account fees. With that in mind our interest rate & fee structure is subject to change at any time. See our terms & conditions at sofi.com/legal

Loans: Borrowing can be fast & easy 
• Borrow money when you need it with personal loans
• Save money on your student loans

DISCLOSURE

INVESTMENT PRODUCTS: ARE NOT FDIC INSURED • ARE NOT BANK GUARANTEED • MAY LOSE VALUE

Risk is a natural part of investing—and crypto, due to its volatility, carries a higher degree of it. FINRA, the SEC, the CFPB have issued public advisories concerning this.

summary: Trade Stocks, Invest - Investing Money, Buy Stocks
recentChanges:
1 million+ people are getting their money right with SoFi, so we’re giving away up to $1 million in stock. You could win up to $50k!

Plus, to help navigate today’s uncertain environment, we offer up to date financial news and takes on what it can mean for you. You can access virtual events on top-of-mind topics, and live sessions with our certified financial advisors. We’ve also got tools like calculators to evaluate loan options and career coaches. All from the app, all at no cost to you.
comments: The Investing portion is good for long term investments, but delayed price updates make it bad for day trading. The bank account is pretty good with a lot of benefits, but the interest rate keeps dropping and is no longer one of them. The Relay product is somewhat lackluster but is always improving. Can't speak to their personal loans as they keep rejecting me. No student loans to refinance so no review on that either. All in all, I really like this company, just as long as it keeps improving.

App is worse, have to re-login everytime I use the app. Swap to another app for 2 seconds? Login is required. Also, I still get the application being reviewed notification when I try to look at my account. I am able to get around it by going back to the main page, then back to the money section. But this has not been fixed since July (when I initially emailed Sofi about it) The mobile app is by far the worst thing about Sofi. Which sucks, because everything else about Sofi is great.

The app refuses to remember my log in email address, despite checking the remember me checkbox. I guess the remember me check box only makes it so that the SMS code doesn't have to be entered again. In addition, there's no support for finger print authentication. This adds friction to getting into the app each time I go to use it.

"Get your Money Right" slogan appeals to me as I have been struggling to budget for years! Right now I'm looking at the money management tools like their "Vaults" which reminds me of envelope system to save for specific goals in virtual fold which I like and I'm researching their stocks that pay dividends in the invest part of App but the most important feature that sold me is the free ATMs worldwide because I just got my passport and want explore!

I love this app. I cash out one of my survey apps straight to it and the other to PayPal and cash PayPal out to my sofi card. The app keeps track of my credit score for free and makes me sign in Everytime I use it so noone else can get into it.

title: MarketWatch
description:
The MarketWatch app for Android delivers the latest business news, financial information and market data to your fingertips.

Download the MarketWatch app for:
- Breaking news stories, videos, and in-depth analysis
- Latest market data, including: index movements, stock prices, and other key securities information
- Receive market-moving alerts on your mobile device

MarketWatch features include:

- Business News & Analysis
  * Latest stock market, finance, business and investing news from MarketWatch
  * Article headlines and images are featured along with real-time market data for each relevant ticker
  * Personal finance, investing, technology, politics, energy, retail and retirement planning news and insights.
  * Top Stories bar is interactive and gives access to a fully customizable drop-down menu featuring other news channels (e.g. U.S. Markets, Investing, Personal Finance)

- Market Data
  * Market data center with access to stocks, commodities, rates, currencies — all updated in real time
  * Detailed stock quote pages with key trading information and interactive charts from across major global markets
  * Track stock market data over a variety of date ranges and regions (U.S., Europe, Asia) for a more comprehensive understanding of the markets

- Watchlist
  * Track your stock picks and see related MarketWatch stories to stay up-to-date on your investments
  * Sync your Watchlist. The MarketWatch app syncs with MarketWatch.com, allowing registered MarketWatch users to track stocks on the go. You can add multiple personalized watchlists, which can be viewed at any time across devices and platforms

- Article Sharing and Saving Capabilities
  * Save stories to read them at a time that is more convenient for you
  * Instantly share stories via social media, text message and email or save them for later viewing

Privacy Policy: https://www.dowjones.com/privacy-policy/

Cookie Policy: https://www.dowjones.com/cookies-policy/

summary: MarketWatch - Real-time financial news, markets data and investing analysis
developerAddress:
Dow Jones
1211 Avenue of the Americas
New York, New York
10036
recentChanges:
As always, thank you for using MarketWatch!

We are excited to introduce our sixth generation app. Among the changes:

- A refactored design, including updated fonts and colors
- New site navigation that provides access to more news coverage
- More data on quote pages, including performance tables across instruments and Lipper rankings on mutual funds
- Addition of new data tables on U.S., Europe and Asia market data screens

We hope you enjoy this latest version of our app.
comments: App is decent. Compared to the website it is really lacking. Provides very little information in comparison to it's website. Anyone who is thinking of using this app. Please use their website first then compare it to the app. The notifications are great, but if it's similar to the site it would be better

I feel the data is a bit unorganized. I also get notifications for stories that do not appear when I click on the notification. Other than that, it's a pretty good app. I should be no more than two clicks away from any market. BigCharts should be implemented. Nobody can do a technical analysis of this market with a three-year time frame. Obviously, we should be able to set the range beyond 3 years.

Frequently updated head lines. Many articles from other sources that you might need to have a subscription for, are available in full length on this app. Always worth taking a look at the beginning of the day if you are into markets and economic news.

Could be a fantastic app if they'd not let their personal biases against Trump influence the way articles are written. Just report, don't use antagonistic tones and rhetoric which overshadows the financial and economic articles. This would be a five star app, but I can't justify it due to political biases againt Trump.

Allows me to check topical as well as more in depth market specific news easily in on place. Also using My Watchlist allows me to monitor stocks and funds activity throughout the day as needed. Easy to navigate and use all parts of the app. Very easy and convenient.

title: Investing.com: Stocks, Finance, Markets & News
description:
Join the millions of people using the Investing.com app every day to stay on top of global financial markets!

Investing.com offers a set of financial informational tools covering a wide variety of global and local financial instruments.

 REAL TIME DATA 
Live quotes and charts for over 100,000 financial instruments, traded on over 70 global exchanges.
Track major global indices, stocks, bonds, commodities, currencies, interest rates, futures and options.

 ECONOMIC CALENDAR 
Live updates on global economic events customized to your personal interests.
Our real time Economic Calendar is used by top traders and investors to track market-moving events as they are announced, making it easy to track market impact.

 PERSONALIZED PORTFOLIO 
Add your favorite financial instruments and their holdings to your portfolio.
Build your own customized watchlist and keep track of stock quotes, commodities, indices, ETFs and bonds - all synced with your Investing.com account. Your personal Watchlist can be accessed anytime from your menu, providing you with real-time prices, and the Holdings Portfolio shows you your total assets value 24/7.

 ALERTS 
Our Alerts system allows you to receive customizable alerts for any instrument, economic event or new analysis articles. For all 100,000 financial instruments, you can set up notifications for a specific price, change by %, or Volume. All pushed by request, and synced with the website.

 NEWS & ANALYSIS 
Breaking news, videos, updates and analysis on global financial markets, as well as technology, politics and business.
Be the first to read the latest on stocks, currencies, commodities, and global economy.


 FINANCIAL TOOLS 
Quick access to all of our world-class tools, including: Economic Calendar, Earnings Calendar, Technical Summary, Currency Converter, Market Quotes, advanced charts and more.

 ALREADY A MEMBER? 
Sign-in and continue where you left off by syncing your portfolio and personal alerts between all of your devices.

 SOCIAL 
Join our growing community of traders and investors and share articles to Facebook, WhatsApp, Twitter, and LinkedIn.

 OUR DATA: 

 COMMODITY PRICES 
Follow up-to-the-second commodity prices, including: Gold, Silver, Copper, Platinum, Crude Oil, Brent Oil and Natural Gas.

 MAJOR STOCKS 
Track stock market leaders: Apple Inc. (AAPL), Alphabet Inc. (GOOGL), Bank of America Corporation (BAC), Tesla (TSLA), General Electric Company (GE), Cisco Systems, Inc. (CSCO), American Express Company (AXP), Amazon (AMZN), Nike (NKE), Microsoft Corporation (MSFT), Netflix (NFLX), and many more.

 GLOBAL INDICES 
Follow data from all major stock market indices, including:
■ U.S: Dow Jones, S&P 500, NYSE, NASDAQ, SmallCap 2000
■ Americas: Merval, Bovespa, RUSSELL 2000, IPC, IPSA
■ Europe: CAC 40, FTSE MIB, IBEX 35, ATX, BEL 20, DAX, BSE Sofia, PX
■ Asia-Pacific: CNX Nifty, Shanghai Stock Exchange Composite Index (SSEC), Hang Seng, KOSPI - and many more.
■ Africa: BSE Domestic Company, Kenya NSE 20, Semdex, Moroccan All Shares, South Africa 40
■ Middle East: Bahrain All Share, EGX 30, Amman SE General, Kuwait Main, TA 35

 RATES BONDS 
Real time data on bonds, including US Yield Bonds, Euro Bund, UK Gilt, Euro BTP and more.

* Bug fixes

comments: I have subscribed the premium from October 2019 and have been charged ever since automatically to the phone bill. But from November 2019, the app return to free version even though I paid it along with the phone bill. This is unacceptable and can be considered a fraud. I demand a refund from November 2019. Update: still not ad free. I want a refund please. Stop this mambo jumbo about technicalities. This is fraud.

Tried to sign up 8 times with email and I never received a confirmation code. Absolutely useless. Just tried again and still won't send confirmation code by email. I did receive an email, but it would take far too long to fill in the information on their support request than it's worth. Absolutely useless with terrible customer support.

Took hours to get the email verification email. The app had a window asking for the verification code in that email. But by then, that window was long gone. No way to enter the code or reset the password or finish the account registration in any way. Do some basic testing before releasing an app. Not worth my time.

Between the full page ads on every load, and the broken premarket and after hours figures that just disappeared recently this is a strong pass. Many other apps out there with more features, less ads and just as fast with market numbers. This is a great example of a decent app, ruined by developer greed. Uninstall

This app kills itself by deploying full screen ads that completely BLOCK the News Article you've clicked onto read. The ad cannot be removed. You must click back to the previous screen to remove the ad. This renders most of the news feed useless. Stupid.

title: Greenlight
description:
Greenlight is a debit card for kids and teens that parents manage through an app. Parents can choose the exact stores where their children can spend, manage chores and allowances, set parent-paid interest rates on savings and more. Kids monitor balances, create savings goals and learn to make real world trade-off decisions. 

Since Greenlight is a prepaid debit card, kids can’t spend what they don’t have. No overdraft fees. No overspending. No surprises.

PARENTS CAN
- Manage chores
- Automate allowances 
- Instantly transfer money to kids’ cards
- Receive real-time notifications 
- Set store-level spend controls 
- Turn card on or off from the app
- Set Parent-Paid Interest rates on savings 
- Control access and budgets for ATM withdrawals
- Refer a friend to Greenlight and you both receive $10

KIDS AND TEENS CAN
- Manage their own budgets
- Direct deposit their paychecks
- Access the Greenlight app to track balances in Spend, Save and Give accounts
- Create custom saving goals
- Receive money from friends & family with Greenlight Gift

SAFETY FIRST. AND SECOND. AND THIRD.
- Greenlight comes with an EMV Chip and parent-controlled PIN
- No cash back at the register to curb unmonitored spending
- Automated blocked categories for unsafe spending
- State-of-the-art SSL encryption
- Your most sensitive information is stored by our partners, who are compliant with the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard.
- FDIC insured through our partner, Community Federal Savings Bank.

summary: Debit Card for Kids and Teens...with Parental Controls
recentChanges:
We made some adjustments that make the app work even better.

We’ve also made it easier for parents to manage their family’s account information. In addition to your own email and mailing address, you can now update your child’s account information straight from the Greenlight app (including their name, username, password, gender, birthday, email address and phone number)
comments: Easy to use and so convenient! My kids love the personalized cards and the fact that keeping up with their money is so easy! Greenlight Gifts is also a great way to get your kids money for birthdays and holidays without having to worry about it getting lost before it can't ever be used. We love our Greenlight cards!!!!

Horrible! You can't delete the old cards once you order a custom card, you have to call customer service and then they end up deleting the wrong card, then you're on the phone forever trying to get it all straightened out, which doesn't happen because they can't see the pictures on the cards to know which one to delete. You also have to call to update phone numbers, addresses, basically everything instead of just doing it on the app. I wish I had never gotten it.

At first I was very unhappy with the app on my android (Samsung S7) it loaded slow and ran slow. However! I registered my complaint and the next thing I know I'm talking to some of their folks and damned if they didn't trace my problem, find the cause, and release an update to the play store that fixed my problem, all withing 48 hours! Very impressed with their ability to figure it out and correct it. App runs great now and so far I'm pleased with how the whole system works. This was the first time I've ever encountered a software issue that was actually acknowledged and fixed by a company.

Overall, it's a great idea. BUT there is no indication anywhere on this app store that there are in-app purchases such as a $4.99/month membership. (The fee isn't the problem just the principle.) Unpleasant surprise. Then, as I understand it, my child needs a phone to use this. I'm not sure how I feel about all this, so I'll probably look elsewhere for a solution.

Love Greenlight. I personally love all the security mechanisms. I did have to call when trying to add another funding source but it's for my security and customer service was efficient in assisting me. We have kids living in two households so it makes it so much easier to provide for them immediately if a need pops up. They are using the saving function, and learning to budget. I also love that the children's info is on the backside of the card, so no worry about strangers getting their name

title: H&R Block Tax Prep and File
description:
Say hello to better tax preparation, expert guidance, upfront pricing, and more ways to file. As the highest-rated tax prep and filing app, it’s easy to see tax prep is better with Block.

Use a different preparer last year? Switch quickly and easily when you file with H&R Block, plus get access to an H&R Block tax expert, enrolled agent, or CPA if you need one. With more than 60 years of tax preparation experience on your side, you can be sure you’re getting your maximum refund -- guaranteed.

More for Free

•	Our H&R Block Free Online tax preparation includes credits and deductions other tax prep services might make you pay for, including student loan interest, tuition and fees, child and dependent care expenses, Social Security income, and unemployment income.
•	Get a free mid-year tax check-in and free audit assistance, part of our No Surprise Guarantee*.
•	If you do want to upgrade to a paid tax prep product, you’ll pay only when you’re ready to file. Prepare your return, get help, and use all app features without paying a dime upfront.


File Your Way

•	Find the product that meets your needs. We’ve got you covered with Free Online, Deluxe Online, Premium Online, and Self-Employed Online tax products without ever leaving the app.
•	H&R Block Online Assist gives you unlimited, on-demand help from an H&R Block tax expert, enrolled agent, or CPA. Whether you’re just starting or almost ready to file, these experts are available at any point in the tax prep process.
•	With Tax Pro Review, a tax pro conducts a line-by-line review of your return, then signs and e-files it. All tax forms are included, so you’ll be able to file for even the most complex credits and deductions. 


Faster Tax Prep

•	With E-File Quick Look, you can get return status updates delivered straight to the Tax Prep App homepage. 
•	Take pics and upload PDFs of your tax docs. Import docs important to you (like last year’s 2018 return, your W-2, or 1099) during tax prep to jump-start your taxes and make filling out forms quick and easy. 
•	Do your taxes on the go, from wherever life takes you. If you’re a returning H&R Block client, sign in with your existing account, and we’ll automatically import all your info from last year’s return. New to Block? Create an account, easily import your last return, and save all your work as you go. 
•	Turn on enhanced two-factor authentication with Google Authenticator when you create or manage your existing account. 

Simple Help

•	One-tap help -- Our Help Center is stocked with answers, advice, and assistance from the best tax preparers in the business -- and it’s just a tap away.
•	Our Secure Messaging makes it easy to ask our tax experts specific questions about your return.  
•	You can prepare and file your 2019 return in-app or sign in on any device to pick up where you left off.


New in 2020

•	Enhanced photo capture experience -- Take a pic of your tax docs, and the H&R Block mobile app will automatically pull in all your info. 
•	Enhanced self-help via search and chatbot -- Tax preparation has never been easier. Search for the help you need, see answers to common tax questions, or talk to our chatbot to get a quick answer to common tax prep and filing questions.
•	Bookmarks -- This new feature makes it easy to save any help article for later. 

Your privacy, security, and guarantees are important to us. Please visit hrblock.com to learn more.

descriptionHTML:
Say hello to better tax preparation, expert guidance, upfront pricing, and more ways to file. As the highest-rated tax prep and filing app, it’s easy to see tax prep is better with Block.

Use a different preparer last year? Switch quickly and easily when you file with H&R Block, plus get access to an H&R Block tax expert, enrolled agent, or CPA if you need one. With more than 60 years of tax preparation experience on your side, you can be sure you’re getting your maximum refund -- guaranteed.

More for Free

• Our H&R Block Free Online tax preparation includes credits and deductions other tax prep services might make you pay for, including student loan interest, tuition and fees, child and dependent care expenses, Social Security income, and unemployment income.
• Get a free mid-year tax check-in and free audit assistance, part of our No Surprise Guarantee*.
• If you do want to upgrade to a paid tax prep product, you’ll pay only when you’re ready to file. Prepare your return, get help, and use all app features without paying a dime upfront.


File Your Way

• Find the product that meets your needs. We’ve got you covered with Free Online, Deluxe Online, Premium Online, and Self-Employed Online tax products without ever leaving the app.
• H&R Block Online Assist gives you unlimited, on-demand help from an H&R Block tax expert, enrolled agent, or CPA. Whether you’re just starting or almost ready to file, these experts are available at any point in the tax prep process.
• With Tax Pro Review, a tax pro conducts a line-by-line review of your return, then signs and e-files it. All tax forms are included, so you’ll be able to file for even the most complex credits and deductions.


Faster Tax Prep

• With E-File Quick Look, you can get return status updates delivered straight to the Tax Prep App homepage.
• Take pics and upload PDFs of your tax docs. Import docs important to you (like last year’s 2018 return, your W-2, or 1099) during tax prep to jump-start your taxes and make filling out forms quick and easy.
• Do your taxes on the go, from wherever life takes you. If you’re a returning H&R Block client, sign in with your existing account, and we’ll automatically import all your info from last year’s return. New to Block? Create an account, easily import your last return, and save all your work as you go.
• Turn on enhanced two-factor authentication with Google Authenticator when you create or manage your existing account.

Simple Help

• One-tap help -- Our Help Center is stocked with answers, advice, and assistance from the best tax preparers in the business -- and it’s just a tap away.
• Our Secure Messaging makes it easy to ask our tax experts specific questions about your return.
• You can prepare and file your 2019 return in-app or sign in on any device to pick up where you left off.


New in 2020

• Enhanced photo capture experience -- Take a pic of your tax docs, and the H&R Block mobile app will automatically pull in all your info.
• Enhanced self-help via search and chatbot -- Tax preparation has never been easier. Search for the help you need, see answers to common tax questions, or talk to our chatbot to get a quick answer to common tax prep and filing questions.
• Bookmarks -- This new feature makes it easy to save any help article for later.

Your privacy, security, and guarantees are important to us. Please visit hrblock.com to learn more.

developerAddress:

Kansas City, Mo 64105
recentChanges:
In this release, we’ve made system updates to support more tablet sizes and to enable other tools and features.

Questions or comments? Contact us at hrbmobiletaxes@hrblock.com.
comments: Over all this app is so much easier than all the others and every option it gives you it gives a definition to go along with it. They also so you what you need to look forbid anything is missing or doesn't make sense. This the most effective and efficient app I've ever used. Thank you so much H&R Block.

Sucks! Tried to charge me 49.99 to use a deduction. I tried to delete the deduction 10 times because i was trying to just do a standard deduction. Keeps popping up to fix issue. I kept going around and round fix delete fix delete! Then i went to help chat. Wait time 10 minutes , ok then app timed out kicked me out of spot inline, tried again sorry problem with live chat over and over again! Finally agreed to 49.99 then during checkout extra 45 for state so free means 94.95 u suck hr block!

Easy to use with no hidden fees until the end like other tax apps, it discusses prices upfront and is completely free if you choose the right options unlike other apps that you click free and end up paying $150 when its all said and done. The app is very helpful and has answers for any question you may have on the spot instantly for you to access, plus they help you get every deduction possible. I highly reccomend this app to EVERYONE. Its definetly everything needed and more!

This was the first time I filed my taxes by myself. I was really nervous. But they made it so easy. Plus they have extra services to make sure you didn't make a mistake or to protect you if you did make a mistake for pretty cheap. I'm really glad i got this app.
Easy to use, my first filing myself and felt at ease. In some sections, I wish there were more options to file mileage and some other items. Other than that, my experience was great.

title: Boss Revolution Money
description:
Send money and top-up securely from your mobile phone to friends and family back home anytime. Our international money transfer service is easy to use and provides you peace of mind. The BOSS Revolution Money Transfer App is trusted by millions of customers every day to stay in touch, recharge phones, and send funds to their loved ones around the world.

Send money with the app today:
+ Your first transfer free (up to $300) in the app
+ Low transfer fees
+ Transfer with competitive exchange rates (FX)

Transfer money easily:
• Send money quickly and safely to your loved ones in 45+ countries including the Dominican Republic, Guatemala, Mexico, the Philippines, Honduras, El Salvador, Ghana, Nigeria, and more
• Select from over 300,000 payout locations worldwide including banks, mobile wallets and retail stores
• Send money using your debit card or credit card

Recharge Mobile Phones:
Easily top up the prepaid mobile phones of your friends and family in more than 90 countries with more than 150 carriers.
• Popular mobile carriers to reload include: Tigo, Claro, Movistar, Digicel and more.
• See the latest international carrier promotions right in the app. 

Send money with confidence:
• Transfer knowing your FX, fees, total charge and exact amount you are sending
• Track your transaction in the app and receive SMS and email alerts
• View your transaction history at a glance
• Send repeat transactions with just one swipe
• Money-back guarantee
• 30-day rate history charts
• Compare rates with leading services

Boss Revolution money transfer products and payment services are offered and serviced by IDT Payment Services, Inc.(NMLS935577, MAFT935577), and IDT Payment Services of New York LLC, both licensed money transmitters (hereinafter jointly referred to as ""IDT Payment"").
