comments: It's a very frustrating experience, I installed the app and I've been trying to register with my number and email to no avail for the past 2days. I will go back to my small world and other apps.... they're very easy. No stress. The reason I tried boss revolution money was because I use boss revolution for calls but this is annoying. I will uninstall it now.

Good company but very badly designed app. I install the app, opens the app and it asks for my phone number to send a text and i never receives the text, why? Then i can't continue from there. Why can't you use any other way? Email or phone call? Why dont you provide any means for customers to call your customer service?

Good app until you need customer service. They have a few very disrespectful reps and their compliance team does not gave synergy. I do think they can do better but they keep dropping the ball. After many months with them, I think you have other apps out there with better services. This is coming from a loyal customer that has just moved on.
Easy, convenient and fast. Exchange rates are great, sending fee is very reasonable. To me, it is the best money transfer service. I Love it.
Great app to send money the only thing is that when something is wrong it's take a lot of time to get an answer

title: Mint: Budget, Bills, & Finance Tracker
description:
Finally, there’s one place to manage all your finances with ease. Mint is the free money manager and financial tracker app from the makers of TurboTax® that does it all. We bring together your bank accounts, credit cards, bills and investments so you know where you stand. See what you’re spending, where you can save money, and track your bills in Mint like never before. You can even keep track of your credit score to help you be smart about it, no credit card required.
 
SEE EVERYTHING IN ONE PLACE	
Get a more complete picture of your financial life. We bring together everything from account balances and spending to your free credit score, net worth and more.
 
MANAGE BILLS & MONEY TOGETHER
Track bills right alongside your account balances. You’ll know what's due, when it’s due, and the money you have to put toward your balances.
 
SAVE TIME & MONEY 
With one place to keep track of your finances, there’s no need to log into multiple sites. Plus, we’ll give you savings tips to help with budgeting and debt.
 
BUDGET BETTER     	
Effortlessly create budgets you can stick to. To help you save smarter from day one, we even make a few for you based on your spending.
 
BE SMART ABOUT YOUR CREDIT SCORE
Get your free credit score, no credit card required. You’ll learn how it’s calculated and get tips.*
 
SAY GOODBYE TO LATE FEES        	
Get bill pay reminders so you pay bills on time and avoid missed payments and credit card fees.
 
STAY SECURE
We’re serious about security and use measures like multi-factor authentication, designed to help you protect access to your account. Plus, Mint comes from the people who make TurboTax®, trusted by millions with sensitive data, and we participate in security scanning with VeriSign.
 
SYNCS WITH THE MINT WEB APP
Mint’s great on the go, but you can also use the desktop version at Mint.com. Sync your bank accounts, credit cards, budgeting, spending and more across your devices. You can even export spreadsheets from the web, and more.

WHY DO MILLIONS TRUST MINT?
Time Magazine: The 50 Best Apps of the Year (2016)
PC Magazine: What to Do When You Go Over Budget in Mint.com (2016)
Nerd Wallet: Financial Fitness - 7 Exercises to Build your Credit Muscle (2016)
Huffington Post: 5 Things To Know After You Graduate (2016)
Tech Times: Save Money in 2015: Here are the Best Money Management Apps (2015)
Kiplinger’s: 10 Great Saving Money-Saving Apps (2014) 
Money Magazine: Best Finance Tool For Budgeting (2014)
Wired: The Best Apps for Budgeting Your Cash (2014)
Android Connections: Best Personal Finance Apps of 2015 for Android (2015)
 
FROM INTUIT INC.
Mint is part of a suite of financial tools that includes TurboTax®, QuickBooks®, QuickBooks Self-Employed™ and ProConnect™. Wherever you are in life, whatever you do, Intuit can help you save money and simplify the business of life.
 
To learn how Intuit works to protect your privacy, please visit 
https://security.intuit.com/index.php/privacy

When you download and use Mint, you agree to the Mint Terms of Service https://www.mint.com/terms
 
*Intuit is not a credit repair company. We do not provide credit repair services to repair or improve your credit profile or score. All information is provided for educational use only.
 
Message and data rates apply. Reminders subject to interruptions due to various reasons including but not limited to internet/mobile service outages. Account balances may not immediately reflect recent transactions. Internet/mobile data required for financial data refresh.
 
Mint currently connects to US and Canadian financial institutions only.

recentChanges:
Hey, there!
In this update, we made some improvements and smashed some bugs to make your Mint experience even more awesome. Also fixed crashes on app initialization for some users.

We’re always working on new ways to improve your experience with Mint. That’s why your voice is so important to us. Let us know what you think by leaving a review!
comments: Fantastic. The platform gives me visibility into 15 different financial accounts at a quick glance. Really great tool to keep track of everything happening in your financial life. A few bugs once and a while but eventually the developers sort that out. I never experience any long-term issues with bugs or errors. Highly recommend for anyone looking to get a grasp on their financial life. Also, comes packed with budgeting tools if you are looking for that.

I used Mint for a long time then it stopped syncing to my bank account in spite of numerous attempts to fix it. I'm sad that I will be looking for an alternative app if these problems continue much longer. Who has time to devote to figuring out the help system maze via Facebook or Twitter? Not me. I'm obviously not the only one experiencing this either.

I like using the app so I can check my finances in real time. It works pretty well. Here are some things I'd like to be able to do. - rules carry-over from desktop version to app - ability to assign categories to pending transactions (otherwise, the app miscategorizes and we get a notification of over-spending) - modified: adding a new merchant is possible! Up'd my review to 4 stars.

VERY useful 👍 but not customizable 👎 I can see where my money goes, I can link accounts (so I don't have to manually enter transactions), and there are lots of useful tools (budgets, spending trends/charts, 'hiding' transactions from spending trends for more accurate budgeting, bill tracker, credit score, etc). But I cannot: customize categories at all (adding new/editing existing), which also translates into not being able to customize budget items or rearrange the list of items in my budget.

App used to be great. But it's been almost a year since it's worked well and the way it is supposed to. I have multiple accounts that it can't connect to or stay connected with, which leaves me with out bill and finance tracking or notifications. I have contacted customer service and chatted with them about this issue a few times and nothing has improved. Update for developer: This link is the same thing that all of the chats have gone over. There is something wrong one your end. Please fix!

title: Schwab Mobile
description:
Take charge of your financial future with Schwab’s mobile app for Android™.  Monitor your accounts, trade, research investments, and follow today’s market news—whenever and wherever you want.

•	Manage your brokerage, Schwab Bank, 401(k) and other accounts
•	Trade/edit/cancel Stock, ETF, Mutual Fund and multi-leg option orders ¹
•	Login using your fingerprint or Passcode
•	Deposit Checks via Schwab Mobile Deposit™ ²
•	Protect yourself with the ability to quickly lock and unlock your Schwab Bank Visa® Platinum Debit Card  
•	Open new brokerage accounts and new Schwab Bank accounts
•	Get real-time Trade Notifications
•	Monitor your Schwab Visa Platinum® Debit card activity by setting custom alerts
•	Access Schwab Podcasts, videos, and more in Media Center 
•	Enjoy auto-updating Watchlists (synchronized with Schwab.com)
•	Add, edit, pay, or cancel Bill Pay payments for Schwab Bank
•	More enhancements are coming soon


Your input is important.  In the app, go to the Menu, select "Feedback" and share your experience and ideas for future enhancements.


BROKERAGE PRODUCTS: NOT FDIC INSURED • NO BANK GUARANTEE • MAY LOSE VALUE


¹ Options carry a high level of risk and are not suitable for all investors. Certain requirements must be met to trade options through Schwab. Please read the options disclosure document titled "Characteristics and Risks of Standardized Options"  [http://www.theocc.com/about/publications/character-risks.jsp] Supporting documentation for any claims or statistical information is available upon request, call 800-435-4000 for a copy.  Multiple leg options strategies will involve multiple commissions.  Spread trading must be done in a margin account.
Futures trading offered and positions held through Charles Schwab Futures, Inc., a separate but affiliated company of Charles Schwab & Co., Inc.  Both are subsidiaries of The Charles Schwab Corporation. Futures trading involves substantial risk and is not suitable for all investors.  Please read Risk Disclosure Statement for Futures and Options [https://www.streetsmartcentral.com/static/pdf/CSF_risks_futures_options.pdf].
² The Schwab Mobile Deposit service is subject to certain eligibility requirements, limitations, and other conditions. Enrollment is not guaranteed. Standard hold policies apply. Requires a wireless signal or mobile connection. Mobile carrier data charges may apply.
Requires a wireless signal or mobile connection. Access to Electronic Services may be limited or unavailable during periods of peak demand, market volatility, systems upgrade, maintenance, or for other reasons. Functionality may vary by operating system and/or device.
System availability and response times are subject to market conditions and mobile connection limitations.  Trade Orders received outside normal market hours will be entered the next business day.
Android, Google Play, and Google Pay are trademarks of Google Inc. Use of these trademarks are subject to Google Permissions.
Charles Schwab & Co., Inc., and Charles Schwab Bank are separate but affiliated companies and subsidiaries of The Charles Schwab Corporation. Brokerage products are offered by Charles Schwab & Co., Inc. (Member SIPC [www.sipc.org] ) ("Schwab"). Deposit and lending products and services are offered by Charles Schwab Bank, Member FDIC and an Equal Housing Lender.

©2020 Charles Schwab & Co., Inc. All rights reserved. Member SIPC. [www.sipc.org] CS17369-01 

Screenshots are for illustrative purposes only.

summary: Manage your money on the go.
recentChanges:
• Looking for your Schwab Tax Forms? They’re now available on your 1099 Dashboard
• Bug fixes and performance enhancements
comments: I've been using Schwab for 5 years now and have recommended it to many people. But lately, I'm getting frustrated with how inconvenient the mobile app for day traders. The account doesn't reflect what's been purchased today until after the market closes, no way to check the updated average, or new stocks etc. Because of how volatile the market is, I want to take advantage of it, but Schwab is holding me back. I'm looking at other options and going to switch soon.

Interesting how it auto-logs me out everytime i want to view my positions on a day where the Dow is down 250 points. Edit 3/16. After failing to buy at a low price because the app crashed, this app has once again let me down. The app forcequits every time I attempt to view my positions or buy more stock. Absolute pathetic from such a large company. Don't trust them with your money!!!

While setting up an account I hit the back button to change preferences and it made me start over. It did save the account since the username was no longer available for a new account but when trying to sign in it said access denied. I had no option to finish setting up the account or login so screw it, I downloaded a different app.

Easy to use, easy to understand, cheap and reliable. I was confused the first few days using it when my account was restricted. Turns out they just needed to confirm my identity. Friendly and great customer service on the phone. And btw phone service is 24/7. Beginner investor and glad I'm using Charles schawb.

This App use to be great... Now the charts disappear. One day you have all that's necessary to trade the stocks, and another day I find that I have only part of the stock charts- (that disappears on me) This is horribe when it happens right in the middle of my tradding. Right now I have to reinstall the C.S. App again and again, in order to have the App work for me. Hello?? This is getting old. Grr Tech. Please fix this problem.

title: MoneyLion: Mobile Banking
description:
Discover 2019’s Best Digital Bank with 0% APR Instacash advances, zero bank fees, low-interest credit builder loans, managed investing, cash rewards, trivia, and more. Finally, finance is easy!
 
MoneyLion is an all-in-one mobile banking membership, where everyone can dream big, even if they start small. Get the premium financial tools you deserve without the fees and BS you’re used to from other banks. 
 
Signup takes minutes, and you’ll get benefits right away. Here’s some of what our 5 million members love about banking with us:
 
• 0% APR Instacash advances 
• Checking account with zero fees
• Credit builder loans (70% of members raise their credit 30+ points in 60 days)
• Managed investing with no minimums or management fees 
• Credit score tracking
• Personal loans 
• Financial Heartbeat: financial health monitor and advice 
• Cashback and rewards like $25 gift cards to Amazon & Target
 
“2019 Best Digital Bank” — Finovate Awards
“MoneyLion provides an all-in-one platform for anything finance related.”  — TechCrunch
“Here's the idea: bring the same methods that the big sharks use to build wealth, to everyone.” — CNNMoney
“MoneyLion brings better lending to Americans who might be struggling financially.”— Cheddar
“MoneyLion is making it easier to invest.” — Huffington Post
 
START ENJOYING AN EASIER FINANCIAL LIFE TODAY:

Sign up! Download the MoneyLion app and choose your membership to unlock features like:
 
MoneyLion Visa Debit Card & Checking Account: Enjoy absolutely zero fees, including no hidden fees, and fast transfers and tracking in the palm of your hand. So easy.

Credit tracking: Check your score any time and get stats important to improving your credit like credit age and credit inquiries.

recentChanges: With our latest improvements, the app works even better to help you borrow, save, and invest! You can now see any overdue payments in process as you repay your interest-free Instacash cash advances. And you can use your current billing address to add cards to your MoneyLion digital Wallet more easily. We're all about helping you track and manage your $$ with ease.
comments: Love the app and they fact they help build your credit and it has worked for me but I hate when anyone lies to me and this app is full of lies especially when they say you can pay off bigger chunks of a loan than the weekly fee (you can't btw) then they say pay off in full with a debit card instead of a bank account and it's instantly paid of which is a lie cause as soon as you press send it tells you 3-5 business days for payment to clear. If thats the case fine just don't lie

Concept is great. However, execution is horrible. Fees are high and Customer Service is non-existent. Called the CS phone number during normal business hours. It resulted in being disconnected, as the automated response said the office was closed. Tried updating my address, twice and was once again disappointed. Fail.

Customer Service is worthless but overall the app is good but in the same sense it's also bad. Won't let me add or update my credit/ debit card same card number just a different expiration date and security code. It says that the card has been added, but it never shows it. But other than that I'm somewhat satisfied with it. I wish they'd go back to the $1 a day login reward. Now I can't even switch banks, I wish you could just use a routing number and account number to add or setup a new bank.

Extremely stupid app, with even stupider customer service. My bank account got hacked so I had to update it, and it's been several weeks now, and their lame customer service hasn't been able to do it. They literally can't update a f'ing bank account. This is their business! Bank accounts! At this point, I'm not so certain they're not the reason I got hacked in the first place. Edit2: I tried doing the phone call thing, and no one ever called me. Even that doesn't apparently work.

Keep getting errors...says I need to link my bank for instacash but bank is linked...tried to sign up for credit builder and keep getting same msg that it's my internet...also everytime I try to connect my bank (although my bank is connected in my accounts) it knocks out the other connections to my other financial apps such as Dave and brigit...very strange...tried several times..always the same thing each time...guess it's a sign to stay away..

title: USAA Mobile
description:
The USAA Mobile app gives you convenient and secure account access from your mobile device.  Manage your finances, investments, insurance, and much more.

USAA is an organization founded by military members for military members and we understand the unique needs of U.S. Military servicemen and women and their families.  

With just a few clicks, you can transfer funds, pay bills, deposit checks, and place trades.

USAA Mobile App features include:
- Banking: Pay Bills, Send Money with Zelle®, deposit checks, calculate your loans, and locate an ATM.
- Insurance: Get an Auto ID card, request roadside assistance, and report a claim.
- Investments: Get real-time stockquotes, place trades, read relevant articles, and watch informative videos.
- Secure: Use a PIN or your fingerprint to quickly log in to the app.
- Digital Assistant: Access EVA, our digital voice assistant, at any point within the app to answer your questions.
- Widget: View your accounts and balances on your device widget without the need to log in each time, thanks to the help of our secure authentication infrastructure.

recentChanges:
We regularly make updates to our app to improve your mobile experience. Each new version strives to provide improvements for our members to have secure, fast and reliable access to their information.

For this update you can expect:

*Deposit@Home improvements.

*General bug fixes and improvements.
comments: Excellent banking app for military and their families. USAAs app encompasses banking, insurance, and other services all in one. Truly a great bank, with a great app.

One star just because all i can see on the app is my current balance of loan. Cant see payment history, cant see payoff info, cant see ANYTHING except balance. What's the point of having app if I have to go to google and open website to see eveything.

As others have stated, this app used to be solid until a recent update or backend change. I was unable to use certain services and would get a pop up that said service unavailable. I uninstalled and installed again, hoping for a fix, but now I cannot log back in. It appears that the same error is popping up and now the app is unusable. Hopefully the fix this issue. Edit 3 Mar: Still cannot log in. Same errors as before. This app needs fixed.

It works but with some flaws. The app does work for viewing banking and doing transfers and simple tasks you would expect, however when it comes to getting policy documents that's a whole other story. When I go and try to get my documents it shows my policies and when I click on them it just refreshes the page which is highly frustrating.

This app is so versatile in awesome ways, the easiest way to explain it is just say... use it. I mean, mobile deposits, vehicle insurance cards, transfers... I can even appreciate the safety features built in that keep me from taking screenshots, despite only learning of it after trying... Seriously guys, keep up the good work.

title: myWisely: Financial Wellness
description:
From ADP, the most trusted name in pay, comes myWisely™, a new way to help you manage your money and achieve your financial goals.

myWisely syncs seamlessly with your Wisely™ Pay or Wisely™ Direct card.   With a Wisely card, you’ll no longer need to pick up your paycheck at work.  You’ll no longer need to wait in long lines at the bank to access your money.  And avoid check cashing fees.   Save yourself time and hassle.

IT GETS BETTER.  By downloading myWisely, you can track all of your day to day Wisely card spending to see where your money is going.  It is automatically categorized when you swipe your card, so you know how much you’ve spent on groceries, dining out, shopping, and more.  You can also receive real time transaction and balance alerts.  And get insights and tips on how to spend less.  You can even set up savings goals to help you build a brighter financial future.  For added security, you can also lock and unlock your card at any time.

By using this app with your Wisely card, you’ll be able to view current promotions that are exclusive to your card.   You never know what Wisely will be giving away next, so download myWisely today!

summary: Get paid.  Track spend.  Save more.
recentChanges:
-Change your PIN anytime in your account settings
-Find fee-free ATM locations
-Lock your card straight from your phone if your card is lost or stolen
-Add travel notices, giving you control of where your card can be used to help keep you protected from fraud
-Fixes and improvements

And lastly, we’ve heard and listened to your feedback! Along with bringing you new features like biometric login, we’re constantly improving performance and stability to give you the experience that you deserve!
comments: My biggest complaint is that it doesnt show your pending transactions. It loads slow as well. It has some basic saving features, but its clear that whoever made this app didn't put much thought into it. Edit: @ADP LLC, your reply on how to maybe make it run faster entirely ignores my biggest problem, also that is incredibly basic. May I suggest you just add features to the app and maybe reprogram it? The issue so far is definitely not on my end, your reply didn't help either.

Right now my main complaint is that your app is chunky. It takes forever to load. Its not very responsive. Its a lot like my wife because it tries to control my money but when i touch it i get nothing. Needs lots of fixing. So does the app. Oh and one other thing. The sms doesnt tell me my remaining amount on my card after use. Another thing my wife and it has in common.

Having nothing but problems. Can never log in to the app. The adp use to text me my balance and what was being use as soon as I used it. All I have had is problems with this new way. I also think if it continues to be like this I'll also go to direct deposit if I can't get into my app at all or get the texts like I use to.

I liked it better when it was in the main ADP app. Not only did it take up less space in our overcrowded lives, but it also showed pending payments in a way that made sense and told us our remaining balance in the same text message as the one that alerts us to the card being used. Wisely doesn't do any of that. The other annoying thing about the company in general is the fact that they clearly don't view which areas use their product. There are 0 fee-free ATMs within about 300 miles.

Literally can't log in. I had trouble with the adp solutions app as well. I thought this one looked nicer and would work better. But I click log in and nothing happens. I already signed up with card email and username... I'll change this review once the app actually works. I'm glad I activated texts or I would have to call my card to check the balance... EDIT: So I reinstalled and now I can log in. Keeping the previous text there to help anyone else app works and looks very nice

title: Ally Mobile
description:
Ally Mobile puts everyday banking and investing tasks at your fingertips. It’s fast, secure, and free. You can also access your account quickly using biometrics.

Banking features 
•	Deposit checks with Ally eCheck Deposit℠
•	Transfer money between your Ally Bank accounts and accounts at other banks
•	Pay bills, see scheduled payments and review payment history
•	Check balances and search transaction history
•	View and download statements and tax forms
•	Use Zelle® to pay anyone with a U.S. bank account
•	Find nearby ATMs
•	Set up and manage your debit card preferences and control when, where, and how your card is used with Card Controls
•	Manage CD interest disbursement and maturity options
•	Order checks
•	View and send secure messages, or chat with us using Ally Messenger
•	Update your contact information

Save faster with a smarter Online Savings Account
•	Use buckets to organize your money and visualize what you’re saving for
•	Set up boosters to optimize and maximize your savings 
•	Analyze your account’s performance with insightful charts and graphs


Investing features
Managed Portfolios
•	Cash-enhanced managed portfolios offer hands-off investing with no advisory fees
•	Market-focused options for a fee that keep more of your money invested
•	Automate your investing with one of our four portfolio strategies
•	Monitor your account’s performance — anytime, anywhere
•	Use Goal Tracker to see how well your account’s doing
Self-Directed
•	Trade commission-free on eligible U.S. stocks and ETFs
•	Filter and find exchange-traded funds that match your investment goals with the ETF screener
•	Trade stocks and multi-leg options from your mobile device
•	Use advanced charting tools for technical analysis
•	Monitor your investments with streaming quotes
•	Access today’s market news and market movers
•	Check balances and search transaction history


How we prioritize your security
•	We never store personal or account information on your phone
•	All transactions are encrypted with the same secure technology as online banking
•	The login process is the same as online banking, with security codes as an added layer of protection when you log in from a computer or device we don’t recognize
•	Our Online & Mobile Security Guarantee protects you against fraudulent transactions

More details
•	Ally Mobile is free – your mobile carrier’s message and data rates may apply
•	Compatible with Android 5.0 or higher
•	Deposit Products offered by Ally Bank, Member FDIC
•	Securities offered through Ally Invest Securities LLC, member FINRA/SIPC
•	Securities are NOT FDIC INSURED, NOT BANK GUARANTEED, and MAY LOSE VALUE
•	You may not be approved for real-time quotes

recentChanges:
5.16.1.0
- Fixed some bugs to improve the app for you

5.16.0.0
- Added support for face unlock on Pixel 4 and Pixel 4xl
- Added Order Checks to the Tasks tab for customers with eligible bank accounts
- Launched the ability for a user to be able to perform a Swipe Trade from their Holdings or Watchlist

comments: Never again. Locked my account to verify funds on a check deposit. Why not do what every bank does and show the deposit as pending and unavailable until funds are verified. No, they prevent access to ALL the funds in the account. They'll also send emails telling me I have notifications and I should logon to view them. I can't login to view them because they blocked online and app access to the account, it's completely locked. Did they commissioned the Jr high swim team to start a bank w/ an app?

Used to love it, now I cannot access the app or website via VPN as of late Feb 2020. I've also had issues with the mobile check deposit failing after having no issues for years. I frequently connect to unsecured networks at coffee shops, offices, etc, so no VPN support is a dealbreaker. If this continues I'll take my banking elsewhere.

The trading app is absolutely riddled with bugs. Every time I blink I have to re-log my. It will log me out mid trade. The bid/ask prices are different depending on the screen you are on. On the trade screen, I will see two seperate tiles of the same stock, with different prices. If you lose connection for more than a few seconds, the app piles on errors that all stack. I have had to click ok on no less than 30 errors before I cleared them. Then it makes me re-log. Ally ruined the Tradeking app.

On the snapshot the information that is supposed to be useful (lightbulb between total balance and individual account balances) is not. It is telling me I have transferred money. It says the amount and number of supposed transfers but that is it. I have not transferred any money recently and the lack of context on what transactions it thinks are transfers is quite annoying. I do not find this helpful at all how it is. Please fix things with 3rd party financial monitoring services too.

Every 5 minutes, I get the following message" For security please reenter your password" I then have to totally exit the app and login from scratch. all I get done is logging in. I have to login as many as 100 times a day! If you like logging in constantly, this is the app for you. You can go through all the steps necessary to make a trade and just before you push the buy button, please reenter your password. Then you have to exit the app completely, start the app, and start over. Rate 0

title: Navy Federal Credit Union
description:
Bank easy with the Navy Federal mobile app! With a great look and feel, we’ve made the mobile app easier to find information on your accounts and transactions. Breeze through payments, transfers, and check deposits with just a few taps. Quickly sign-in using a 4-digit passcode. Apply for a credit card, a personal loan, or membership, or find your closest ATM or branch. 

Features: 

• Safe and Secure. Access your accounts 24 hours a day.
• Use your fingerprint or a four digit passcode to see your balances quicker. 
• Easier to find information on your accounts, including transaction details and running balance.
• Make an internal, member, or external transfer through one easy process.
• Bill Pay for making payments on the go.
• Automatically deposit checks using your camera.
• View scheduled transactions, including pending deposits, upcoming transfers, and bill payments.
• Make payments directly to Navy Federal consumer loans, mortgages and credit cards.
• Apply for new credit cards or personal loans, or become a Navy Federal member.
• View and manage statements
• View credit card reward points and redeem cash rewards.
• Order new or replacement debit cards and activate them.
• Update your debit or credit card PIN instantly.
• Change your sign-in password to keep your information safe.
• Set travel notifications.
• Find the nearest branch or ATM with a single tap.
• View rates and info on our loans and savings products, or estimate a payment with a calculator.
• Read timely articles to help educate and plan your financial life.


To sign in to mobile banking, use your Navy Federal username and password. If you are not a member, apply now using the app or call us at 1-888-842-6328 or 1-703-255-8837.

As always, if you have any issues with our app, you can call us at 1-888-842-6328 or 1-703-255-8837, or reach us via Twitter at @NavyFederalHelp.

Federally insured by NCUA.

Message and data rates may apply.

recentChanges:
Lots of small changes and one big one:

* We now support split screen for phones and tablets! Put the Navy Federal app side by side with your other favorite apps

comments: Worked great, until I changed my password. Also worked fine until I changed my password. Now everyone I try logging in, it says my preferred sign in has been disabled, and I need to enter my password. When I do this, it says it doesn't match what is on file. To work around, I'm having to clear cache/data and sign in fresh EVERY SINGLE TIME. This is super frustrating.

Never once had a single issue with the app, opened it this morning and was told to enjoy my newly updated app. Well this newly updated app, is not working at all. It fails to open most of the time and when it finally does open, it will freeze for about 5 seconds and then a message will pop up saying the "app has stopped working." I uninstalled and reinstalled the app plus restarted my phone, but the same issues with the app. Why update the app if it was working fine with no issues ??

It would be a ZERO if I could. All of the sudden I can't access my account through the app when I need it most. The app was great until now. Absolute trash app if I cannot reach what I need when I need it and without explanation. Haven't seen my account in a week and counting. I'm quite certain that I will get some BS excuse for the failures of the app and "assured" it is "being handled". If the app being down all the time wasn't an issue beforehand, this review wouldn't be so bad. 3+ times/wk.

This app crashes consistently and has repeatable instances of failure. Every time I need to deposit a check I have to reinstall the app. If I have the app remember this device I am unable to login again because the username text box is removed from the login screen. Making a payment to my credit card also crashes the app once I do reinstall and login. When handling money and debts it is frustrating knowing that an electronic interface is force closing itself in the middle of transactions.

Unable to deposit checks as of the last few months. It tells me the checks are unreadable every single time using 3 different devices: 2 Android and 1 iOS. This is really the only reason I have the app. I notified the developers a long time ago and they pushed a new update without fixing it. The check deposit function saves me over an hour of driving to my nearest branch. Without it, I would be better off switching banks - which I don't want to do, but will if this isn't fixed.

title: thinkorswim Mobile: Trade. Invest. Buy & Sell.
description:
Commission free stock trading, now that’s smart! With the thinkorswim Mobile app, you can trade with the power of your desktop in the palm of your hand. Invest through your Android phone and tablet, with one of the top rated trading apps that lets you place commission free stock, ETF, and option trades easily and securely. With thinkorswim Mobile, you get the education, innovation, and support that helps you trade confidently with TD Ameritrade, Where Smart Investors Get Smarter®.

Features: 

•	Trade stocks, complex options, futures, and forex.  Create and modify advanced orders and add order conditions quickly and easily.
•	Chat with a trading specialist in real-time – even share your screen without ever leaving the app.
•	Live stream programming from TD Ameritrade Network (through our affiliate, TD Ameritrade Media Productions Company)* and CNBC (US, Asia and Europe), and get in-depth company profiles from Trefis** to uncover key insights. 
•	Practice your trading strategies with real market data using paperMoney® – without risking a dime.***

comments: This app is constantly having connection issues. It always tells me that my connection is show when it is not. And it frequently tells me there's no common l connection when there is. Lastly, it always takes forever to pull up a stock when I type it into the search bar. Sometimes it just hangs there with the icon. These are some things that needs to be addressed

TOS is great for giving you a lot of data. But the app does not make it easy to use, constantly has connection issues even though you have a good connection. It only allows for 1 attempt at getting your fingerprint correctly before then asking for your password which is extremely annoying. It should allow for at least 3 attempts prior to asking for passwords. When looking through home page, it is cumbersome to use. When going thru your positions and then clicking it, you then have to click the menu button and click "view xxx details" before being able to see the chart for that ticker. Switching between Paper money and live trading glitches the app and only putting the phone into airplane mode and then back fixes it.

I thought it was just time for a new phone and maybe it still is but on my pixel 3a there's always a message that there's no network connection and it stays stuck like that for a while. But yet I'm still able to surf the web and log onto other apps that use the web. Only if I restart my phone or disconnect and reconnect to my wifi would it let me actually log in. I can't keep doing that especially in the market of today, 3/17/2020.

Connectivity issues. I wasn't about to leave a review, but I decided I must when I saw dozens of similar complaints to my issue that have obviously gone unaddressed. I can't access this app, which itself cites connectivity problems when literally no other apps share this problem. My internet access is working fine. ToS, however, is leaving me out to dry.

I have a solid signal. I can log in to my Schwab account, surf web using mobile fine. Try to log on using the app get message, no network connections detected. What a joke. The futures charts and quotes having major lag issues today is 12 March 2020 getting worse. Nothing but problems with this junk app. Solid internet connection can use multiple other apps and search, this app tells me no internet available. What a joke TOS!

title: ConnectNetwork by GTL
description:
The ConnectNetwork mobile app provides quick access to our most popular services. Using the app, you can create a ConnectNetwork account, manage your account information, make deposits into various accounts, send Messages, photos and videos to your loved ones, and (NEW) take advantage of Walk-In-Retail (Pay by cash) as an alternative to using a credit card.   

Our features are based on the facility. To find out which features are available to your inmate, please add them to your account.  

• Create and Manage your ConnectNetwork Account  
• Make Payments and Deposits for ConnectNetwork services, such as:

  o AdvancePay Phone (Prepaid Collect) o Trust Fund (Inmate Trust Account) 
o PIN Debit (Inmate Phone Account)  
o Debit Link (Inmate Account for Tablet Services)
o Walk-In-Retail, a new convenient cash payment method 

• Messaging (Email)  

o View your Messaging inbox, send and compose messages, and save drafts 
o Use your credit or debit card to purchase Message credits 
o Add a photo or video attachment to your Message 
o Depending on the facility, send credits to receive a reply

recentChanges:
- Improvements to the inmate management features.
- Bug Fixes.
comments: I've switched to this GTL app about 10 months ago. It was fine the first month but after the first month it wouldn't let me add money to my phone. It always says that there was an error and if it was processed that I would receive an email. There is an extra word in my address on my profile. It won't let me edit my information. Also it doesn't let me know when I get a message. I have to go completely into the app messages to see if I have any messages.

I had this 3 years ago and it worked fine that first year, then suddenly it crashed. It's been 2 years and I still can't get it to work. Now if I tap the app, onscreen is the message: Unfortunately Connect Network GTL has stopped. I can't get the app to open. I tried clearing its data and cache, but it has no improvement.The staff has tried to help me, but still did no good. It should be simple to operate!!!

Will NOT ACCEPT my payment... Ever since I got a new debit card with the same account number different expiration date different CVC code it will not accept my payments. I have uninstalled and reinstalled. I have deleted payment options from the online account. Re-added saved payment methods. Still have to go online every time using a laptop. It's extremely inconvenient. And annoying. When will this be Fixed? Accept my payment amount from the internet browser no problem.

There are occasional issues, adding funds has been the most recent issue. For awhile credits would disappear. If you use a pin/passcode to open app if your screen goes off for any reason like a call coming in it will erase whole messages when it should automatically be saved to drafts. I can not delete phone numbers I no longer use, I can not delete inmates off the messaging although I can block them but sometimes I do not feel blocking is necessary but have no need to see their names listed

2/ 12/20The app has stopped letting me do deposit. It is very frustrating. But if it helps others if you log in online and not thru the app you can put money on the accounts that way. Still doesn't let me do the deposit on accounts. Only can do it online. This app is useless and needs to be reprogrammed. I would give 0 stars if possible. ** UPDATE- YOUR APP IS STILL NOT WORKING!! WOULD YOU PLEASE FIX IT!!! 0 STARS**

title: WorldRemit Money Transfer App: Send Money Abroad
description:
Send money internationally with WorldRemit. With low fees and upfront exchange rates, transfer money to friends and family overseas in over 150 countries using our money transfer app.

To get started, you can now use the code 3FREE and save the fees in your first three money transfers abroad.

Download the app now and save money and time in your international money transfer to more than 150 countries. It’s quick, simple and secure to use and in most cases your funds will be with family and friends in a matter of minutes. 

Using our money transfer app, you can also send money in a choice of ways including bank deposit, cash pickup, mobile money and airtime top-up.

Our app also comes with some very useful features. For example, it enables you to track your transactions, so you’ll always know the exact status of your transfer.  

Send money fast all over the world
•	Using our app you can send money from 50 countries to recipients in 150 countries worldwide.
•	These countries include the Philippines 🇵🇭, Kenya 🇰🇪, Nigeria 🇳🇬, Zimbabwe 🇿🇼and India 
•	Some of our major international partners include M-Pesa, EcoCash, MTN, Metrobank and many more

A convenient and extensive service
•	Extensive network and coverage: no matter how remote your recipients are, we probably have a convenient way for them to quickly get access to the money you’ve sent
•	Depending on the destination you're sending to, you can choose whether your recipient gets the money via bank transfer, collects it in cash or receives it in their mobile money account 
•	Identify and track where your money is at all times 
•	Save your recipients to your contact list so you needn’t fill in their details every time 

Instant money transfers
We offer you one of the fastest ways to get your money in the hands of the person you are sending it to.
•	Over 85% of mobile money transfers are paid within 10 minutes or less 🚀
•	70% transfers sent via cash pickups are instant
•	Over 50% of bank deposits are paid within 10 minutes
•	All airtime top-ups are instant.

Low cost transfers
•	We offer guaranteed exchange rates and you can choose to get daily notifications updates
•	Our low-cost fees are clearly displayed upfront
•	Use the code 3FREE 🆓 to save all the fees on your first money transfers . This is just the start - every now and then we’ll run other money-saving promotions. Watch this space…. 

Send money with confidence
•	More than 4 million customers trust us to send and receive money internationally
•	Approved by the FCA and licensed by government regulators around the world
•	125,000+ 5⭐reviews from happy customers
•	When your transfer is complete, you and the recipient receive an SMS or email alert
•	Industry-leading technology protecting your money at all times 🔒 

Need to transfer? Here’s how it works:
1.	Choose the country that you want to send to
2.	Confirm the transfer service - bank deposit, cash pickup, mobile money or an airtime top-up
3.	Select how much you want to send
4.	Add your recipient’s details
5.	Choose your payment method

Download now for free and start sending money quickly and securely.

For more information, please visit: www.worldremit.com

Want to get in touch with us? Whether you have a question to ask, or a problem to solve, our Customer Service team is available 24/7, 365 days a year to assist you at  www.worldremit.com/en/contact-us

Find out more about how to use the 3FREE promotional code visiting www.worldremit.com/3FREE

comments: Tried setting up an account. Gave them all my information and waited over a month for my transfer to be completed. In the end had to cancel my transfer because it looked like nothing would happen. Switched over to TransferWise. I got verified and already did my first transfer without any problems.

I have been using this since last year and it was all good but it has been horrible now. My fiancee transferred money wallet to wallet,but after I withdrew on my wallet, it only says waiting authorization(even after 24hours).Went to the place for cash pickup but I was told,there was nothing in their system.After talking to W.R. support for more than 5times they all said they're having tech. difficulty and cant process OUR money! 2 days later, still having trouble??WHERE IS OUR MONEY??

I made my first transaction about two weeks ago and have since made a couple more. For being able to send money internationally, I've not used a better app than this. I'm able to direct deposit or mobile cash or pickup. What I like most of all is the ability to track and that I'm also notified when the money is picked-up. My first transaction had a problem but they worked with me through it all. We corrected the error and completed the transaction. AWESOME SAUCE!!! Keep it up!!!

Needs improvement. I had a problem with trying to pick up a transaction, made 4 trips to the place, emailed and called tech support a few times, and spoke with the local partner and could not get a resolution. Ended up cancelling the transaction and I didn't get a reply to my inquiry on the website. Probably won't use their service again if they don't reach out. Wasted my time and $$$

I tried sending a simple mobile transfer from UK to GCash ewallet in Philippines. Offer described largely in many company online pages as something awesome. Online I did not even find the mobile sending option; I opened account in app: here not even Philippines or UK were in the country list! The help support was not available in chat; by email they sent me instructions just to resend the same inquiry - "ask the sender", when the enquiry email was from me, sender. I've time to fix scams. Follow.

title: PayPal Prepaid
description:
The PayPal Prepaid Mobile App lets you manage every aspect of your account wherever you are, whenever you need it. That means it’s easy to do things like:

•  Transfer funds instantly from your PayPal Account to your PayPal Prepaid Card Account

•  Check your account balance and transaction history

•  Find no cost reload locations

• Load checks straight to your account – it’s as easy as taking a picture*


It’s secure, fast, and best of all, free.**

The latest version of the  PayPal Prepaid Mobile App requires Android version 4.4 and higher. If you have Android OS version 4.3 or lower, we recommend using the Online Account Center available at https://www.paypal-prepaid.com/account/login.

* Mobile Check Load is a service provided by First Century Bank, N.A. and Ingo Money, Inc., subject to the First Century Bank and Ingo Money Terms and Conditions, and Privacy Policy. Approval review usually takes 3 to 5 minutes but can take up to one hour. All checks are subject to approval for funding in Ingo Money’s sole discretion. Fees apply for approved Money in Minutes transactions funded to your card. Unapproved checks will not be funded to your card. Ingo Money reserves the right to recover losses resulting from illegal or fraudulent use of the Ingo Money Service. Your wireless carrier may charge a fee for message and data usage. Additional transaction fees, costs, terms and conditions may be associated with the funding and use of your card. See your Cardholder Agreement for details.

** While this feature is available for free, certain other transaction fees and costs, terms, and conditions are associated with the use of this Card. See the Cardholder Agreement for details.

recentChanges: Bug fixes and minor enhancements.
comments: I've been trying to set up my account for hours now. I get pass the card information part then when it ask for the last four of my social security number it takes forever to load and nothing ever happens every single time on the web browser on the app anything I try I get the same results each time. It won't even let me connect my PayPal account to it. It says every time The supplied PayPal account is not linked to your Prepaid account. My card is activated so I don't what the problem is.

Difficult to navigate. Having trouble using my card, loading my card, can't transfer money from my account to my card. Can't add a card. The regular pay pal app is so much better. And it's free. I pay $5 a month for this frustrating service that I can't use. Not anymore!
I like it a lot, but I had an emergency and couldn't verify the second form of identity. My phone number changed and I was left with sending a letter, or wait two days with no access to my account.

Wont verify my identity! After going thru 2 internets, laptop, 2 different browsers and the app! I'm wondering if this is a scam. Update: Card is now activated but won't link to my PayPal account. It says "The supplied PayPal account is not linked to your prepaid account." I put the correct info in! Who's account is it linked to then?! Absolutely no customer service! PayPal was of no help. Junk!

Truly false advertisement! Not only are the customer service lines terrible but not only will the app not let me set up my card it wont let me on the website either . And I really needed this account. App Fail.

title: Earnin - Get paid today
description:
Earnin is a community-supported app with a mission to build a financial system that works for people. Access up to $500 between paychecks, explore savings options on medical bills, help avoid unnecessary overdraft fees, and earn cash back on your purchases.
 
Four financial tools in one simple, easy-to-use app. With Earnin, there are no hidden fees. Just pay what you think is fair.

THREE SIMPLE STEPS TO CASH OUT:
---------------------------------------------------------
1. Connect your bank and tell us where you work.
2. We’ll verify your bank and confirm your hours worked; you cash out up to $100 per day and tip what you think is fair, between $0-14*.
3. On payday, we’ll debit your account for the money you cashed out plus any tip.
 
FAST FACTS:
---------------------
• 75%: 75% of members say Earnin has increased their ability to pay for gas and get to work.
 
• 15M: Community members have tipped extra to cover a fellow member’s tip over 15 million times.
 
• $133: Health Aid has found average negotiated savings of $133 per community member. (Results not guaranteed)
 
• $100M:  If members made the same purchases without accessing their pay using Earnin, they would have incurred over $100M in additional overdraft fees in June 2019.
 
OUR TOOLS:
--------------------
+ Cash Out 
Get paid when you want. Up to $100 per day, and up to $500 per pay period.
 
+ Health Aid
Send us your medical bill and we will negotiate with your medical provider to try to reduce your balance and/or find you a more affordable payment plan.
 
+ Balance Shield
Balance Shield Alerts notify you when your bank balance is getting low. Balance Shield Cash Outs send up to $100 of your earnings directly into your account to help avoid the chance of overdrafts.*
 
+ Cash Back Rewards:
Earn up to 10% cash back when you shop at 1000’s of participating local and national businesses.
 
OTHER FEATURES:
------------------------------
+ Lightning Speed
Connect your debit card to your Earnin account and receive your money in less time, with no additional charge!

+ Live Chat Support
If you have any questions or issues with the app, our Live Chat team is available 24/7, including all holidays.

+ 256-Bit Bank-Level Data Encryption
Earnin uses bank-level encryption to protect and secure your data.

+ Financial Calendar
A handy tool that informs you of any upcoming payments.
 

*Note that tipping options will vary between tools.
*Once Balance Shield is activated, it must be reset after each use.

Love the app? Leave a review! Your feedback helps us improve your experience.

recentChanges: To create a better experience for our community, we made bug fixes and performance enhancements in the app. Love Earnin? Rate us! Providing feedback is one way our community looks out for one another.
comments: A little tricky to get things set up properly. Needs work to streamline things. "Lightning speed" doesn't work with all banks (example: my bank placed a 3 day "check hold" on transactions through debit). Once setup is done though, it works really well. Pretty accurate daily logging and cash outs happen exactly when promised. Hands down, it's worlds better than taking out payday loans. If you're in a cycle of payday loan debt, do yourself a favor and try this app. (not a sponsored post).

3/19/2020 - Just wanted to give an update. This app was working great....for a while. But earlier this month it just stopped working. Now I dont know whether it is on their end or something with my bank, but I find certain things funny and annoying. They keep raising my max - yet I cant even withdraw. They cant access my bank info -- but they will gladly take money out even without knowing my balance. This needs to be fixed soon because it is very frustrating. They will cause me to overdraw.

It started off great! Then every pay period started experiencing Bank connectivity issue. I spoke to a number of reps about the situation and They keep giving me the same info about the app. I tried restarting it. Tried putting Bank info again. Nothing would allow me to connect. Im 5 days into the NEW pay period. Was able to Cash out once. Still havent gotten back to me about the problem. This app is great at time. But sucks alot more.

It worked fine for two weeks. For the past 2 pay periods it keeps telling me my account is negative, I had to send screenshots of my deposits and balances and it still did not update. I entered and reentered my bank information at least 9 times, nothing. I tried to chat about it but kept getting the same generic response to choose my bank again and.... I'm waiting to see what happens before I uninstall. UPDATE: I decided to keep it, it really works!Keep doing what you're doing Earnin. 👍

I think this is a great app that helps you out when you need the money after paying bills...however as a warning don't too excited and cash out too much when your max goes up. Just like anything else a budget must be in place, otherwise when they debit your paycheck you may think to yourself "ouch". Its a wonderful app, just be responsible

title: Tithe.ly
description:
Give to your church in just a few seconds. Don't see your church in the app? Tell them to sign up at http://tithe.ly.

+ Track your giving
+ Giving is secured using SSL with 256-bit encryption
+ Give using all major credit cards
descriptionHTML:
Give to your church in just a few seconds. Don't see your church in the app? Tell them to sign up at http://tithe.ly.

+ Track your giving
+ Giving is secured using SSL with 256-bit encryption
+ Give using all major credit cards
summary: Give to your church in just a few seconds.
recentChanges:
Version 2.1.0 changes include:
- A small change was made to app permissions.
comments: Ok, but when I say find nearest church it can't find my church when I'm sitting in the pew. Also, it would be nice to remember my church from week to week rather than having to search all over again for it. The app seems to assume I'm more likely to give to a new church every week.

Very handy. Sadly, I had not paid tithes faithfully since I got direct deposit years ago. This app single-handedly got me back on track. I would give five stars if you could EDIT a recurring payment. However, you just have to delete and redo as of summer 2019. Also, I wish I could schedule a future payment.

My wife set up an account, it was great for the first time. I had to switch bank account information, forgot my password, it sent a reset link, but when I reset my password, all my info was gone. It told me I had to set up a new account. As I input the info asked for, I realized it wanted me to set up a church for others to give to. That was June 1, 2019, it's the 11th, tried again. Went to my church, I asked for help..they were stumped as well. So I have erased the app. will use checks now.
This app works fine but touch ID feature, doesn't work on Android, or at least, not my pixel 3a...

Wöw!!! What An Awesome App.. Tithe.ly has changed my world when it comes to giving at church. I don't like caring cash... I don't have to worry about filling out a tithe envelope, look for an ink pen nor lick the envelope any more...It's as easy as 123. Once your home church has established Tithe.ly account for the church, You can too ENJOY the Modern Day Technique in GIVING! We Have Gotten to Keep Up With The Times..   The only thing I had to do was download the app, follow the prompts, & pick the church of my choice that I wanted to give to. So Upon pay day, I Simply, Tap the Tithe App. This also Encourage me to pay Tithes before I Accidently see something I want instead of I Need... 🤔😉 Soooo, All in saying to get my tithe out of the way before the temptation of shopping or etc. I can now pay my  tithes from my car, home or etc.  It also sends your confirmation to your email as well as keep all money you have paid accountable for. I've been paying Through Tithe.ly over 6 Months & It's been a PLEASURE!!! HALLELUJAH!!! God Has Answered Another One of My Prayers.. An Exceptional Way of Given.

title: NerdWallet: Credit Score, Budgeting & Finance
description:
See the bigger picture of your money, stay in the know whenever your credit score or finances change, and get personalized recommendations to help you grow your money and reach your financial goals. 

Download this personal finance app today and join the millions of people who are already using NerdWallet to make smart money moves. 

Easily see the bigger picture of your money
Get a clear and complete view of your finances. With easy-to-read summaries and insights, you can easily check your credit score report, account balances, spending and more – all on one screen.  

Stay close to your money with notifications and alerts
We'll keep you up to speed when anything major changes to your finances – whether it's a large purchase, deposit or major change to your credit score.

Get personalized recommendations
See how you can build your credit score, avoid paying late fees, earn more interest and more – all with insights that are personal to you. 

Grow your money with rewards
Maximize your points and miles, earn more cash back and easily find the best products for you. 

CREDIT REPORT TRACKING AND MONITORING

See the important details on your credit report
Easily check your score, learn how to build your credit score and know where you stand on all the most important credit report factors.

SPENDING AND SAVING FEATURES

Track your total money
Know your grand total and easily see how you're doing across your checking, savings, investment, and retirement accounts – all on one screen.

See the ins and outs of your money every month
We factor in your income, expenses and upcoming bills so you know how much you have left to save or spend – making it easy to check how you're doing. 

Know where your money is going
After linking your accounts, you can easily see your spending broken down by category to help you spot trends.

Get insights about your spending
See tailored insights and financial savings tips that are personal to you, and can help you build your bottom line. 

Take action on our money-growing recommendations
Make free transfers between your accounts at different banks without leaving NerdWallet. All you have to do is link your accounts. 

See the best products for you
Your situation is unique; your money moves should be, too. Get money-saving product recommendations based on your credit score and spending.

TIPS TO HELP YOU EARN MORE REWARDS

Take advantage of your most rewarding cards
See the rewards rates on each of your cards so you know what to swipe where. You don't even have to link your accounts to see these tips. 

Extra cash in your pocket
You don't need a rewards card to earn rewards. Just link any qualifying card and start earning an additional 2-10% cash back at participating stores, both online and nearby.

DEBT-TRACKING TOOLS

See the comprehensive view of what you owe
From loans to credit card debt, you can get a personal view of everything you owe.

Stay on top of upcoming payments
Never miss a credit card bill with helpful reminders when bills are due. 

Download this personal finance app today and see why NerdWallet gets mentioned by NBC, CNN, Fox, the New York Times, the Wall Street Journal and many, many more publications.

comments: Works well when it links accounts. It booted one of my major accounts off and now my information is incorrect and incomplete (for 6 Months). I have not been able to successfully contact support and resolve this issue. App is ideal otherwise. I'm looking, and no updates available. I dont know what to do. No phone support. When I did the chat support, no resolution.

Post install setup flow is a bad experience. There is a screen where you can select the types of use cases you plan on leveraging the app for. I was planning on clicking a few but when I clicked the first one (credit score) it automatically navigated into the credit score setup flow. Upon completion it didn't take me back to select another one. So I then I linked my bank account and the account balances were incorrect. The app allowed me to unlink my bank account but not my credit score account.

Love this app! I already knew about the website years ago and loved using them to choose credit cards. But this app really is a step up. It helps me keep track of my credit score, see my accounts, how I'm spending money, home valuation details and it give me information about how to improve my credit.

Illuminating, finally an app that hasn't tried to sell me something in the first 10 minutes and let me just organize my finances onto one app. The Robo Advisors send you to pointed articles, and they're sized to answer thoughtful questions without information overload. Highly recommend.

Constantly disconnecting from my accounts. It is getting pretty bad to the point where every time I check something is needing reverification. Please fix your app so I can go back to giving it five stars.

title: CARD.com Mobile
description:
Deposit checks with a picture, switch between your multiple cards, and check your balance without having to login using "Quick Balance." Everything needed to service your CARD.com account is now in our new, easy to navigate app. And easy to access with optional fingerprint login!

Find nearby ATMs, locate cash reload stores, and get instructions on how to use direct deposit or transfer funds from a bank account, or virtual wallet such as PayPal or Google Wallet.

Don't have a CARD.com card with us? Choose from thousands of card designs inside the app and sign up for one that matches you.

Your CARD.com prepaid card is accepted worldwide. Use it everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted. Use it everywhere debit Mastercard is accepted.

Download the CARD.com app today, and manage your finances in a flash.
descriptionHTML:

summary: Banking fully from your smartphone. Manage everything related to your account!
developerAddress: CARD Corporation, P.O. Box 543000, Omaha, NE 68154, USA
recentChanges: Fixes some pesky bugs
comments: Personalized Debit Card options are by far the best I have ever used . Each deposit , cash upload and all my transactions are instantly updated , and there are plenty of upload and deposit locations in my area. However .... The $10 Monthly maintnence fee is way to extreme for a pre-paid card. Also... The Instant Check Deposit feature has not worked one time for me , I have tried 3 different checks in which they all were on different days as well. I rate this pre-paid debit card a 8 out of 10.

It's a good card to use with kids teaching how to budget and understandings of living within your means. With the fees you are paying every time you touch it. The moment you pull it out your wallet=fee, just thinking about an online purchase=it fee, actual purchase swipe =fee, calling for balance=fee. Using this card will definitely help you get a real bank account that's not in the face mugging you. Banks fees are tact on by overdrafts not.

I LOVE this card!! I have several others but mainly use this one!! And the card has SO MANY dif picture options that are AWESOME!! I LOVE WOLVES & I swear, there are between 12,18, 24 or MORE wolf pics to have on your card!! And I've never had ANY issues using my card whether I'm using it on-line, in store or on phone!! You WILL LOVE all the options you have!! I know I do!!

Perfect way to get your paycheck a couple days early with direct deposit (no $9.95 fee if you direct deposit $1000.00 or more a month) , transfer money from your bank account , you can take a picture of a check in the App to add it to your account balance , you can receive multiple cards , I have mine added to my G pay account to pay with my phone or smart watch ( make sure your phone or watch is NFC capable in the settings menu of your device ). Install the App and check out the many options!!!

Just started using this and next month I'll be having direct deposit and using this more. Looking forward on using my card and getting my money two days sooner . I know I'll like it more and can't wait to start using it. I also do a lot of online shopping so this will help me too.

title: Possible Finance: Borrow Money Fast & Build Credit
description:
Access fast and affordable money, build credit, and fight costly fees. Borrow up to $500* in minutes even with bad or no credit. Repay in installments to build credit and improve financial health. Prevent overdrafts and recover your hard-earned money. Join over a million users who are avoiding money from predatory lenders and using Possible to make financial fairness a reality!

More cash than paycheck advance apps
A $100 cash advance isn’t always enough. Avoid overdraft fees, payday loan apps, and payday advance apps and borrow money up to $500* in minutes.

Get money fast
Don’t wait until payday and get hit by overdraft fees! Apply for a loan in a few simple steps. Once approved, money can be sent straight to your debit card so that you have immediate access to your loan.

Fight bank fees
Prevent costly fees and automatically reclaim your hard-earned money. Banks drain cash from your account when you can least afford it. We’ll get it back.

Build credit
Get immediate cash help as well as an affordable way to build credit. We'll report to TransUnion, Equifax and Experian, making our loan a great way to repair your score! Payday advances and payday loans can’t do this!

Flexible repayments
A more adaptable cash option than other loans or payday advance alternatives, multiple repayments are spread out across the next few paychecks and rescheduling is easy.

Good credit not required
We don’t check your FICO score so you can get approved with bad or no credit! Our loan app links directly with your existing bank account to help make a smart decision.

What people are saying
“It’s like borrowing money from a good friend...Seriously the best experience I’ve ever had with a lender...I will not go anywhere else for installment loans from now on! 110% recommend!” -NellyVille1027 on August 25, 2018

Availability
Possible is currently available to California, Florida, Texas, Ohio, Washington, Idaho, and Utah residents. We're launching in additional states and you'll be added to the waitlist by registering for an account.

Terms
Loan terms and APRs vary depending on state regulations. States licenses can be found here: https://www.possiblefinance.com/licenses/. Average loan term for paid-off loans is over 60 days. As an example, per Washington state law, ​a loan from Possible Finance has a max fee of 15% for every $100 borrowed.

*Max amounts vary by state and subject to lender approval
**Loan structure can vary by state. For example, in California, a single payment loan can be converted into multiple payments.

recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: I'm impressed, I didn't expect to qualify and did immediately despite having a low credit score which I'm trying to improve thanks to Possible. My only minor complaint is the 4 payment option is really 2 because 2 of the payments are scheduled for the same day. Still one of if not the best loan apps available. Helps in a pinch and builds credit, thus far I'm absolutely satisfied. Great customer service too. Thanks for the opportunity!

Thank you! Amazing app that makes me feel confident using. I was sick with longterm illness so my credit took a hit with medical bills & drop in income for few years. My wife has been trying to help get it up a bit & this app is definitely a Plus for both building credit & helping out when in a tight spot. To top it off? I found out the headquarters is in my state. Awesomely Awesome! Credit score is climbing!

Beware. Seems good to have access to borrow money with a reasonable bad credit interest rate. Unfortunately, when you have an issue they don't have a working customer service number and only email you back. The emails are somewhat generic; which happens often when you aren't talking directly to someone. I've wanted to pay off my defaulted loan for months now. I get emails telling me to do so in app and the suggestions aren't working.Don't deal with any company that doesn't have a customer serv#

It was great for awhile. Then when i decided to switch banks and made sure they put my new account as the primary payment account. But then they still pulled out from my old account again!! Causing my old bank account to go -$300! Ive reached out but now im left paying that back for their mistakes. Its a great app for building credit but just becareful.

I had issues with the app sending the money after the loan was approved. I emailed over the course of several days but didnt hear anything except the automated email. After I left a negative review, the issue was addressed same day. Other then that experience Im very happy with possible finance.

title: Stock Market Tracker
description:
Get real-time stock quotes and alerts with Uplift, the best stock market app for Android.

✓ Track US stock markets or international stock markets
✓ Stock market news feed for each stock quote
✓ Stock portfolios for NASDAQ, NYSE, Dow Jones, ETFs, Indices, S&P 500
✓ Stock market live quotes, to monitor your stock portfolio and investments easily

Our stocks tracker pulls in real-time stock market quotes so you're always up-to-date. You can watch stocks and follow market news, view your portfolio, get stock alerts, and follow the major stock exchanges. You can also set stock price notifications, so that when a stock you're watching reaches your target price you'll get a stock price alert.

Top features
★ Real-time stock quotes, easy to track portfolios, and up-to-the-minute data to help you stay on top of the markets. We aim to be the best stock quote app with real-time stocks.

★ Build your own portfolio and monitor your favorite stocks, indexes, mutual funds, and ETFs

★ Set alerts and get push notifications for stocks on your watch list

★ Multiple portfolios to keep track of your stock trading and investments

★ Financial data including open price, close price, daily high/low, 52-week high/low, gain/loss, aftermarket and premarket, end-of-day quote, EPS, P/E ratio, dividend, and dividend yield

★ Stock charts and including daily and intraday charts, plus weekly, monthly, and yearly historical charts

★ Stock market news for tickers listed in US stock markets

★ Advanced features including ROA, ROE, cash flow including FCF and OCF per share, revenue growth, P/B, asset turnover, leverage, stocks tracker, forward P/E, and PEG ratio

Investing and monitoring the financial markets doesn't have to be hard! Whether you're looking to buy, sell, or just keep track of your portfolio, Uplift will help you get stock quotes and stock alerts to react to market news in real time.

Supports thousands of stock tickers and companies to invest in. 

Questions or comments? Let us know: uplifthelp@gmail.com. We aim to be the best stock market app for Android 🚀

comments: Don't know how good this is overall, stopped short and uninstalled due to graphing control. Once you tap into zoom/scroll mode, you can't get back to curser mode. And doesn't have screen rotation or full screen graphs.

Good. Notifications should be removed after first snoozed one. I received a notification after the marked closed, i have closed it and i have received several others... a little bit anoying but i changed the limits and it was ok.

This is a great simple app and I am happy I got the paid version, it would be really great if app would also some visuals on company's revenue and profit over the past several years from their earning calls.

the info in the paid service are not impressive enough. at least it should show the 52 week low price. or even let the user, choose to show 2 year low, 3 year low price, or whatever time span. these are info the info service provider could easily provide. that would save much effort to the end users
It is simple to use. It quick if ur just wanting a update. I like it because I can set a alarm when a price is close to my limit order.

title: Branch: Get $100 Before Payday
description:
Branch allows you to budget your paycheck and instantly access $100 of your earned wages before payday.

Now you don’t need to worry about your cash flow -- Find out if you qualify on Branch for instant pay and then use the funds to buy gas, pay your bills and tackle emergencies. Branch helps you avoid late fees, overdrafts and credit card debt!

Branch is the best app for hourly workers -- users can get paid instantly, budget paychecks between pay periods, get upcoming bill reminders and low balance alerts.

With the Branch app, you can:

- Budget smarter: get budget, balance information and upcoming bill reminders
- Access earnings: qualify to access a portion of your paycheck and get paid instantly
- Grow financially: grow within your company by adding skills, endorsements and certificates to your profile
- Earn more money: pickup shifts available at your work location (*Available for select employers)
- Avoid overdrafts: get low balance and overdraft alerts
- Track your earnings: find out how much you will make each shift and every week
- Chat with your team: stay in touch with your coworkers on a private and secure chat

Unlike other apps, we have no required fees, credit checks or hidden membership costs.

If you have any questions or comments, please reach out to us at support@branchapp.com.

We’re constantly making improvements and creating new features based on user feedback. If something doesn’t look right, email us at support@branchapp.com, and we’ll take care of it ASAP.

Here’s the latest round of updates we’re excited to share with you:
