Thank you for using Branch!
comments: Once I have gotten set up, it appears that the app is working fine. But, my God, the process of getting to that point was an absolute nightmare. In fact, it took me three days of trying and constantly having to endure the app crashing. Plus, everytime I got a message stating that my bank account was set up, it made me go through the process five more times! It would appear that the app was launched prematurely, without ensuring the product is fully operative. Am I correct? Be honest, please.

Update: Finally was able to receive advance Update: After submitting a ticket now my issue I my deposits. (Funny) My payday can no longer be detected. (Wow) My account was finally verified. I meet all the requirements except one. My debit card does not meet the requirements. Which not true. I use my card at least 5 times a day. How much activity do I need?

At first this App was great. I took out a loan like 2 times. The first time it only allowed me to take out $25. I payed it back on time, and then the next time I went to take out a loan it allowed me to take out $50. I payed back on time, but now it's only giving me the option to take out a loan for $25. This makes no since. Why would I be allowed to take out $50 pay back on time, them lower my amount to $25… I'm very upset because I really needed to take out $50 to buy some grocery's especially

I started using Branch three or four weeks ago and it has yet to let me down at all whatsoever a single time. It's been very convenient and satisfying to receive the amount that I qualify for an order to get a Pay advance to begin with. It's been on point every single week and I love this app!! 💯

Total crock of steaming BS!! I was placed o the waitlist for the debit card, and continued to use the cash advance service provided. Last time i received a cash advance was two weeks ago. When i reveived the debit card, i activated it, and set up direct deposit for my payroll. Now i am being told that my account has been locked due to "suspicious activity" when there has been no activity with my card since it was received, and it's going to take up to three business days for them to fix . . .

title: ebtEDGE
description:
ebtEDGE mobile application simplifies your life when you depend on SNAP or TANF benefits allowing you to view your benefits at the touch of a finger. ebtEDGE allows you to check your balances, review your transaction history. If you have both SNAP and TANF benefits you will have access to view both benefits at the same time. 
•	Free for cardholder use.
•	The most private and secure EBT application on the market.
•	If your phone supports bio-metrics, and you’ve registered your finger print
        to your phone, simply touch the finger sensor on your device, and quickly 
        access the balance of your accounts. 
•	If your feel more comfortable using the traditional method, entering your 
        card number and then PIN, we support that too.
•	Securely login with User ID and Password.
•	View your deposit history.
•	View your transaction history.
•	View your benefit schedule.
•	Select a PIN.
•	Need help? We have plenty of that in the resources section or the Help Center
•	Locate SNAP retailers near your location or where you are going to with the 
        location services.
•	Set your language preferences to English, Spanish or Haitian Creole.
•	New features around the corner… stay tuned…
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
1.	Only certain devices are capable for either touch id or face id login.
2.	For State SNAP or TANF cardholders with eligible cards.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Free for your use in the following states:
Alaska, Arizona, California, Colorado, District of Columbia, Florida, Guam, Hawaii, Idaho, Kansas, Kentucky, Minnesota, North Carolina, North Dakota, Nebraska, New Mexico, Nevada, Oregon, Rhode Island, South Dakota, Virgin Islands, Vermont, West Virginia, Wisconsin and Wyoming.

recentChanges: Bug fixes and enhancements.
comments: GREAT APP!!! I Actually read the reviews and was skeptical about downloading and wasting my time, but i downloaded it anyway and registered on the app, added my card info, and just like that it works great!!! It gives current balance and transaction history.. Just so you guys know, you have to create a new user ID and password, i think that's where people are going wrong 😘

The poorest excuse for an app i've seen in my life. Continually losing my info, username wrong, password wrong, losses my account nnumber. The page to enter the card number is missing the next or enter button completely. Customer service is nonexistent. A 1 is way to high a rating! Spent over a month trying to get in, hundreds of hrs, hundreds of attempts. Should be pulled as an available app..

This app is HORRIBLE as far as trying to log in. I am being forced every couple of weeks to change my password, even though I opt to use my fingerprint to log in. It happens even though I log in regularly and is not only completely FRUSTRATING, but just as UNNECESSARY and TIME CONSUMING. There's no way to get an itemization on purchased goods, just lump sum amounts. Honestly, the entire app is horrible. The help center is even more worthless. You can't even contact anyone if you have questions.

Edit: Jan 4 2020, still have to create an account to just check the balance. Manager: Hey what's the best part of our app? App dev: Being able to simply check a balance. Manager: How about we have people create accounts, so we can track transactions, then sell the info to advertisers. Too much info needed from user for simple balance. Stops just shy of dna testing, maybe next update. Gotta mail off a spit swab and wait two months for the balance.
Who do I contact. Been using the same password for month's never no problems, but today when I login there's a problem and my account gets locked. The link that was sent isn't even working.

title: Expensify - Expense Reports
description:
Easily track your receipts and manage expenses on the go with Expensify. Just take a photo of your receipt and Expensify automatically transcribes the details. Expensify can categorize and code each receipt, and can even automatically submit business expenses for approval and reimbursement. You can track personal receipts, submit business expenses to your company (even if they don’t officially use Expensify), or collect expense reports from colleagues. With customers ranging from individual freelancers and small businesses to Fortune 500 companies, Expensify is the perfect tool for anyone who needs to keep track of receipts and automate expense management. Try it with the Expensify Card to make life even easier - just swipe the card and you're done, there's no need to track receipts!

"The Best Business Travel App" - Business Insider

"Expensify is like a virtual accountant" - Wall Street Journal

"A mobile app that helps you run your business" - Forbes


Features: 
- Track and submit receipts and expenses
- Next-day direct deposit reimbursement
- In-app purchase
- Mileage and GPS tracking 
- Automatic credit card import 
- Works with receipts in any currency
- Corporate card reconciliation
- Candidate reimbursement
- Per diem functionality
- Accounting integrations (QuickBooks, Xero, NetSuite, Intacct, and more!)

Awards:
- Endorsed by the AICPA and CPA.com
- Readers' Choice Awards - CPA Practice Advisor, 2018
- App Partner of the Year - Xero Americas, 2017
- Innovation Partner of the Year - NetSuite, 2017
- Best 100 Cloud Companies Worldwide - Forbes, 2016

To learn more visit use.expensify.com or email sales@expensify.com.

recentChanges: General improvements and fixes to keep things running smoothly
comments: This app is decent but unfortunately lacks basic functionality such as the ability to filter receipts based on date, merchant, or category and the ability to search for a receipt based on different parameters. Unlimited smart scanning is $5 per month. Just wish I could get my $5 back. Plenty of other much better apps out there for this.

We have had employees use the app and so far there's no complaints!!! The reason for the neutral rating is due to the expensify cards they push on you. We have been testing them in the last week with confusing and negative results. Just tried to reach out to concierge but have ended that conversation being more confused. We will stay with Expensify but we will be searching for a different provider to replace the cards.

Overall a pretty good app, small UI improvements would go a very long way, keeping this app from 5 stars. For example I had no password and just a Gmail login and it and that is not an option on the mobile login page. Also, some pages are too big to fit in the screen and you have to scroll down to see status text (with no indication that this text exists) such as connecting your bank account.

Just hate this app. Not easy to use and I end up not claiming half of my expenses because I know I have to spend tons of time with it. (A trip overseas is easily 1.5hrs of work with the app). Things were 100 times easier when you could just dump your receipts at accountancy...

This app is the best of all apps and so easy to use. It's made it so much easier for tracking costs. It's a real burst time saver, AND it's not an arduous tasks that everyone dreads. I'm not sure how it will go as expense records with Australia tax returns, but I sure hope it's ok to use as an official record. Sure there's some bug's and some ways to make manual receipt entry easier. eg. Many receipts are emails pdf files or actually within an email txt. So a pdf receipt would be good.

title: CareCredit Mobile
description:
Now there's a simple, convenient way to manage and use your CareCredit credit card. With the CareCredit Mobile app you can access your digital card, pay your bill, find enrolled providers and businesses that accept CareCredit, set alerts and pay your provider invoice. With a new, vibrant and simple design the CareCredit Mobile app offers features such as:
Easy Set-Up and Login Access 
•	New to CareCredit Online Account Management? Setting up your account is fast and easy.
•	Already registered for Online Account Management? Connect to CareCredit Mobile and log in with your existing username and password. 
•	Enable Fingerprint login for a simple and secure way to access your account.

Secure Digital Card Access 
•	Your CareCredit credit card is preloaded when you log in. Just access the Summary and swipe down to view your Digital Card.
•	Your CareCredit Digital Card can be used for purchases within the network of enrolled providers.

Convenient Account Management 
•	Make monthly payments to your account.
•	Always know where your account stands. Check your balance and credit limit anytime, anywhere.
•	View your promotional purchase details, transaction & payment history.
•	Make changes to scheduled payments.
•	Securely add multiple bank accounts that you’d like to use to pay your CareCredit credit card bill.
•	Make payments directly to your doctor or healthcare provider with Pay My Provider. 

Find a Location
•	Search and locate providers and businesses near you that accept the CareCredit credit card
•	Save and quickly access your favorite providers and businesses.
•	Use the Map feature to view CareCredit acceptance locations and get directions.

Stay Informed
•	Set custom notifications to remind you about payments and changes to your account.
•	Access to helpful information, Cardholder resources, and tips for using credit wisely in the Knowledge Center.

**Minimum system requirements: Android OS v5.1 and higher are supported. If you are not able to upgrade, use your browser to log into your account on mysynchrony.com/carecredit

recentChanges:
Thanks for using the CareCredit Mobile App. We’ve made some major improvements to make managing your account and app preferences easier. In addition to bug fixes, this release includes:
· Account Summary enhancements with easy access to resources and managing your statement delivery, fingerprint login, location access, and notification preferences.
· Redesigned More Menu for simplified access to your account preferences, messages, resources, app settings, and CareCredit contact info.
comments: App crashes a lot or just won't allow me to sign in. Has caused my payment to be late once now because of not being able to get into the app, not because I didn't know my information, but because the app was having problems. Freezes when trying to sign in, especially with finger print varification. This seems to be a customer wide issue that need to be fixed.

Love the app because I do everything on my phone. When I need to use this app, however, it seldom opens. It will eventually open, but I have to try over and over until it does. Normally takes about 6 or 7 tries resulting in 30 minutes of continuous frustration before I can use this. If they can ever get this fixed, I'll update to 5 stars, but until then it just angers me for the 1st half hour because i have to waist so much time in attempts before actually using.

The app is honestly the worst app I have ever used. It freezes up everytime I try to login - That's if I can even get past a blank white screen - and when I attempt to close out it freezes my entire phone (it's a S10+, so it's not the phone). It's actual garbage and if I could give it zero stars, I would.

This app used to work really well. Not perfect, but decent. Then it started freezing and hanging up during log in a while back. Now, it won't let you log in at all. Use the website if you need to access your account, cause this app won't work 🤷‍♂️

Update.. Still a great easy to use app!! However using this card you should be aware how your payment is applied.. Tried to pay off 70$ deferred balance that ends April 2020 and was told that it would cost 118$ to pay it off because the first 48$ I pay a month is applied to another deferred balance that has pay off date for November 2021 then anything over the 48$ is applied to the 70$ balance so 118$ is required to pay off a 70$ balance before interest is applied

title: Brigit: Get $250. When Needed.
description:
Get up to $250 whenever you need it. No credit check. No interest. Access in 60 seconds.




* Brigit does not support Chime at this time. Please check back at a later date. *



Up to $250
It happens to all of us. Car out of gas? Phone bill due? Unexpected car repair? Rest easy knowing you’re always covered and save hundreds in fees annually.

Easy Sign up. Fast Access.
No red tape. No hoops. Connect your bank account and that’s it! Brigit works with thousands of banks like Bank of America, Wells Fargo, TD Bank, Chase, Navy Federal Credit Union and 15,000+ more. 

No interest. No hidden fees. No late penalties.
Brigit’s basic account monitoring plan is free to use. Our premium plan is only a flat $9.99, providing you extra financial tools to help you budget and cash, interest-free. What you see is what you get.

Save hundreds in overdraft fees. 
Nobody has time for overdraft fees. They’re expensive, annoying, and just wrong. Stop spending your hard-earned money on expensive fees, and start saving instead. 

OTHER FEATURES YOU'LL ENJOY

1. Money sent automatically with Auto Advances
Get cash automatically in your account when your balance is low and in danger of dipping below zero. End overdrafts without even thinking about it. 

2. Money on request.
Have an emergency and need cash fast? Don’t worry. In just one tap, request the amount you need and money will be sent directly to your account.

3. Overdraft Predictions
Spending more than planned? We help you budget and alert you if your balance is running low.

4. Balance Alerts & Bill Alerts
We’ll notify you if your balance changes and if you have an upcoming bill, so you can stay on top of your spending.

5. Repayment Options
Want to repay early? No problem. Need a bit of extra time? We’ve got your back.

SERIOUS SECURITY:
All of your data is secured with the same 256-bit encryption that banks use. We do NOT share or sell any of your personal information with ANY third parties.

SUPPORT:
We are always here to help. If you ever need us or have any questions, please email us at friends@hellobrigit.com.

OUR MISSION
We started Brigit because we believe all responsible hard-working Americans deserve financial stability. We are tired of banks systematically exploiting us, so we've built a transparent and fair product that helps everyone make ends meet.

Brigit is not affiliated with Earnin, Dave, Cleo, Klover, MoneyLion, Albert, Digit, or Cash App

comments: I had no problems using this app for some time and was up to 110 bucks that was tremendous to use lately with my hubs out of work. Sign on tonight to see that my amount to borrow has changed to 50 for no reason. I have still got the same income and have paid back without any issue whatsoever. In reality, the 110 was less than I should have been allowed to borrow given my income is min 900 weekly after taxes, but 50 dollars is barely a gas tank. I really need this fixed.

Update number 6. 8 months later. March 15th, 2020 Update:: After being told it was being added shortly back in December it still hasn't. Do not use this crappy app. There's so many better alternatives. and after successfully adding my account it still says that the app doesn't support that bank. If it takes them this long and they still don't know what you're talking about this app isn't worth it. Go to earnin.

My husbands review-> Has been great. Never had any issues. Would've been 5 stars until now... Have been getting 180-200 for months... Until this last pay period, they offered to add my debit card to receive my deposits in seconds which really didn't matter but i went ahead and did it. MISTAKE... As SOON as i did, they reduced my advance from 200 to 60!! I've never missed a payment and follows the rules. For 60 bucks and the 9.99 fee, i probably will not continue to use this service...

It is easy to activate the safety net, and I like that it automatically comes out on my next payday. I guess it would be considered a payday loan but they don't lend alot at one time and there is no interest or late fees. You can extend the payment date if you need too. The service is not free, it's 9.99 a month I think that's kind of high and I don't like surprises, I didn't see anywhere that stated a monthly fee until I activated the safety net. I took off 2 stars otherwise it's really good.

It's a decent app if you have one of the major banks like Chase, Wells Fargo, or Bank of America. Otherwise don't waste your time setting it up. The money comes in a decent time if you chose express for a few bucks. They also let you extend your due date too. I just wish the balance could update more frequent.

title: Cash Advance - Personal Loans Online
description:
Are you looking for a cash advance? Need money fast to pay bills or for emergency fund? Apply for personal loans to get quick cash today through our simple loan application. You can use our app if you need emergency loan whenever and wherever you are, so even if you don’t need fast money today, you can download and save it for later use. Or you can take a look at our app to make sure we can fulfill what you need including when you need to finance help to apply for personal loans and money online. 

Cash Advance is designed for everyone who need money fast and doesn’t have a lot of options, whether because you live far away and need to get money online, or because you don’t have emergency fund in your bank account. No matter when or why you need it, we can provide finance help for you. You can use loan calculator to calculate loan installments and apply for money online based on how much you need it. It’s a very easy cash application and certainly come in handy if you need emergency loan and fast money for medical bills, repair bills, rent, or anything at all.  

========================================
Benefit of using Cash Advance to Apply for Easy Cash
========================================

· Download Cash Advance App – Personal Loans Online for FREE  and use it whenever you need money! Feel free to download and browse our app to see if our application is suitable for you. See various installments options, payment options, and other features of our app. 

· Calculate loan installments. You don’t need a separate loan calculator to calculate loan installments, we will inform you before you agree to take the loan. It’s a great finance help so you can plan your expenditure better and understand your options.

· Fast and simple application. Application is super fast and you can apply it anytime or anywhere, as long as you have the internet. That saves you a lot of time, energy, and transportation fee! It’s so convenient to get personal loans through Cash Advance. 

· Fast Process. We understand that people who need quick cash need it soon, preferably now. That’s why it’s called emergency loan.  Once your application is accepted, we will transfer the money to your bank account so you can make use of emergency fund as soon as possible. 

Getting fast money can be very lengthy and troublesome process. That’s why we create Cash Advance App – Personal Loans Online, to  makes it easier for anyone who needs easy cash to get it quickly. This fast process and quick approval is necessary, especially if you need the money for emergencies. 

Situations are unpredictable. No  one can be sure that they have enough savings in case of emergency. Maybe your pets get sick and you’re stuck with hefty vet bills. Maybe there are other unexpected things that occur such as your house in need of repairs, etc. Whatever  it is, make sure you have our app on hand so you can apply right away whenever you need it. 

========================================
Disclaimer
========================================

We are not a lender and we cannot predict what fees and interest rate will be applied to the loan you will be offered. APRs range in this app 4.99% - 35%. For more information regarding the APR contact your lender.

Representative Example of APR. If you borrow $2.500 over a term of 1 year with an APR of 10% and a fee of 3%, you will pay $219.79 each month. The total amount payable will be of $2.637, with total interest of $137.48.

Minimum and maximum period for repayment - from 90 days to 1 year.

comments: This app is just perfect! I have been using it for months now and I love it. No invasive ads. No trouble, disputes, discrepancies, or anything. Besides, the money comes so fast. I don't know how long this app will be available, or free to use, but it has saved me countless times and I use it very often.

I had this app for quite some time. I love it. The only thing is I have never got an update on how much I can request and I'm pretty sure that by now with on-time payments and my requests I should get an update. And my paydays sometimes are off so they try to pull too early but with the date change option, it can be avoided.

The app was working fine but after the update, I enjoyed it even more. It works faster and no problem to log in. No complaints. Also, the customer support is really on top of it, makes life less stressful when things work as intended. thanks a lot, if I need money, I will deal with you again.

This app has such cool features, so I decided to leave my feedback here. The first time I heard about this app from my colleague, she used it some time ago. Yes, I was amazed by how easily can I receive money. Instead of waiting for bank decisions, I just fulfilled the form and received my money in the day.

Nice design and interface. I needed to fix a bike but the problem was money. I had tried several apps but it wasn’t a good experience. Somehow, I found this app and it saved me! Everything is clear. Money is real; it isn’t a lie or affair. It’s super useful stuff for everyone. No complaints here!

title: PREMIER Credit Card
description:
Manage your account(s) from anywhere.
•	View current balance, available credit, and last payment
•	Make a payment
•	View recent transactions
•	Customize your account
•	Simplified navigation
descriptionHTML:
Manage your account(s) from anywhere.
• View current balance, available credit, and last payment
• Make a payment
• View recent transactions
• Customize your account
• Simplified navigation
summary: This mobile app allows you to manage your First PREMIER Credit Card on the go.
recentChanges:
This release includes:

• Fixed app crash issues
comments: The app is fine but the card has got to be the worse one I've ever had. I have a measly 400 dollar limit with Premier. I used it to pay for something before payday. Then I paid it off on payday but because it wasn't done processing by the end of the day, The card was declined at WALMART. Super embarrassing. Oh and the amount was 91 dollars and some change not even close to the amount of available credit and it might take a week to post to your card once they've pulled it from your bank.

Not up to par with other banking Apps. You can't have more than one checking account added without replacing the other. So if you try to add a second checking account, it will replace the first one you have. Other than that, the Mobile Banking App is mediocre at best. Allow us to leave a travel notice when travelling or to lock our Cards for when they're not in use. Please do regular updates and add new features either weekly or monthly. A lot of missing features. I hope to see some updates.

It used to be a good app but now I cant get it to open. I click on the app and I get a blank white screen and it stays that way until I close all apps on my phone, then it just goes to my home screen. Its fully updated, I've uninstalled and reinstalled, still isn't working.

This is rediculace I just got the card 1 month ago and I'm sure it's a good card but ever since the recent update, the app permanently crashed and will not open. Therefore I cannot log in to check or pay anything. I also went to mobile app support and the first premier bank web site and I see they have my log in info, but do not recognize me and will not connect with me and again I have no access. It makes no sense. I have never seen such a bad system set up.

Horrible new version. App brings me to a website and i have to select the app version. Less options, can not access account info like before. go back to the old version. If i could have selected 0 stars i would have

title: Crypto.com - Buy Bitcoin Now
description:
Download the Crypto.com App and sign up for an account in minutes. Start earning up to 8% p.a. on your crypto. Grow your digital assets now!

With Crypto.com you can:
* Earn up to 8% per annum (p.a.) on your crypto; 12% p.a. on stablecoins
* Get a Metal Visa Card (up to 5% MCO Rewards back)
* Buy/sell 50+ crypto at True Cost
* Deposit crypto, get an instant loan*
* Build a crypto portfolio with 3 taps*
* App users can trade on Crypto.com Exchange instantly

Our first product is the MCO Visa Card:
* A beautifully crafted metal Visa card
* Up to 5% MCO Rewards back on ALL spending (based on card tier)
* Music and movie subscriptions rebates on selected streaming services**
* Unlimited access to 1000+ airport lounges globally on select cards.
* 10% MCO Rewards back on bookings on selected travel websites**
* Interbank exchange rates
* No Fee ATM withdrawals***
* MCO cards are now available for Google Pay in United States

Crypto.com Wallet App covers all your basic cryptocurrency needs:
* Buy crypto AT TRUE COST, no fees, and no hidden spread markups.
* Buy Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), XRP, Litecoin (LTC) and other leading coins with your credit/debit card or bank transfer.
* Securely store, send and receive cryptocurrencies.
* Track 200+ coins with our cryptocurrency price tracker.

Our services are available based on your jurisdiction.

=======================================
As compliance is a core competency of Crypto.com, user's identity/location verification will fail if you are located in a market where cryptocurrencies are banned/restricted by local regulations.

Any issues or feedback? Please contact us via in-app/website live chat or contact@crypto.com.

* Not yet available in all markets (e.g. USA)
**These offers are launched by Crypto.com independently and there is no partnership between Crypto.com and the merchants in this offer. Crypto.com has the sole discretion to modify this offer at any time.
*** ATM bank fees may apply. Limits Apply. See GetMCO.com or Crypto.com for details.

US Customer Disclaimers:  
By using this card you agree to the terms and conditions of the cardholder agreement AND FEE SCHEDULE, IF ANY. This card is issued by Metropolitan Commercial Bank (Member FDIC) pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc.  “Metropolitan Commercial Bank” and “Metropolitan” are registered trademarks of Metropolitan Commercial Bank ©2014.

European Customer Disclaimers:
The Card is issued by Wirecard Card Solutions Ltd ("WDCS") pursuant to licence from Visa. WDCS is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority to conduct electronic money service activities under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (Ref: 900051).

IMPORTANT INFORMATION FOR OPENING A CARD ACCOUNT: To help the federal government fight the funding of terrorism and money laundering activities, the USA PATRIOT Act requires all financial institutions and their third parties to obtain, verify, and record information that identifies each person who opens a Card Account. What this means for you: When you open a Card Account, we will ask for your name, address, date of birth, and other information that will allow us to identify you. We may also ask to see your driver's license or other identifying documents at any time.

recentChanges:
Crypto.com's Wallet & Card App is the best place to buy, sell, store, send and track crypto. In this update:
- Bug fixes & improvements
comments: It's a good app that I use daily. I do however find it slightly buggy and therefore should probably still be classes as BETA. It is also a bit frustrating that you can funds to their exchange through the app, but you can't draw it out through the app. The exchange is still in BETA, but I would like to see this feature soon.

Have come to like this app due to it's versatility and convenience in converting cryptocurrency into cash for immediate access using debit card. Transfer of funds to/from other exchanges was quick and easy. MCO rewards are a plus. I've easily paid bills with debit card and withdrawn funds via ATM. My one issue, which was my error, was quickly resolved and fixed by a professional customer service team. An explanation of my error and assurance they could fix it was above and beyond.

Good, but not ready for prime time. Security issue: whitelisting addresses is instant -- there should be a 48-72hr waiting period. Can't withdraw some crypto like XTZ. The fees for withdrawing USDC were $1, where even Coinbase does it for free. No instant dividends- Coinbase pays 5% dividends on XTZ for just keeping it there without you having to do anything extra, unlike cryptocom

Loved the app at first all was great really liked the security they provide and all a sudden they close my account saying they were revamping ect not exact words but something along those lines but not before i had set up a deposit of about $240 in USD. They assured me the deposit would not go threw and be sent back to bank of sender.... wrong i get an email informing me the deposit was in my crypto account cant log in want re me to do the varification process again!?!??! I JUST WANT MY MONEY!

Difficult to get your money back. You can transfer as little as you want, depending on the minimum amount to purchase, but you have to have a certain amount to withdraw the money back to your bank account, if you can figure that ish out. I only got thia account for a high prize in another app and neither company knows what they're doing so I'm out the prize and my money. It's only $20 but still. Stay away. Stay Far away.

title: NetBenefits
description:
Easily manage your workplace benefits from Fidelity—from sending us documents to accessing your retirement savings, stock options, health insurance, and more.

View
Account balances, investments, recent contributions, and account performance
Monitor other accounts, including 529 plans and brokerage accounts
Quickly find health insurance information, such as who’s covered under your plan, provider phone numbers, and your group number , Access recent payroll statements

Plan
See how much you may need in retirement and get your Fidelity Retirement Score℠
Financial Wellness next steps so you can confidently plan and take action

Act
Change your contribution rate and investments
Send us documents and rollover checks using your camera
Exercise options and accept grants in your stock plans
Enroll in your health insurance during annual enrollment

Learn
Access articles, videos, podcasts, and interactive tools to make informed financial decisions

Alerts
Get important reminders about timely actions to take within your account

Account Security
We take your account security seriously and are always researching new ways to protect you. We use a combination of advanced measures such as customer verification and biometrics to help ensure every visit is safe. 

Feedback
We want to hear from you. Love our app? Let us know. Can’t find something? Tell us what you’re looking for. 

Additional Information
Available for phones running Android 6.0 or later.

The NetBenefits® smartphone app is available to individuals who have one or more workplace benefits provided by Fidelity Investments. Please note that the app is currently not available for use with Fidelity-serviced HR/payroll plans.

NetBenefits and the NetBenefits design logo are registered service marks of FMR LLC. 

The images below are for illustrative purposes only.

System availability and response times may vary.

Fidelity Brokerage Services LLC, Member NYSE, SIPC

recentChanges:
Thank you for your feedback – we are always listening and trying to improve with every update. Our latest
version includes:
• Minor bug fixes and improvements
comments: I'm amazed by the other app ratings. Although this app has not crashed, it is so lazily built. All links redirect to website pages that are not at all optimized for mobile. Feels like I'm on a desktop browser crunched into a tiny screen. Terrible experience. The only point of this app is that it's easier to sign in, with fingerprint for example, than in a browser.

This app does not allow me to do anything of value but see my balance. Every time I need to do something it goes out of mobile mode and goes to desktop mode where I can barely read anything. It also has frequent bouts of cannot view this page at this time. The whole reason I wanted the mobile app was so I could do a direct reimbursement after I have to pay an expense up front but this app does not allow that. It simply functions to tell me how much I have. Poor functionality. I may uninstall.

I love the app! Great and frightening at the same time. The app is easy to use and easy to understand, great. I thought being involved would be cool, yes and a resounding no! I like being able to check the status I just need to curb my impulse to check every day. A watched pot never boils....or something like that.

I love how easy the information is to access. Plus the convenient buttons to alter contributions. It tracks all accounts, HSAs, 529Cs, 401Ks and even stock options. There are also great videos on money management and investment planning. Plus it shows you how you are tracking on your retirement, including assumptions for your company's traditional pension models (if your corporate supports this function).

Great app. It helps you see everything that is happening with your 401k. A little bid more detailed description of the different types of contributions would be helpful. I dont really understand the stock investment section either.

title: GM Financial Mobile
description:
The GM Financial Mobile app lets you manage accounts anywhere. The February 2019 update addresses many of the performance issues that were in the initial version of the app, while also featuring a new look, improved navigation and fingerprint authentication.

Wherever your journey takes you, have the tools you need to make payments and keep your GM Financial account on track with GM Financial Mobile.

This app lets you:
• Conveniently access your account 24/7
• Make a payment or set up auto pay
• See your payment options 
• Manage multiple accounts

This app does not support rooted devices.

If you need help with GM Financial Mobile, please message our Customer Experience team in the app, or through MyAccount on the web at GMFinancial.com/MyAccount. You can also message us through Facebook at Facebook.com/GMFinancial or Twitter at Twitter.com/GMFinancial.

recentChanges: Minor bug fixes
comments: This app sucks!! Every month I go on my phone to pay my bill & I get "an unexpected error has occurred." Then I just end up going online from a computer and it finally works. You need to fix this app ASAP!! There is no convenience here if the app doesn't work for payments!!

More of a complaint with the company rather than the app, there is no way to make a principal payment and when I called and made one of my payments into a principal payment it was registered as a normal payment
Simply works. Excellent. Even after most recent updates, have not had any issues.
Love the app..its so EZZZ and I'm a novice at all this. Thank you!!!

Tried for over 30 minutes to sign up for automatic payments. It wouldn't let me put a date in. I tried to call at the number they had listed and I got put on hold for 15 minutes. I hung up. If this is how their web site works I sure hope my car works better

title: Even
description:
Even helps you turn your paycheck into progress. Get paid on demand, master your bills, and save money—all with the Even app.

— Get paid on demand
In a pinch? Send your pay to your bank account in one business day, or pick it up instantly at any Walmart. No hidden fees, no loans, no interest. Available through select employers.

— See how much you need for bills
Even detects which bills are coming up and how much you need for them. There’s no setup work or math to do.

— Safe and secure
Even keeps your information private and secure, and never advertises to you.




How much does Even cost?
Even's budgeting features are free to use. Even Plus, which includes Instapay, is only available through employers that Even has partnered with. Even Plus costs $8/month, though some employers may subsidize some or all of that cost.

Does Even work with any bank?
Even works with over 18,000 banks, but some smaller banks take a long time to send data to the Even app. If you use one of these banks, your experience with the app may not be great. We wish we could make things faster for this set of banks, but there’s only so much we can do.

Does Even offer loans? 
No, Instapay allows you to access the wages you've already earned. There's no interest, and it's not borrowing because it's your money.

Does Even work with any bank?
Even works with over 18,000 banks, but some smaller banks take a long time to send data to the Even app. If you use one of these banks, your experience with the app may not be great. We wish we could make things faster for this set of banks, but there’s only so much we can do.

Does Even offer loans?
No, Instapay allows you to access the wages you've already earned. There's no interest, and it's not borrowing because it's your money.
summary: Turn paychecks into progress
recentChanges: We update the Even app regularly so we can make it better. Get the latest version for all of the newest features and fixes. Thanks for using Even!
comments: Sure, it's easy to use. Yeah, it's nice that I can technically get my money early. However, you aren't yet able to connect to my Capital One bank account because "their software might be old"? This is unbelievably annoying. Capital One is a major bank and provider, and I don't have any other banks, so to find out I can't connect my bank is extremely dissatisfying. Fix this ASAP.

I like that i can see what i earn each day and each week, as well as how much my check will be. I like that I am able to pull money from next check, before payday, when i need it. However my card balance doesnt ever refresh and I constantly have to refresh my bank connection because my transactions are never up to date.

Its honestly easier than i expected it to be in use. Like everything is there for you and unless you dont have common sense on how things work then you should easily be able to use this without troubles. Personally i like how we can take out some money early from my paycheck whenever i need it and it doesnt tax or screw anything up

If there was a way to give more stars I would!!! I love this app it is very useful and the customer service is always top notch. I requested an instapay and lost my ID so I couldn't pick my money up and didn't know what to do but a great customer rep canceled it for me and I was able to get it threw my checking account. Thank you so very much

This app has saved my life more than once. I love being able to check my balance, see how much I'll make in my next check and be able to get and advance when i need it. Definitely a 5 star app for me.

title: Sendwave—Send Money to Africa
description:
Send Money from the US, UK, Ireland, Italy, Spain and Canada to East and West Africa, with Love:

** Instant, NO FEE transfers from your debit card (including PostePay in Italy) to mobile money accounts in Kenya, Uganda, Tanzania, Ghana, and Nigeria
** Send money as easily and quickly as a text
** Personal support 7 days of the week
** Realtime updates on the status of your transfer so you always know where your money is
www.sendwave.com
descriptionHTML:
Send Money from the US, UK, Ireland, Italy, Spain and Canada to East and West Africa, with Love:

** Instant, NO FEE transfers from your debit card (including PostePay in Italy) to mobile money accounts in Kenya, Uganda, Tanzania, Ghana, and Nigeria
** Send money as easily and quickly as a text
** Personal support 7 days of the week
** Realtime updates on the status of your transfer so you always know where your money is
www.sendwave.com
summary: Instant, no fee transfers from the US, UK, IE, Italy, Spain and Canada to Africa
recentChanges: Bug fixes and minor improvements.
comments: Verification of ID is a joke. Spent hours on the phone attempting to verify myself, and the recipient, including sending documents (ID, drivers licenses, etc). After multiple calls and emails, I am still unable to send money to my children in Uganda and SendWave refuses to approve the transaction. This all was supposed to be simple. Going back to a confirmed business like Western Union.

The convenience is five stars, however you have to be alert with current exchange rate, my rates on my app kept dropping which made me suspicious, checked the rate online and found wave rate to be a bit low. I decided to use my other phone with the same account and the rate was a little higher than my regular phone I used for transactions, I was about to send an amount that would cost $25 motre to send that same amount. Please open your eyes, it's about bottom line for businesses.

I really loved this app, until they send my money after they say to text me when system is up & running again. I went and use different money transfer because I never got text from sendwave! I ended up double sending! When I called them to stop the transaction, they didn't even acknowledge it was fault on their part! Two star for not owning up to your errors!

A friend introduced me to this app, but signing up has been hell for me. The app would not allow me into input my confirmation code to conclude the sign up. This is a no-no for me, especially knowing I'll be entrusting my money to them. I'll go back to my Worldremit.

I am not sure if this app works in the United states..... Two problems... first, I tried to log into my first account and entered the correct logins but required me to validate the three numbers on the back of my Credit Card which I actually lost it.... so I wasn't able to log in... Secondly, I tried to open a new account but it keep asking me to disable VPN/Proxy which I never used in the first place..... Last time I wanted to use this app had service to Tanzania interrupted.

title: MySynchrony
description:
Download the MySynchrony App today to securely manage the same private label credit card accounts that you manage on MySynchrony.com quickly and conveniently!*
 
You cannot access Synchrony Bank Savings accounts and some private label national brand credit cards on this app.
 
With this mobile app you will be able to:
• Log in securely using TouchID/Fingerprint Authentication
• Make payments to your account
• Check your balance and credit limit anytime, anywhere
• Review your transaction and payment history
• Make changes to scheduled payments
• Securely add multiple bank accounts that you’d like to use to pay your bill
• Provide us feedback on your mobile app experience
 
*Private label credit cards issued by Synchrony Bank.

recentChanges: For those who have more than one credit card account serviced at MySynchrony.com we’ve made it even easier for you to get a bird’s eye view of all your accounts on a single dashboard. We also redesigned and made improvements to the Account Summary and Payments section. Check it out and let us know what you think in the apps’s Provide Feedback section.
comments: The app is great! I've only had 1 problem with it though, which is why I didn't give it 5 stars. The app has said that my bill is "due soon," rather than due now or past due causing a late charge. This is something that I hope will soon be corrected. Possibly even getting a refund of said late charges? Anyway, I'm also curious as to why only 2 of my 3 Synchrony accounts are accessible through the Synchrony app?

Synchrony Sucks. Synchrony Bank is the worst. When I got the alert of the change I had a feeling it was not going to be good. My limit was increase about 3 or 4 months ago fast forward to today, they decreased my credit limit to my balance amount. Keep in mind my accounts are up to date. I pay on time, been with hsn for years. I don't like the fact that they increase your limit one month then 2 or 3 months later they decrease it. That affects your credit . Just wrong, once I pay it off I'm out

Absolutely worthless app. I have been trying to get signed in and register my card for months. I can access my info online just fine. I finally just paid off the card and will be closing it tomorrow because it takes a good 5 minutes to get logged in to even check my balance.

The app works fine for what it is. I had the other app and made my payments through there but when they switch everything to this app, I didn't receive any notice. So when I went to make my normal payment it wouldn't go through which made me late and charged me a late fee

Synchrony owns so many store cards I can't keep all the passwords straight for all the accounts. They need one account to log into, listing all the cards. Going to pay off the store cards, and use just MC/Visa at the stores, to end the constant frustration.

title: AllSouth Mobile Banking

Mobile Banking with AllSouth is easy. Let us simplify your life with our app you can access your account anytime, anywhere.

Check your account balance, make transfers, pay bills, deposit checks, control your cards, and so much more.

Manage all of your accounts in one place.
Connect all of your accounts, even ones from other banks and credit unions, and get a complete picture of your finances.

Stay in the know with Alerts.
Stay on top of your finances and your budget. Create your own SMS text message or email alerts to get updates on low balances, account activity, payments and more.

Balances on the go.
When you’re on the go, Fast Balance lets you quickly see your account balance through the new Mobile App without needing to log in.

Connect all of your accounts, even ones from other banks and credit unions, and get a complete picture of your finances.

Stay in the know with Alerts.
Stay on top of your finances and your budget. Create your own SMS text message or email alerts to get updates on low balances, account activity, payments and more.

Balances on the go.
When you’re on the go, Fast Balance lets you quickly see your account balance through the new Mobile App without needing to log in.
summary: Experience Better Banking. Experience AllSouth.
recentChanges:
We are always working on ways to improve your banking experience and the services we provide to help make life a little easier. This new update includes a wide range of new and improved services designed with you in mind, including:

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback helps us make the AllSouth app better.
comments: It'll take getting used to. I decided to go online and log in first before doing the app. The online process was easy allowing me to reset my pw and asked security questions. Once on the page it was a lot more detailed and a bit confusing at first but I played around with it and it got better. Once I logged off online I went to the app and uninstalled the old app and restarted my phone reinstalling the new app. Make sure to use the new pw set online on the app on the 1st login. Hope this helps.

This used to be a decent app but since the new mobile banking, can't log into the app even after creating a new password. Such a pain =( and the Dev's response is "make sure your password contains only allowed special characters or you'll receive an error" 😒 This is a case of "least effort possible" without even addressing the problem that the app is useless at this point because YOU CANNOT LOG IN.

I've tried logging in online, it verifies and has me set a new password but then a network error occurs. I've tried through the app and the same thing. I've tried through my laptop and same thing. I've called customer service like asked but that didn't help. Before you implement a new system make sure it runs smoothly.

After waiting two days for an updated app I thought it would be better but it's not. Cannot log into the app even after entering verification codes via text and uninstalling then reinstalling the app. Can only log on online. The update wasn't needed and the last version was much simpler and easy to manage.

I must agree the old app was more user friendly. Someone at AllSouth really needs to look at the current messages that users get when trying to old into the old app. You need to delete the old app and reinstall the new app. The new mobile app does work but that is not what the user interface says.
